title: Cock Talk & Yoni Verse. A Sharing Time
description:
"He's so fit, I bet he has such high confidence...
 She's so skinny, she must never be lonely...
 Oh I'm too....blah... I'll never be... blah
 CALLING BULLSHIT
 Sexy, ugly, Hung, small, Fit, fat, big nose, weird toes.... ugh! Enough!
 All these descriptions leave their Scars. Want to drop that stone?
 We all have fears of social rejection based on external appearance.
 Some contracted crappy idea that to in order to get love I have to look a certain way, be a certain somebody, or they wont accept me.
 This space is for sharing those deep painful truths
 The big kid in school may get bullied outright, but the pretty kid is also cursed, they can never express their self consciousness, their insecurity, their fears and alone feelings, ""its not allowed""
 Well FUCK THAT
 Here, You Are Allowed. All of You. Welcome your doubts, welcome your pride, welcome welcome welcome to your blessed body."

title: 2016 Black Rock City Air Guitar Championship
description:
2016 Black Rock City Air Guitar Championship - Esplanade & 6:45

OFFICIAL RULES OF COMPETITION:  
 	Each performance is played to 1 minute (60 sec.) of a song
 	The 60 second song will be provided to you from a list of 100+ tracks to choose from
 	The instrument must be invisible & be a guitar, i.e. air drums not allowed
 	Air roadies are allowed, but must leave the stage before the performance
 	Back-up bands (air or real) are not allowed

Black Rock City Air Guitar contests each consist of two rounds:

 	Round 1 (freestyle): each competitor performs to a song of their choice from the list
 	Round 2 (compulsory): top competitors from round 1 perform surprise song

JUDGING CRITERIA:  
The jury is a panel of independent judges. The results of the jury cannot be protested. All performances are scored on a scale from 4.0 to 6.0 – 6.0 being the highest possible. Scores are given to one decimal point (e.g. 5.4, not 5.48). A single score is given to each air guitarist based on their overall performance in that round.

The score reflects the quality of the performance based on three key criteria:

1.	Technical merit - You don’t have to know what notes you’re playing, but the more your invisible fretwork corresponds to the music that’s playing, the better the performance.
2.	Stage presence - Anyone can do it in the privacy of their bedroom. Few have what it takes to rock a crowd of hundreds or even thousands – all without an instrument.
3.	“Airness” - The last criteria is the most difficult to define yet often the most decisive of all. Airness is defined as the extent to which a performance transcends the imitation of a real guitar and becomes an art form in and of itself.

Please note: the scores from BOTH ROUNDS are added to determine the contestants’ final scores. This combined score determines the winner.  Earn the title of Black Rock City Air Guitar Champion!
print_description: 2016 Black Rock City Air Guitar Championship at Esplanade & 6:45!  Come and watch the spectacle or better yet, enter the competition!

title: 2nd Annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!
description:
Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile. 

BYOB and a ziploc in case you puke!

Join us for the 2nd annual Black Rock City Beer Mile!!!!

Drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer, run 400 meters.

If you puke, you need to drink a penalty beer.

All participants MUST bring their own beers (a 6 pack is best in case you puke) AND you MUST run with a large ziploc bag (in case you puke, bc Burning Man is a Leave No Trace Event). 

All beer mile rules must be followed:
http://www.beermile.com/rules

Please arrive a few minutes early for registration (yep, numbers this year). Heckling is encouraged. This will be fun. Sometimes, the best beer milers are NOT runners...and sometimes, the best runners are NOT good beer milers. It's fun no matter what!
print_description:
Drink beer, run 400 meters, drink beer, run 400 meters, drink beer, run 400 meters, drink a beer,run 400 meters

BYOB & a ziploc (in case you puke).

title: 48 Hour Film Project: Black Rock City
description:
Videogasm will again be host to The Black Rock City edition of The 48 Hour Film Project. Were groups of burners write, shoot and edit films over a 48 hour period to be shown at a festival on Thursday night. We'll start with a retrospective of short films produced at Burning Man in previous years and then premiere the shorts that will be produced at this years Burning Man!

Filmmakers: If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village). If you're looking to form a team come to Videogasm at 3pm on Tuesday (8/30) to meet up with other like minded individuals. Film's should be under 10 minutes in length, contain the three ingredients (character, prop & line of dialog) listed on the posters mentioned above, and be brought to Videogasm by 8pm on Thursday (9/1). You can now shoot and edit a film on your smart phone, so get out there and make a film!
print_description: Burners make films over a 48 hour period here at BM! We'll start with a retrospective of films from previous years, then premiere this year's films!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Chloe @ RhythmWave
description: 5Rhythms with Chloe Goodwin is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed! It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. All are invited to join Chloe on the bamboo at RhythmWave!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Visudha de los Santos
description: 5Rhythms is a dynamic and exhilarating movement meditation that, over time and with regular practice, frees your spirit and catalyzes growth of unimaginable heights. Each rhythm – a beat of its own, a body dialogue with different drums, moods, and motion – leads you into the sweetest and most wild territories of who you really are. VisudhaBuddha from Taos, NM, will lead you through a spirited wave embodying each rhythm: body, heart, mind, soul, and spirit. Move your Body, move your Life. It's that simple.
print_description: 5Rhythms is a dynamic, exhilarating moving meditation. Please join VisudhaBuddha from Taos, NM, for a spirited wave - all are welcome!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Visudha @ RhythmWave
description: Make it Good. VisudhaBuddha believes that endings can be bittersweet, and the way HOME, is to make it Good. Your week on the playa has been full & rich, possibly even messy & beautiful, crazy in good or not so good ways. In the 5Rhythms we will find the pulse of the Mother, the beat of your own heart, and the music of your soul meeting in the unity of one Tribe: we remember and breath the rhythm of Life together. Joining in patterns and repetitions—one dance, one motion, one wave of energy—we come home to ourselves, each other, our home on the playa, and the essence of pure love. Leave Black Rock City with love and your family firmly embodied in your heart. Make an ending you will always remember. Please join RhythmWave and Visudha de los Santos as we close the week and our 10 years at Burning Man with a 5Rhythms celebration of movement, reflection, and spirit.
print_description: Make it good. VisudhaBuddha believes that endings can be bittersweet, and the way HOME, is to make it Good. All are welcome as we wrap 2016 at RW.

title: 5th Annual "Do the HoneyBee" Waggle Dance
description:
Join BEE lovers from all hives & wing a Flash Mob Waggle Dance!-- “Do the Honey Bee” (youtube:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-Sk6hQaZoU  for preview) lyrics will bee provided prior to this 2 minute shake up or look them up and practice beforehand.  The more bees the dHive shows the buzz, the better.  Join the BuzzInn and the Italibees as we shake our stingers and get the honey flowing!  Get your BuzzOn and wear your bizzyest pollinator costume!!! Antennae will be provided if need bee.---Come get your feelers wet and pollinate your mind!  Afterwhich we will play Beengo, Spelling Beez, Buzzy Contests, & More.
The BuzzInn is located in the Do More Now village with the 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!  Bzz Bzz! Bring your stinger too (a fork) as the Italibees will be serving up some insane pasta after 1:59pm!
print_description: Join BEE lovers & wing a Flash Mob Waggle Dance @ the dHive bar- "Do the Honeybee!" Pollinator costumes highly encouraged! Play Beengo & Spelling Bee!

title: 5th Annual International Beekeepers Summit!  >'='<
description: Beekeepers and wannabees come together for a hivemind discussion of all things bee.  Want to be a beekeeper but don’t know where to start?  Live in an urban area but have concerns about zoning &/or neighbors?  Have a theory on sustainable varroa mite management?  Opinions on which bee between the Italian, Carnolian, Russian, & Africanized bees make the best honey? Healthy Queen propagation and management?  How about a pollen patty recipe you want to share? We will discuss Beekeeping 101, suggest excellent reading materials, and who knows?  You may even have a little honey on your lips as you depart!  If a flock is to seagulls, what’s a group of beekeepers?  An argument!!!  (This summit does not require prior experience—we encourage wannabeekeepers to attend as there will be a lot of BuzzInn going on)!!!  Beek out with us!  Find us near the Do More Now's 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & Beeeeeee!
print_description: Beek out & join beekeepers from around the world to discuss the all things honeybee.  No previous experience necessary-learn to buzz anywhere! Bzzz!!!

title: Acro Yoga Kundalini  Reactivation
description:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.
print_description: Realigning the spine with kundalini activation and acro, rebuilding the temple. Cosmic dancing together, loving all that is alchemically.

title: Activating The Voice of The Playa
description:
The Playa is speaking, can you hear Her? The Playa, the sacred land on which Burning Man is held, is governed by a divine force, emanating directly from the consciousness of Mother Nature. 

This workshop will teach you how to awaken the voice of The Playa within your own being and let Her guide the creation of experiences at Burning Man that deepen, heal, and transform your relationship to yourself, others and the planet.
print_description: Do you speak Playa? Come learn how to open to the divine voice of The Playa and let Her enliven your Burning Man experience.

title: ACTOROKE at Camp Baggage Check'
description:
Actoroke is “Karaoke for actors.” In Karaoke you would pick a song to sing in front of your friends and strangers. In Actoroke, you and a friend pick a scene from a popular movie to act out. We will have a full film crew setup, complete with 3 cameras (wide master, and one on each actor), wireless lapel mics for each actor, 2 teleprompters (one for each actor, in their eye line), and a truss and lighting setup.

You will be directed by our camp’s filmmaker, Hoss Hitchcock, who will help you through your performance. Come get the full experience of acting and being directed.

The video feeds from all three cameras will be displayed in the “video village” where your friends and strangers can watch your performance!

If this sounds fun but you don’t want to act, then try your hand at running a camera or teleprompter!

Wed & Fri 10:00 pm to late
print_description:
Actoroke is “Karaoke for actors.” Act out a movie scene or be on the crew. Cameras, teleprompters, wireless

Wed & Fri 10:00 pm to late

title: Afternoon Coffee
description:
Need an afternoon PICK-ME-UP?                                                                              A little energy before another night on the Playa?


Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday and Thursday from 1-3 PM. Bring family, friends, lovers and strangers and create your own unique blend from our wide range of International coffees.  You have the opportunity to hand-grind you own unique selection of coffee that will be served pour-over style. Then pull up a chair or a pillow and sit, relax, listen to music and visit with friends, new and old, in our coffee house lounge.

We will be roasting our coffee at various times throughout the week so you won’t find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC. Come in, hang out and if you feel up to it, join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux coffee.  

Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little playa dust in the mix makes a great brew!) or help us gift a fresh cup of coffee to the burners who are serving the BRC community.

In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup, or subject yourself to the “Wheel of Misfortune” (cue the sinister music)!!!
print_description: Fresh Roasted-on-the-Playa International Coffee. Select, Grind & Blend Ur Own Joe. Relax & Enjoy Music in our plush & dust-free lounge. Roast Ur Own!

title: All You Need Is Love
description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
print_description: A community project to create a secco fresco artwork stretching across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida.

title: Anonymizing the USPS with Bitcoin Smart Contracts
description: Daniel proposes an algorithm to anonymize the United States Postal Service, establish and manage remote decentralized inventories, and generally orchestrate real world tasks between three or more random peers in a p2p network without trust, rating systems, or custodial third parties.

title: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art ... ADOPT ART!
description:
Anti M's Home for Wayward Art is a chickenwire gallery where you may adopt art and take it home with you.  Small art, lost art, found art, bad art, art which needs a good spanking, it is all here.  Just fill out a small card and let me know what you love and why.  Donations of Non-MOOPy art gladly accepted.  There is also a Gifting Box for swag and small needful things.

Curated each morning for your adoption pleasure.  Hang loose in the Shady Spot while the art goes up!
print_description: Visit the chickenwire gallery with the velvet rope, and adopt art to take to a forever home.  Bad art,  lost & found art, original art, take it home!

title: Apothakary Pharmakon by Liminal Labs
description:
“We practice what we leech,” 5&F

Calling all disciples of experience and burnt Burners! The Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon is thy primo source for all things mat’ria medica, as determined by our staff of doubtfully artful Plague Doctors, Barber Surgeons, and Sinister Sisters schooled in the non-curative arts and doctrine of signatures.

Bringeth out thy almost-dead and try our all legal, possibly effective elixirs, tonics, stimulants, and placebos.* We’ll humor thy Humours and purify thy souls** with a selection of compounds from melancholy black bile to sanguine sweet blood. Witch-testing and disposal, vials and poisons may be offered for an extra cost, dependent on practitioner’s interest or whim or in consultation with internal voices.

– Approved by the Worshipful Society of Apothakaries and the Guild of Pepperers –

* Smalleth print: all “treatment” subject to accepted insurance. In keeping with local regulations, the Liminal Apothakary Pharmakon shall no longer releaseth evil spirits via a drilled hole in thy head.

** Soul purification not guaranteed. We apologize for any inconvenience.
print_description: Dazed & hazy? Come to Pharmakon & chooseth from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, plausible elixirs, and vitamin-rich restoratives. @5&F

title: ARRGH BAR - GALLAVANT
description:
Come party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship the “USS Nevada” and our infamous ARRGH bar, serving up our special “Se(a)men and other delicious grogs.  Come join us for our 2016 “Theme Parties” 
We “officially” open Monday with our “NAKED PIRATE SHOTS” party from 10am-11:30am, Scottish Bucks Fizz and Bucky shots from 11:30am-2pm, Tuesday from 12pm-2pm we try to prevent scurvy with citrus rum “shots” and from 2pm-4pm we head down the rabbit hole for our “MAD PIRATE TEA PARTY”, Wednesday from 4pm-6pm we will indulge in homemade Apple Pie moonshine for our “PIRATE PIE PARTY”, Thursday  from 12pm-2pm our Sexy pirates will show off their “booty” in their “BOOTY SHORTS BOY PARTY” and from  4pm-6pm come enjoy a traditional Basque celebration at the “PICON PUNCH PARTY”,  Friday from 2pm-4pm we head up to the “Great White North” for our “CANUCK KISS PARTY”, Saturday from 12pm-4pm Kings and Queens put on your glam and disco away at our inaugural “DRAG BALL” and join us as we all strut our stuff at our DRAG BALL FASHION SHOW from 2pm-4pm.   And of course, amazing Bloody Marys on Sunday from 10am-12pm.  We also have an awesome “Chill space” with lots of couches and shade, great music and a rowdy crew of Wenches and Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we “Belly up to the bar and say “AARRRRGGH”
print_description: Party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our Mighty Ship the “USS Nevada” and infamous ARRGH bar, serving up our special “Se(a)men"

title: Aura Painting
description:
Grab some tea and join me for an experience driven by Synesthesia, the ability to see and feel color. My practice began as a simple way to relieve stress. I started asking friends if I could paint their auras and came to find that my impressions of color and energy aligned with the individual's current state of being. The process requires a hint of vulnerability and casual conversation. Using oil and chalk pastels I will create an image of the energy you emit.
The process can take 15 to 30 minutes depending on the complexity of the aura. It is my passion to capture the aura in its nautical beauty. 
Upon completion, I give an interpretation of the aura,
print_description: I interpret and analyze Auras using oil and chalk pastel.

title: Balancing the Masculine and Feminine with Shara
description:
In this interactive and deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then do a process of healing and balancing these parts of ourselves.

For you sensitive ones who have been experiencing intense energy and transition, know that the portal is now open for amazing, exponential growth and karma clearing! Now is the PERFECT time to integrate the endings, awakenings, transformations, death and rebirth experiences related to the self and others and to welcome a more balanced exchange between the masculine and feminine as well as man and woman.

Imbalances in females sometimes shows up as feminine infections, shame, control and dis-empowerment issues, suppression of desire, and feelings of inadequacy.  In males it may present as an unfulfillment of sexuality cravings and desires or difficulty connecting fully with the opposite sex.

This class will be a combination of lecture, group shares, and interactive exercises.
print_description: In this deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels, and then balance ourselves.

title: Bismuth or Bust
description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. The process is fascinating to watch and the results are unique and beautiful. Listen as we babble on about relevant topics in science or just make up facts as we go. We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm  Dark Wednesday.

title: BJ Practicum
description:
Yep, this really is what you think it is - a "mouth-on" workshop where we'll have a chance to ask questions, compare notes, share techniques, and generally learn from each other to be more skillful at this thing we love - or want to love - to do.  If you're interested in learning more about how to please your man orally, this is the place for you.

Come on ladies / givers, you know you've got some skills - and some questions!  Come share your favorite tips and techniques by words and demonstration, and ask questions that have been plaguing you.

	* Drool or dry? 
	* What about the gag reflex?
	* How do you use hands and still go deep?

And guys, you must have comments you'd like to pass on, other than simply "Yes, please"!

	* Hate teeth?  Want teeth?
	* What about deep throat?

Here's your chance to make your requests - and pet peeves - heard!

This is a participatory event open to couples of any combination, so long as one of them has some phallic protuberance and the other is applying lips, tongue, and maybe even throat to it.  No lookie-loos! (Age 18 and up, with ID.)
This was a great fun event at the last Burn.  The presenter's been researching all year to find new tidbits and info to share.  (Hey, someone's gotta do the tough jobs.)  Come show off, learn stuff, and have fun.
print_description: Fellate your partner. Watch others. Ask questions. Share tips. Enjoy yourselves in this couples-only workshop on giving better head to men. 18 & over.

title: Building Ethical Institutions:  Is it Worth a Try?
description: Experiencing the capacity to build institutions that incorporate our values can be profoundly liberating.  But this can also be all-consuming.  Is there something inherent in building institutions that is inconsistent with joy and freedom?  This talk is a group conversation that examines the journey of successfully creation of institutions that embody our values and whether so doing can help us to actualize "a more beautiful world our hearts know is possible, or whether there are pitfalls inherent to institution-bulding that should be avoided altogether by the light-hearted amongst us.
print_description: Is there something inherent in building institutions that is inconsistent with joy and freedom?

description:
Meet at the Man with your red dress, running shoes, a drinking vessel and a sense of humor. We will lay a Hash House Harriers-style trail that you can run, jog, walk, slide, or bike that ends with a cold brews, silly songs and guaranteed debauchery. Don’t run? No problem — bring your bike. Trail will be clearly marked with flags and there will be beverage stops along the way. On-on!
No red dress?  Anything red will do. If you are in need of a red dress, that perfect red accessory or just wanna drink a beer before trail begins – meet us at the BRCH3 Dome of Bad Decisions at 9:15&C @ 1pm for our Red Dress Exchange and Beauty Bar.

title: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it?
description: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it? Is it bad for you? How do you clean it up? - Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010. Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. Ever had trouble cleaning up after the trip to BRC? Learn a great recipe which involves simple household ingredients which removes playa dust once and for all. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

title: Blues and Partnered Dance Before Noon
description:
Have you seen how partnered dancers seem to have amazing connection and almost psychic communication with one another? How they move together with the music so perfectly? Want to learn how to speak that language? Join us for a beautiful encounter with partnered dance at Reverbia and dance under our Radience Dome. .

We'll be showing you how to listen to the music and find the rhythm that unites you and the dust with the world. Then we'll be giving you some simple tips to express it in your own movement so you can connect with any partner. Stick around for live music and dancing afterward with the California Honey Drops!

title: Body Activation: Hatha-Kundalini-Meditation
description:
This efficient practice combines multiple modalities to completely activate your mind and body. Starting with gentle stretching and quickly progressing into move comprehensive body movements, you will ease your body awake and before you know it you'll have broken a sweat. Once the body is primed, we'll work on the mind with chanting, kundalini, pranayam and meditation.

Use in lieu of, or in combination with coffee to totally activate your body and mind for a proper burn!

title: Body Games & the Alexander Technique
description: Neck, shoulders, back stiffness? Come experience how the Alexander Technique can help! This is a hands-on, non-manipulative technique that helps develop awareness of how we use our body in any activity we do. Does wonders for postural issues! Actors, musicians, dancers have used it for over 100 years. Bring a yoga mat.

title: Body Language Magic
description: A breakdown of the way our bodies communicate with the world around us.  We’ll make changes & leave with seductive, powerful intention.

title: Body Love Gallery
description: From the moment we are born our society wants to clothe us. Many of us are left feeling vulnerable at the thought of our own nakedness, afraid to bare all. Through group grounding exercises and facilitated conversations, we will create a safe container in which to navigate feelings surrounding body image, body shame, and body love. Moving into small-groups, we will each have an opportunity to exhibit ourselves and tell our ‘museum visitors’ about our bodies, giving an intimate look into our own embodied experience. *Participation requires comfort around nudity.*
print_description: Creates a safe container in which to navigate feelings surrounding body image, shame, & love. An intimate look into our own embodied experience.

title: Body Paint & Metal Bikinis
description:
Dragoncamp Armory will teach women how to make a stunningly sexy metal bikini, while we also offer a bit of body painting on premises for those who would just like a bit of sexy paint decoration. 

Ladies- Learn to trace, cut, and hand hammer a form-fitted bikini aluminum bra and/or bottom. Then decorate with bits and baubles for a one-of-a kind work of art you can wear and share on the playa. We do have limited supplies, so feel free to bring any extra bits of extra costume jewelry or broken bits and baubles to glue on your creation if you wish. Make it as sexy as you dare. Yours to keep! Patterns for all sizes. 

You will need  about 2 hours to complete an outfit. Workshop is 9am-12:30 so please arrive early morning to get started. This is a workshop for women, but partners are welcome to come and encourage.

Pose with our giant Green Dragon art car for a unique photo-op (Dragon-slaying swords furnished). We will e-mail you a photo if you wish.
print_description: Dragoncamp Armory will teach women how to make a stunningly sexy metal bikini, while we also offer a bit of body painting on premises.

Monday: 11am to 3pm  Family Fingers Day - Bring the whole family to create a T-shirts and/or Flag with all of your clan’s hand prints.
Wednesday: 11am to 3pm  Foot Fetish Flags – Bring some feet and stomp out some art!
Friday: 11am to 3pm  The Full Monty -  "everything which is necessary, appropriate, or possible; ‘the works’"(Wikipedia).   The grand slam of body art flags; Hands and feet surrounding your cheek prints.
Saturday:  11am to 3pm:  Nothing Butt Art; 'nough said.

title: Body Scan Meditation
description: a practice in mindfulness-based stress reduction and an experience in liberation through awareness.starting with the toes of the left foot, take a guided journey up and through every ligament, every bone, the space between your cells, over and under your skin.systematically and intentionally moving your attention through the body, attending to the various sensations and holding space for yourself.if you wish, please bring a mat or a blanket to lie on or under. once the meditation has begun, please do not disturb the journeys of others. thank you for respecting the start time.

title: Bonobo Lodge
description: Participate in a sensual network. Each person is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the social bonds. The name comes from our primate cousins, the Bonobo chimpanzees, who resolve the tension of conflict through intimacy rather than violence. We've adapted grooming practices seen throughout the animal kingdom to activate good-vibe hormones, which signal feelings of safety, belonging, and well-being. This is a naked experience where you should expect to touch and be touched by someone you don't already know, within a carefully structured and monitored program. All are welcome.

description:
88NV
Airport Pancake Breakfast
Thursday,  8:30 am until the pancakes run out.

Come one, come all....  to a Black Rock City Municipal Airport Tradition, the Thursday morning pancake breakfast.   
We'll have cakes on the griddle at 8:30 am, and serve em' up hot til they're gone!
Wear your favorite pilot outfit, airline garb, or most beautiful wings.....and fly to the front of the line!
Bring your own plate, cup and utensils if you can.
Travel out the 5:00 road, past the circle streets to the perimeter fence.

title: BRC Pride Parade
description:
Meet up at CampProper to start the annual 2016 Lesbian, Gay, Transgender, Queer, Intersex, Asexual, and Ally Pride Parade! It's going to be FABULOUS! 

The parade will start at our camp with some dancing. We expect to start the parade around 4:00pm (but, the party starts at 3pm). From there, we will follow a path around the 7:30 sector growing and collecting more people as we go. The parade will eventually end up at the Man, where we will take over the space with our inclusive fabulousness! Come read to walk, bike, dance, and just be amazing. Art cars are welcome to join!
print_description: Meet up at CampProper to start the annual 2016 Lesbian, Gay, Transgender, Queer, Intersex, Asexual, and Ally Pride Parade! It's going to be FABULOUS!

We will be doing a 30 minutes guided meditation on these concepts.

title: Bridges to Another Life
description:
"Exponentially accelerating technology, population and development imply that the vast majority of all technological progress has occurred within living memory, yet the basic template for industrial civilization hasn't changed much since Hiroshima.  Merely tacking organic food and  iPhone apps onto the suburban consumerism of the fifties sells both humanity and technology short.  Rather than leaping into the unknown however, or embracing an interested vision, most people rightly stock with what they know, even as it ceases to inspire, or even to make sense.  

Experimental communities can showcase the possibilities technology and abundance have made available, preparing the disaffected to make a shift from consumerism to more advanced forms of society. "
print_description: Reconciling the demands faced by businesses and communities enables us to disseminate cultures appropriate to current conditions.

title: Bubbles and Bass Sunrise Parties
description: We'll be rockin' you out from 5am til Noon, Wednesday through Sunday mornings, with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa and dance the AM hours away... and drink some bubbly while you boogie. We want to create a home of warmth and positive energy during the AM hours. Together with a team of artists, musicians, circus performers, dancers, planners, bartenders, builders, architects, thinkers, dreamers, and lovers, we are going to bring invigorating house music to the Burning Man community and a dance floor that gets everyone moving and shaking. We'll offer you champagne to relax and a comfy chill space to enjoy the sounds while resting your feet. We want to provide an environment conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, and energetically.

title: Bucky Ball Pit with VR: Fuller's Workbench
description: The Bucky Ball pit is inspired by the life and work of Buckminster Fuller, a Da Vince of the 20th century. Come have a ball and gain a deeper understanding of the fundamentals behind creating a future that “works for 100% of humanity, in the shortest possible time through spontaneous cooperation, without ecological offense or the disadvantage of anyone”. Immersive yourself in virtual reality and connect the dots/balls between your intuitive ideas around ecological/conscious design and the core principles of nature’s coordinate system. Play with and create your own models of synergetic structures. Learn how geodesic domes are made.
print_description: Explore nature's coordinate system and the work of Bucky Fuller, a DaVinci of the 20th century, in a ball pit and virtual reality experience.

title: Bucky Dome Open House
description: Check out this new method of dome construction that sets up in under an hour. Requires no tools, special skills, or strength to assemble. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by only two people.
print_description: Check out this new method of dome construction that sets up in under an hour. Requires no tools, special skills, or strength to assemble.

title: Buddhist Chanting: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
description: Join us in the Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). In the Lotus Sutra, Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, one can create a state of unshakable happiness. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting, together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions, and share experiences. Novices, new practitioners, and curious souls welcome.
print_description: Join us for gongyo: Chant the Lotus Sutra, discover your inner Buddha, and learn how to attain lasting happiness through Buddhism.

title: Burlesque Extravaganza
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation.

title: Burner Toastmasters Speak-A-Thon and Get Together
description:
Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We’ve got you covered. While there's some jargon in the notes below that our wannabe’s might not understand, we assume the Toastmasters folks will get it. And you will soon! Note:
Bring your TI Magazine and we’ll take pics over at the Man! If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Washington, DC, for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and some photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.
Looking to join in? Pepperland theme camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.
Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!
print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are U a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. A wannabe? Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!

title: Burning Camp Mazu Workshop
description:
Our theme camp work shop includes bua-buei ,message ,talisman and fortune stick.
Bua buei"
Bua-buei means throwing divine blocks.
Buei blocks are very common divination tools in Taiwanese temples,which are used in pairs and thrown to get a yes or no answer from gods.
They are made out of wood and carved into a crescent shape.Each block is round on one side (known as the Yin side) and flat on the other (known as the Yang side).
When throwing the blocks, there are three possible results: One block flat and another block round is a ‘yes’ answer.Both blocks flat is a “maybe” answer. Both blocks round is a ‘no’ answer.
​
"Fortune Sticks"
During a ritual, the querent will light an incense,
Bua-buei and accompanied by drawing fortune sticks to clarify an oracle.
​
"Talisman"
We will use talismanic stamp or giving an amulet to participant for good health and good luck.
The participant can get inked by a  Burning Mazu talismanic stamp, then enter ouracupressure massage dome.
print_description: Our Mazu theme camp is located at 8:00 Guild ,unique oriental activities are awaiting   .Our workshop will be at 3-6pm 7-10pm from 8/30 to 9/4,welcome

title: Burning Man and the Environment
description: Since 1991 on the playa Burning Man has evolved and innovated to protect the Black Rock Desert. Learn the history starting with the installation of the perimeter fence, fire blankets and evapotrons. When was the Leave No Trace protocol brought to the playa? When was the first year for the Burner Express buses?  What else is Burning Man doing to protect the Black Rock Desert and the planet?
print_description: Since 1991 BM has evolved & innovated to protect the Black Rock Desert. Learn this history with the installation of the fence, fire blankets, & more.

title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
description:
What: The Seventh Annual Burning Man Ultramarathon.

How: Pull on your running sneakers, grab a bottle of water or hydration pack, your favorite energy snacks, and hit the playa for one of the most unique and insane 50ks out there. Wear whatever you love best while running – whether that’s a tutu, sports bra and tights, or nothing at all.

Where: Black Rock City (Nevada – exact location info here)

When: Tuesday, August 30th, 2016, 5 a.m.

Who: You! Burners and ultrarunners of all types!

Why: Because it’s fun. Because it’s insane. Because it’s the ultimate high. Because you want to challenge yourself. Because we are working on really rad finishers’ presents! Because the race is a party! Because you don’t mind people chasing after you with bottles of whiskey while you run!

What else: Pink Lightning Camp will be the race headquarters, start, finish, and aid station. Stop by to view the big map, results, ask questions, use our foam rollers and running sticks, or just hang out with some friendly folks. During the race, we’ll have cocktails, fun, music, and lots of cheering. Have your friends come to the healthiest party on the playa! Come on by to volunteer, hang out, pace, or run!
print_description:
Come & run 50k (31 miles) around the playa for the funnest running ever!

Register on Mon if possible. Bring a gallon of water & snack to share!

title: Button Up!
description:
Missing from the printed manual so write us down and tell your friends!

You know those 2-inch, round lapel pins often used for political candidates and such? Ever wanted to make one with your own design? Well we’d love to help you realize that dream!

Button UP! camp has events on Tues and Thurs from 2-4pm, when you can come draw your own design or bring a small image you’ve printed (must be paper), and stamp it onto a pin.

We love having people come by, grab a drink, make a pin and stay for a chat so please put us on your calendar and come for a visit!

title: Camp To CampUS
description:
There are more than 50 million innocent displaced people that had to flee for war, poverty, injustice or climate change. The average stay of a refugee in a camp is 17 years. Since WWII the hosting and management of a refugee community in such camps has not changed. Till the day of today refugee camps are harsh survival environments where people risk exploitation, are hopeless and rules of the strongest apply. 

After being involved in the epicenter of the refugee crisis on the Greek island of Lesvos I came to the knowledge that there is such a big difference to be made in this global issue if we would stop seeing refugees, victims of injustice. Instead we should approach them as individuals with talents, opportunities equal to our own standards and with the same needs. We should be aware that if we would invest in people that have lost everything this investment will be returned to us in gratefulness and willingness to contribute in their own succes. You get what you give...

In creating communities that thrive you should start with environments that inspire. On Lesbos, the epicenter of the refugee crisis in Europe last year, I witnessed the similarities in dynamics between hosting refugees on a refugee camp and hosting a crowd on a music festival. We believe many insights from the festival industry can be integrated to redefine a refugee camp from a Spartan fashionlike environment to an inspiring festivallike experience.

Adding to the festival game innovative solutions/companies, educational programs and integration of the refugee community in the management and self-sustainability of their camp will create an environment of harmony and dignity that will be an example in how to change a global issue into an opportunity that can serve humanity on a global scale. 

Join me in this quest to redefine the global concept of a refugee camp to a campUS.
print_description: The outdated global model of a refugee camp needs to change from a Spartan fashion like to a festival fashion like environment.

title: Camp Yes Please Wearables Workstation

Come on down to Camp Yes Please at 8:15 & D, have a drink and get crafty with us. Whether you need a needle and thread, safety pins, a fabric patch, or hot glue, our F-it box has supplies you need to Fix or Finish your damaged or not-quite-playa-ready outfit. Or rummage through our treasure chest of trinkets to create your own playa-inspired jewelry. Our box is open anytime, and help is given to those who ask.

title: Cartooning & Rock Painting: 2 Ways to Rock Worlds
description:
* Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Rock painting is a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable pastime. Wed, Sat: 2-4PM.
Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
* Forged out of the eons of Deep Time and raw forces of Nature, a uniquely shaped and smoothed river stone awaits your unique curiosity in an ephemeral moment of creative exploration. We supply you with the stone, paint and guidance; you supply your awareness, vision, and imagination. Together on your planetary journeys, after 4.5 billion years you and the river stone meet. Silly or profound, the colors or imagery are all a part of the play on the Playa. Will your rock become a bug, a power object, a flower, or a psychedelic paisley? Experienced art teachers can help with color mixing, brush technique, and concept execution. Create a memory to keep or offer as a gift. Thurs: 3-5PM.
print_description: Do either or both! Learn & enjoy expressive skills: any level. It’s play. Basic or advanced techniques of powerful/fun art. Cartoon: W,Sa; Rocks: Th.

Each chakra will be referred to as if we were cats! For example when referencing the root chakra, she will guide the camp kitties to root their energy like a cat would stretching and/or climbing a tree. This will be a fun, interactive, and great exercise for the appreciation of cat energy and connecting with our mind, body, and souls. Me-Oum and Namaste

 After a Short intro and energizer we will dive into opening our bodies back up to joyful living.
 Walk away with new tools to use with yourself in stress, to use with others in your body work sessions."

title: Classical Concert at Sunset
description: Sunset, Wine, a blanket on the soft dust…and Live Classical music…what better way to start your evening!  BYO Blanket, BYO Wine, BYO Cheese, BYO Dessert, BYO date or friend…we provide the music and stage.  Reverbia's location on the Esplanade affords beautiful views of art and desert mountains…in a neighborhood where live music is respected by all thumping DJs…a place where you can actually hear the delicate of string and woodwind. This could be your chance to rekindle relationships, court a Burner for a first date, or just connect with good friends and family…perhaps even a sunset of self appreciation and silence...except for the music of Mozart and Debussy.  Enjoy your best wine…and maybe some light dinner along with that nice slice of Cheesecake you have been saving in the RV.  Manet's "Dejeuner sur l'Herbe"...BRC Sunset style!  Chamber music by Playa Pops members or TBA.

title: College Football Tailgate & Viewing Party
description:
Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams play on our three portable screens - we added one! This event has been a blast the last few years. Join us to celebrate the start of the season...bring some food & drinks to share...never graduate!

We'll begin the day by watching:
- 9:00 Hawaii at Michigan...wear your colors & Go Blue!
- 9:00 Oklahoma at Houston
[If the Michigan game is a blowout, then we may be able to show some of the Rutgers at Washington game at 11:00 am...we will at least show the 2nd half.]

At mid-day, the focus shifts to:
- 12:30 UCLA at Texas A & M
- 12:30 LSU at Wisconsin

Mid-afternoon, we'll show:
- 2:30 North Carolina at Georgia

The big late game will be:
- 5:00 USC vs Alabama
This game will end around 8:30 - 8:45...the Man Burn takes place at 9:30, so come prepared and be ready to bolt at the end of the game.

Bonus coverage:
- 6:00 Clemson at Auburn
This game will end as the Man Burn is underway...if you find a responsible fan, you may watch and shut down the Cafe.


Crazy, nutty bonus coverage on Sunday...hey, I don't make the schedule...we can only pray for a favorable outcome before the Temple Burn ;-)
- 4:30 Notre Dame at Texas

If you have a request for a particular college game, the management of the Harmonic Cafe will try to accommodate :-)
print_description: What...at BM?  Yes, it's a terrific party!  Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams.  Bring some food + drinks to share.  Never Graduate!

title: Come Make Pinhole Photographs with Pinhole Project
description: Remember that lesson in art class where you made a camera out of an oatmeal box? Pinhole Project invites you to check out our cameras, do an art tour, and make art on the playa!  Each year, we shoot, develop and fix about one hundred photographs on the playa each Burning Man. he Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
print_description: Check out our pinhole cameras, do an art tour, and make art. Head out for photo fun on the playa with Pinhole Project, we do pinhole photography!

title: Contact Improv : A Meditative Dance Technique
description:
Contact Improvisation is a meditative dance technique in which participants use points of physical contact to provide the starting point for exploration through movement. This contact can actually induce the production of a pair bonding hormone, called oxytocin, in the human brain, similar to how you feel when you hug or kiss a loved one. 

Through the sensation of touch and dance, you can explore organic movement generated through and with, one-another, forming new bonds and strengthening old ones.

Accompanied by a variety of musicians, this session will begin with some simple guiding prompts to help individuals become familiar with touching as well as giving/receiving weight. As the jam progresses individuals get to explore movement by listening and responding to their partner/partners through touch. There are no right or wrong answers and you do not need prior dance training to participate. 

The central characteristic of Contact Improvisation is a focus on bodily awareness and physical reflexes rather than consciously controlled movements.  Much like meditation, Contact Improvisational Dance seeks to honor the present moment by guiding the dancers to surrender what is happening now. 

“One learns to recognize and differentiate subtle impulses in our movement choices and our partner's choices. We begin to decipher the cues that we give and receive which tell us when to lead or follow, when to go up, when to go down, where to touch, how to lift, when to slow down, and when to be still. In this form one learns to stay in integrity with each choice, never forcing, never rushing. When Body, Mind, and Spirit are united in their instinctive wisdom one finds ones-self at home in every moment expressing ones true nature.”     

- Moti Zemelman
print_description: Through the sensation of touch and dance, we explore organic movement generated through and with, one-another.

title: Contraexpression
description:
Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? 
 Contraexpression is not passivity or the anti-expression; it’s 'contrary-expression' of any expressive stimulus, and it’s irresistible. There is no wrong way to do this.
 
 Open the door to your body to express the unimaginable. 
 
 In the experience, you will be guided through a passage in which you find your own way of moving the body. I don’t ask anyone to move their body in a rhythm, nor engage bodies, nor expect that all the people do the same action. People don’t need to follow a pattern or imitate; it’s experiential, there is no wrong way to do this. I give directions based on trust in the body, and what it can manifest. The person will discover how to adapt these directions to their understanding and needs. Maybe someone can move rapidly, maybe another can move slowly, or hardly at all — each one with their own development and course of action.
 
 This workshop focuses on the method of “The Unknown Theater” (El Teatro Desconocido) directed by Juan Carlos De Petre and developed over forty years by a group of people concentrated on exploration of subtle expression. The practice reveals knowledge; we start from the consciousness of not-knowing — ignorance is the beginning. This knowledge is experimental and creative; not intellectual, preconceived, acquired through repetition, or memory. Participants will work as a unique being, independent, and according to their own development. You can overcome intimidation and shame; discover empowerment, physical malleability, and grace.
print_description: Do you want to experience poetry of the body while hardly moving at all? There is no wrong way to do this.

title: Copassion: A Permanent Workshop — Nuptias
description:
We invite you to this workshop wedding, a wedding ceremony in real time, vows in conversation. 
　　
Be witnesses and contributors to a dialogue that began with a question: Can a couple be more free together than they can be apart?  To answer this it was necessary to find a new comprehension.  And we found a way that we call Copassion — our employer, a permanent workshop, a commitment to listen, follow change, a hermetic container for creation. 
　　
#clothing optional #nudist #naturist

title: Cosmic Chanting
description:
You probably know the Beatles song Tomorrow Never Knows, 
but you may not know that it was based on the Tibetan Book Of The Dead and that John Lennon imagined it as having thousands of monks chanting in the background. 

At this Temple event we will have everyone chanting Om Mani Padme Hum together for a while, then singing Tomorrow Never Knows along with the chant.  I have recorded a backing track for this event, so it is easier for us all to stay together in tempo and pitch, plus as a reminder for the song lyrics. But the most important audio at the event will be your voice!
print_description: We will chant Om Mani Padme Hum together and then combine it with "Tomorrow Never Knows", the Beatles song about the Tibetan Book Of The Dead.

title: Countless Carrot March
description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on Thursday September 1st to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes! It's time to claim our rights and the rights of all veggie-kind to be treated as the sentient beings we are. All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-6pm at the 4:30 Portal in the French Quarter before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group. Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!
print_description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes!  Meet @ French Quarter for pre-party and organizing.

title: Country Club Wine Tasting
description:
We're bringing the finest country club experience to Black Rock City! Relax in the comfort of our lawn chairs under the shade of the palm trees. Visit our wine bar to socialize with other high-class guests like yourself. If you're feeling energetic you can find a tee time at our challenging and memorable par-5 3-hole golf course. If you have any issues during your stay, our attentive staff and can help with any and all needs.

In terms of events, we'll have daily wine and cheese tastings at 9pm with the finest string cheeses, and canned cheeses paired with the most sought after wines cardboard boxes can deliver. Our talented playa sommeliers will guide our guests through a tasting experience and along with our fromagers lead a path to sensual nirvana. Honored guests to the Palm Tree Country Club will have the opportunity to personalize their own golf balls before teeing off on our 3-hole putt putt course, those personalized golf balls are then theirs to keep.
print_description: Hold onto your balls and enjoy our serene par 5 mini golf course all tee'd off with nightly wine tastings to lubricate the action

title: Craft cocktails at The Landing Strip, after sunset
description: Come enjoy craft cocktails made by a former Florentine bartender. Bring your flight- or travel-related kitsch, or show us your landing strip, or both! Our steamy-eyed bartender will ask you three either-or questions that reveal your true self, then serve you one of 8 top-shelf cocktails accordingly. You may overrule, but there will be consequences, such as body shots. Share your hilarious or hair-raising stories of international travel. We've been there and back again, have a billion of 'em. Introduce yourself to the Captain and you might get to see the cockpit! The party starts at sunset (around 7:40) and we'll be open at least an hour and a half. Find us on Italic between 4 and 4:30. In case we have to camp a block away, look for a sign with reflective tape indicating the vector for final approach. BYOC. See you there!
print_description: Our steamy-eyed Florentine barman will ask 3 questions, then serve a craft cocktail accordingly.  Travel themed, bring stories & your landing strip!

title: Creating a Community Synergy Engine
description:
" We know that co-creative tribes exist to facilitate the emergence of the next evolution of the human experience and to liberate global human thriving.  But what are the foundational elements that lead to an optimal community environment where members step into a self directed life in service to the whole?  How do we lead a society that feels overworked, overwhelmed, unfulfilled and disconnected to a human experience of autonomy, self mastery and purpose?

This panel will offer solutions to these questions and an outline that the RISE community is following in pursuit of its mission to liberate human purpose."
print_description: "How do we create a community synergy engine that unleashes the fullest expression of each individual’s highest purpose?

title: Creative Covalence
description:
"Begin with a tour of common design approaches and problems they present, followed with a brief description of Covalence and how it solves those problems.

Learn how to design with Fractal Graphs using Seeds and Core Axioms, then explore a practical example of Covalence in action with Emergence. 

Add depth with a thorough explanation of the Core Axioms of Covalence: Intentions, Relations, and Symmetries, and how Covalence is recursive in nature. 

End with a process exploration of Covalence: how the workshop itself came together using Covalence. Finally provide brief examples of Covalence observed at Burning Man and how participants can start identifying Covalence around them on the Playa. 

Q&A to Close
print_description: Transcend lateralization with Covalence: an ideation paradigm facilitating collaborative discovery with relational, intentional, and symmetric lensing

title: Creative Visualization: Picture your future
description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality. You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to it. The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "right". We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process. After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group. We look forward to sharing your future day together. Dr.Feelgood
print_description: Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future.

title: Cultivating Compersion
description: Compersion is the unique, positive emotion one feels when a loved one is experiencing joy or pleasure involving someone other than you. Come and explore, identify and unpack a range of emotions and beliefs about love and romance in this workshop. Compersion is a useful tool in all relationship styles – everyone is welcome.

title: Cultural Appropriation? Let's talk about it!
description:
Let's have a heart felt community conversation to reflect on our actions. To examine how to work towards right relationship with cultural traditions that aren't of our personal ancestry. 

•  Adornments and Healing Arts? Rituals & Spiritual Practices? Permaculture & Herbal Medicine? By engaging openly with sacred cultural traditions, are we unknowingly re-colonizing and harming oppressed people and cultures? (Cultural Appropriation). 

•  Do we know the true history of these traditions and peoples? Are they being oppressed? Are we benefiting? What questions can we ask ourselves? What can we do? 

 • What does it mean to decolonize ourselves and why is it important to talk about it? 

•  What hole are we seeking to fill? What is it about mainstream consumerist culture and our own histories of immigration, assimilation, and struggle that leave us seeking connection and wisdom from indigenous cultures?

Let’s reflect deeply from a place of love. Let's ask ourselves and each other these questions. Let's learn from the many resources available and talk about these complex issues that affect us all. Isn't it our shared responsibility to move towards right relationship for peace and freedom for all beings. Let's have these conversations ongoing, on and off the playa. Would love to see you!
print_description: How do we engage with the world’s cultural traditions? Are we respectful and conscious with these sacred practices and/or un-knowingly causing harm?

Ritual shamanic celebration- movement therapy to heal and free physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages. 
 through dance, breathwork. The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit.

experience ritual celebration in movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism. The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. In this Dancing Freedom journey YOU will be invited to explore the unique, dynamic, and interdependent qualities of each of the 5 elements. As we invoke these primordial forces, they awaken the dreamer within who can assist us to create a deeper relationship to our Selves, others, and our environment. Expect deep soul-filled bass, tribal beats, and a range of intuitively chosen music to guide you on our dance journey. Inspired by her experiences on dance floors around the globe, Hikari-jin has devoted her life to exploring what it means to use movement and ceremony for healing and transformation. a big screen under the stars.

title: DATA BASH!   Sex on the Playa
description: Sex on the playa? No, it’s not a rumor, it can happen. Learn about sexual experiences, sexual identities and sexual communities at Black Rock City with Hunter, a social psychologist studying sexuality at BRC with the Census Lab since 2012. Discover the predictors of sexual risk at BRC. Ask your questions about sex research at the Census Lab. And do all that while mingling with fellow Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.
print_description: Learn about sexual experiences, sexual risks and sexual communities at Black Rock City and discuss these topics, while mingling with fellow Nerds.

title: DATA BASH!   Transformative Experience
description: What do vampires have in common with durian fruit? How should we decide whether to undergo a radical personal transformation? Learn about the psychology and philosophy of transformative experiences on the playa and beyond with Molly, a psychologist studying social behavior at festivals, and Countess, an anthropologist working on the transformative power of play.
print_description: Learn about the psychology and philosophy of transformative experiences at the Burn, while mingling with fellow Burning Nerds & sipping mixed drinks.

title: DATA RELEASE BASH! Prelim 2016 Census Data Q&A
description: Are you curious to learn more about the participants who made up Black Rock City this year? Be the first to hear and ask questions about the results of our 2016 Random Sampling at the Gate and discuss our new findings with BRC Census leadership. We’ll also set time aside for a Q&A for participants who want to learn more about BRC Census’ history, methodology, and anything else attendees want to ask about.
print_description: Be the first to hear about the results of BRC Census’ 2016 Random Sampling efforts plus Q&A, while mingling with other Burning Nerds & sipping drinks.

title: David Bowie - Live Band!
description: Come hear Ziggy Playadust & the Seed Bugs from Sparks rock the music of Mr. David Bowie, live and in concert! We lovingly and faithfully play an all-Bowie set, with a full band of San Francisco-based musicians who loved the guy as much as you.  This is a high energy electric show. For die-hards, we'll pull out some obscure gems to go with the classics.  And, if we're lucky, we'll have a crazy interactive light show to boot!  Come by after sundown, before venturing out to wherever else...

title: Da Vinci Light Paintings/Psychedelic Photos!
description:
Have you always wanted to turn your beautiful personality and body into a colorful piece of art? Or maybe always wanted to embody the beautiful "Vitruvian Man" By Da Vinci And create an image of yourself with two Sets of Arms and legs in vibrant colors?  Do you feel like there are rainbows and colors exploding from your soul at all times? Are you a fan of trails of light, Rainbows, Psychedelic Visionary art, and interactive fun? Are you capable of staying still for around one minute? Then we have a gift for you!! Come on down to Camp HELLO!, We Love you! For a totally custom tailored Long-exposure photographic experience!
Our resident Light Painter Reid "Gadget" Dogpaw will be creating 100% Unedited 200%  awesome Light painting portraits for ALL of the awesome burners we can muster up! Pick a pose that represents WHO YOU ARE! Answer a few questions to help us get to know you and what you love, and FREEZE while we jump into action illustrating a world of color all around you while a camera captures it all! Images are FREE in FULL RESOLUTION to all participants! Let us paint your light for all to see and go home with a compressed slice of reality to remember your burn by! 
WHY YOU ASK!? BECAUSE HELLLOOOOOOOO! We Love you!! (duh)
 Images are printable up to 80" WIDE!! Checkout our album from the past few years here!
 http://www.bit.ly/wearemirrors
 Http://www.bit.ly/burnerpix
 Http://www.bit.ly/burnerpics

title: Developing "sense of place"
description: An investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. How do we Identify with where we are? In a globalized world it becomes easy to view the beauty and Majesty of a place as an observer. This workshop will give you tools to develop a "sense a place" through pattern identification to be present in mind, body, spirit and location. To understand and view the world as a series of patterns that apply anywhere is to unlock the language of the natural world.
print_description: An investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture.

title: Detangling Break Ups
description: Many of us have gone through a break up or multiple and some of those break ups are very entangled within your community of lovers. How do we detangle gracefully? How do we respect our other partners, lovers, wants and desires as we make transitions in our lives that hopefully result in healthy habits and no resentment! Many examples to share and lots of space for exploring ideas, sharing and hearing new ones! Come low key, decompress some thoughts, in an open safe space where we're here to listen. May result in a cuddle puddle.

title: Hypno Birthing - Charmaine Hamp
description: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth. I will talk about where pain in childbirth originated and how through our own awareness and education we can also have a birth with little to no pain. I will talk about the history of HypnoBirthing and how in its 25 year history it is now in over 40 countries astonishing and empowering woman everywhere to take back their power in motherhood. I will explain briefly the tools and the processes used from the breath work, meditation, self-hypnosis, and affirmations to achieve an easy, often pain free birth. I will also share the numerous benefits of this simple but super effective course! After all Birthing can be one of the greatest marathons of your life and you want to be prepared with some training, to feel proud of your results knowing you put in the work and did everything you could.
print_description: In this talk, I will unravel the idea that there has to be pain in Childbirth.

description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood). Bare your body, but wear lights! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is:) This is our only night event, but don’t worry about cold – movement will keep you warm!

title: Diversity at Burning Man
description: Diversity at Burning Man: Connecting to the Larger Global Community. Recently, Burning Man has been criticized for its homogeneous population and its increasing income disparity issue. Despite being widely recognized around the world by different ethnic groups, faiths, and sexualities, Burning Man struggles to achieve representative diversity. Disco Chateau celebrates diversity and would like to share inclusion practices that have worked for us, as well as welcome others from different camps to discuss what has worked for them. This talk will invite community leaders to discuss Default World and On Playa empowerment, for a more diverse, inclusive and representative tomorrow.
print_description: This talk will invite community leaders to discuss Default World and On Playa empowerment, for a more diverse, inclusive and representative tomorrow.

title: Divine Masculine & Divine Feminine Healing Circle
description:
Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring - witnessing. Women are inside - receiving. Love transforms all.

'The Divine Masculine and Feminine Healing Circle' is an event where the men of the playa are invited to step into their higher selves, and consciously hold the energy of the Divine Masculine. Josie Posie leads a ceremony where the women of the playa welcome the men lovingly at the entrance to the dome, inviting them to match the high vibration they hold. The dome becomes an Ancient temple space. The men then stand in a circle offering unconditional love and healing to the community of women who gather in the center. The women come for healing their trust of the Masculine and to receive their love. This is a hands-off workshop. There is no touching except optional hugging at the end. 

When men show up and become the pure presence of their Divine Masculine nature and truly witness them, then women can relax into their loving Divine Feminine nature and fully become that love. As both polarities do this, we transmute cultural wounds in the collective feminine and masculine for all of humanity, co-creating a needed and beautiful new balance.
print_description: Want to HEAL the rift between the Masculine and Feminine? In yourself and in humanity? Men create the outer ring -witnessing. Women are inside -being.

Be prepared to be led through a few sensual exercises where clothes will remain on and personal space respected.

title: DragonCamp Armory Bikini Shop
description:
Come to DragonCamp Armory to make your own Sexy Armor Bikini to wear and share on the Playa! We will teach you simple traditional hand working metal skills to cut, shape, and hammer aluminum into a sexy bikini bra and/or bottom. Decorate with bits of jewelry to personalize yours. Tie with leather thong for a secure fit.  
These are the same metal shaping skills that craftspersons used in Da Vinci’s time to create beautiful works of art. Wear and share yours here at Burning Man! Allow about 2 hours for completion. Come early- limited supplies. Feel free to bring any small or broken baubles, earrings, etc.  to donate or help decorate bikinis with. 

Your partner can come watch, but this is primarily  a workshop  to empower women to learn to use simple hand tools to release their inner creativity. Costumes like this cost $$$ when purchased.  Make it as sexy as you dare. Yours is free to keep, and you'll be proud to wear it! Since each piece is custom formed for you, it will fit perfectly- large or small. And yes, it is cool, light and comfortable- even on the playa.

(As an added bonus, "Sunny" our resident body painter will also be on hand to offer body decoration if anyone who wants to wear even less!)
print_description: Come to DragonCamp Armory to make your own Sexy Aluminum Armor Bikini to keep, wear and share on the Playa! We will teach you how! Mornings daily.

title: DUST-ed
description: DUST-ed is a new educational program presented by PlayaSkool, the co-founders and creators of TEDxBlackRockCity.  Have you ever really fucked something up but learned a shit ton from the experience?  Startups, projects, businesses, relationships . . . we all take it in the kisser sometimes.  Quite often, these "interruptions" can lead to amazing breakthroughs in business, life and relationships.  We want to focus on some of the biggest and most amazing stories from within the Black Rock City community where citizens overcame adversities only to thrive in the the wake of failure.  Come and SHARE with us!

title: Dying with time to spare: A nomad's journey home
description:
A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.
In many cultures death is seen as the unknown, the point at which it is difficult to determine what happens next. Will death be the end of life? The pain experienced in the lead-up to death or the manner death is portrayed may have lasting impressions on how we determine our own death. If death is a passage and a natural step, like a leaf that falls and disintegrates into the earth, how do we best prepare to be ready, at a moments notice to fall onto earth, without a shred of remorse, guilt or unpacked potential? This workshop is about giving yourself a chance to look deeper into death with a clean slate. Determine your own method to prepare for death and live life with an openness to dying. The heart-opening exercises are done alone, and with the group using resonance tuning, energy-centering and creative visualisation. Raise your consciousness!  with Tia Kansara
print_description: A deep dive into death, suffering and challenging fate through simple physical practices - opening the heart and accepting what life has to give.

title: Dynamic Meditation
description: Self-development guru OSHO designed active meditations to amplify, release, and and re-activate. The Dynamic Meditation is his most intense experience, involving a breath of fire, intentional madness, hopping, chanting, and total stillness. Face your demons head-on and you will reap the rewards. What better place to go a little crazy than Black Rock City? Nick Meador is fully trained to hold the container for you to go deep and have a transformational experience.
