title: Elephant Expressions
description:
A ten part, ten year art project based on the Ten Principles of Burning Man.  This year, in name of "Radical Self Expression" we sent out five hundred vinyl toy elephants to kids all over the world and asked them to express themselves by decorating them.  We are then taking those elephants and displaying them at Burning Man under The Man as part of the Guild Workshops piazza.
Our aim is to bring awareness of the importance of creativity in a child's life. Lack of funding has stopped art programs in many public schools across the country. We are figuratively and literally putting the crayon back in the child's hand. We are also bringing 10,000 elephants to the playa this year and letting burners express themselves by decorating the elephants, and gifting them to fellow burners. 
We chose to create a vinyl elephant for the kids to decorate because of the elephant's outstanding memory. We are building positive experiences in children that we want them to remember for a lifetime. 
We also sculpted the elephant into the shape of the Vitruvian Man, as a wink to this year's Burning Man theme.
print_description: Radical Self Expression, 10,000 Elephants to decorate, gift, take home and get creative with. Come visit us under the man and Express yourself.

title: Embodied Intimacy
description:
"Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we are slowing down, and we are being together just as we are. As we slow down and link up breath and sound we create all these exquisite feedback loops- body to body, belly to belly, heart to heart, and we invite each other into more and more presence, trust and relaxation.

Embodied Intimacy guides everyone gently from a state of separation and isolation towards safety and oxytocin fueled connection. The result is a simple felt presence, real time intimacy and heartfelt shared truth. The story and drama of the mind subsides and a new level of being is found in its place. In-To-Me-I-See. Sound by Sound, sigh by sigh, breath by breath it all unfolds, melts and unwinds. At the speed of love we learn how to live from the wisdom of our heart instead of the worry of our minds.
"
print_description: Embodied Intimacy is relational breathing meditation cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now.

description:
"Most people think hypnosis is swinging watches and parlor tricks, instead it is a powerful, complementary tool that you can use to explore creative worlds and even facilitate a dramatic healing. 
In a single Hypnosis session, one can ramp up pleasure, boost confidence, and even explore a kink in a way that requires no expensive props, gear, or flashy costumes- just your imagination! You can also ignite passion, dissolve shame, manage PTSD, or dive into even more elaborate erotic exploration.  It is possible to shape shift, time travel, change your age or status, safely feel fire, and even go against the laws of physics. Are you Captain F*cking America, a pink purring sexy kitten, or galavanting in Medieval times wielding your sword while riding a Pegasus? Yes! Anything is possible here!
Through Hypnosis we can travel far out into imaginary places, safely remove emotional blockages, as well as shift negative patterns and limiting beliefs that prevent our clients from having the intimate lives that they crave.

title: Evolution or Escapism
description: The Playa makes us into human poems. We enter a dream state and leave deeply changed. But do we want to change the world? Burning Man is promoted as cultural evolution. Yet there's a growing debate on the role of class, accessibility and if the Burn is just escapism. How do we make this Renaissance into a Revolution? How can we all write this poem?
print_description: Burning Man is promoted as cultural evolution. Yet there's a growing debate on the role of class, accessibility and if the Burn is just escapism.

title: Evolved Masculine Leadership
description:
Are you creating a large ripple in the world? Gather w other men committed to creating global transformation through living their purpose. Your intelligence, your strength & your leadership skills are needed. Now more than ever. 

You will be guided through a process that I have been cultivating for more than seven years to help you gain crystal clarity on the man that you must become to naturally, even easily bring your great vision into reality. 

We will explore different aspects of what Evolved Masculine Leadership looks like, and how to step into it even more powerfully to both bring forth your great vision and become a role model of the Evolved Masculine that the world is calling forth for now more than ever before.

title: Expansion of Love through Human Connection
description:
Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.

"When yin and yang (or masculine and feminine) come together, it produces energy. Often, that energy is sexually directed. Combustion happens, but usually from the loins. This is part of our “animal / darwinian” nature. Nothing wrong with it per se – it is part of who we are. It is how the human race continues. 
 
 And, we are more.
 
 This powerful energy can also be directed up and through the heart. And when it is, that force of energy has the power to soften the heart and break through walls we may have built up around it (fear, resentment, grudges, and other things that keep us from feeling our own Divinity). If the heart is open and cleansed, energy can move into that space. When it does, it creates a pleasure that makes sex seem rather mundane. The energy gets transmuted into spiritual power and ecstasy – Pure Love.
 
 In this workshop, we will use the power of yin and yang, platonic (non-sexual) touch and loving friendship to soften, expand and ignite the heart with Pure Love.
 
 Using the Light of our eyes and the Energy that moves through our hands and hearts we will connect with each other, swim in Love and glorify the Divinity within our hearts."
print_description: Use the power of platonic (non-sexual) touch to transmute sexual energy into spiritual power – Pure Love.

title: Experience Channeling Authentic Expression
description:
"Focusing on communication through voice and movement, performance and flow- an interactive workshop of playful exploration that results in deeply powerful embodiment.
An improvisatory opera singer and performance artist, Amanda Gregory (Xeno Glossya) guides the participants through unique exercises that unlock authentic expression and create the experience of true awe in your friends and/or audience. 
This workshop reveals the golden ticket to “Life is a Stage.”  With newfound facility to calibrate audience and harvest creative potential, participants will discover how to fully surrender into the here and now with effortless performance agility.  
Attendees will gain tools in creating those quintessential jaw-dropping moments one never forgets, with an ever expanding ability to channel archetypes with voice, movement, and being.
And finally- unbridled embodiment.  Paired with heightened listening and awareness, your performance and interactions will profoundly impact your internal experience, and connections with others. "
print_description: Through voice and movement, performance and flow-a workshop of playful exploration resulting in deeply powerful embodiment. Led by improv opera singer

title: Experience Deep Time on the Playa Bike Tour
description: This is your opportunity to contemplate Deep Time while on the playa. Your journey will be led by geology experts Drs. Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) and John Dilles (Oregon SU).  Bike to the outer playa to contemplate the history of this place we call home, from the deep time geologic framework to the ice ages, first human inhabitants in the region, post-glacial warming and the raw chant and inexorable warming of the Anthropocene era.  Burn baby burn!  P.S. Deep Time = Geologic Time.
print_description: Deep Time = Geologic Time. A geology bike tour field trip lead by 2 geologists, Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) & John Dilles (Oregon SU).

title: "Exploring Connections" Level 1 ACROVINYASA™
description:
Tuesday 7/30
10-11:30am
Universe University presents:
"Exploring Connections" a level 1 ACROVINYASA™ class with Eudaimonia Yoga
Broaden the understanding and connection of self with this dynamic practice. Jordan Goff and Antonella Zabaglio will lead you into a self aware and conscious place with a solo practice, then join forces with your new yogi friends as we take poses from earth to air in this practice of trust and community. No yoga experience or partner required, just bring an open mind and playful heart!
print_description: Discover self awareness with your yogi friends Jordan and Antonella while taking poses from earth to air in a practice of trust and community.

title: Exploring Conscious Touch
description:
"We are all yearning for greater connection, yet often find ourselves lacking a place where we may explore while having our boundaries honored in each moment.
 
 Come co-create this special evening where we will be invited to find our ease in connection.
 
 Touch is a place where we as humans are often feeling a lack, but have an edge around asking for what we may desire or need. 
 
 Let us create a container where all may be witnessed in their desire. A container where guilt, shame and fear around giving and receiving touch may be stripped away. Where we simply interact with consciousness and choice and that each honoring of another further honors ourselves.
 
 We will begin with a simple ceremony of seeing and being seen, so that we may drop into presence with one another. 
 
 From there we will co-create our agreements and boundaries for the evening. Then we will engage in some guided massage, so that no one needs worry about skill or technique. We can all learn and explore together.
 
 Elemental massage is a beautiful way to welcome our bodies and explore differing kinds of activating and sensation touch.
 
 Know that you may choose to participate with a particular partner. All boundaries around partnership, touch and clothing will be honored. 
 
 This is an evening of self-exploration, opening to our natural touch-positive nature in a way which is intended to open more pathways to self-love."
print_description: Practice energetic and physical touch with guidance including Elemental Massage

title: Eye See Astrology & Tea
description:
Come visit Eyes of the Soul and allow former professional make-up artist, Julie Klass, work on enhancing one of the most amazing elements the universe has ever created  ……… YOUR EYES. 
Often called the windows to your soul, we believe your eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes, and allow your inner beauty to shine through!
While Julie works on your eyes, we will complete an Astrology reading based on both your main Astrological sign and your Rising sign. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for you at Burning Man.
In addition to the make-up and Astrology readings, we will immerse you with a calming and reflective environment using natural wind chimes and aroma therapy. Based on some simple questions, we will try to assess your personal mood, tastes and physical needs. We will suggest some remedies using over (30) of the finest grade natural oils. We will suggest a combination of remedies that may include taste, touch and smell to help you rejuvenate.

You will also be served a relaxing organic herbal tea.

Eyes of the Soul wants you to feel even better than felt when you arrived. We are happy to send you out to the playa refreshed, rejuvenated, and better equipped to deal with the elements
print_description: Take a breather while we pamper you! Amazing eye enhancement, astrology reading, and organic herbal tea. We look forward to making you feel loved!

title: Feldenkrais-Easing playa pains
description:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains? 

Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing. It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and joy. Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one. 

The perfect way to rejuvenate your tired playa body
print_description:
Through gentle, subtle movement sequences, the method helps us restore our inner alignment, balance, and symmetry.

Please bring a yoga mat

title: Feldenkrais— Opening your Heart
description:
At the seat of our souls, core to all of our ambition and desire lies our heart. The heart is the center of our love, compassion, forgiveness and inner peace.
 
 We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson that will help us to open our hearts and connect more deeply with our bodies.
 
 The Feldenkrais method emphasizes the connection between the mind, body, and spirit. Though gentle, relaxing, non-impactful movement sequences along with inspirational meditation, you will leave the day standing straighter and taller and with your shoulders falling back behind your chest, hence allowing you to lead with your heart as you walk forward into the world.
 
 Think of Feldenkrais as meditation with movement! 
 
 If you are experiencing any pain, you might find it improve or resolve throughout the class. Feldenkrais helps with the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns.
 
 As we radiate more love out into the world, the world can’t help but smile back. And with that, only magical shifts can follow.
print_description: We will begin this class with a heart opening meditation followed by a Feldenkrais lesson. Please bring a yoga mat

Find Your Power Animal. Wake up the shaman in you. What wants to happen now? Ask your spirit guide. Transformation. Healing. Wisdom of circle healings, no guru. Hollow Bone. You are the one you have been waiting for. DIRECT ACCESS TO SOURCE. Eye Gazing gets connected. Paired journies get you empowerment and feedback and confirmation that you are SHAMANISTA. That your own healing modality discipline can segue to shamanism actions with protection, channeling spirit, getting on your mountain, getting in right relation.
 The lynchpin of shamandome sooooo many come for this. eyegaze then paired journies then share.  Time for one more journey you invent that seems timely: “heart/mind/sex connection. Incarnation. Best playa week is….”
>> BONUS EVENT AT SHAMANDOME:  Want an Opportunity to create your Spirit/Power Animal in art after your Shamanic Journey ?
Something insists on artistic expression from your Shamanic Healing?
Want to manifest your Inner World and make the Invisible Visible?
Provided: pencils, pens, paper, colored pens, sculpie, pastel chalk, oil pastels, colored paper.
Create an image or picture of your power animal
or something else that you “saw”, “felt” or “heard” while Journeying.
Art Experience provided after the Shamanic Journeying to Find Your Power Animal…

title: Fine French Dining at the Cafe
description: Imagine it: Uniformed waiters with french accents. White linen table cloths. Crystal Chandeliers. Escargot on the menu. Join us for our nightly dinner full of delicious food and good company. Delight your palate and surprise your senses. But this year, we are not taking reservations mon ami. No my friend, you will have to find the maitre D in the streets before dinner to obtain a ticket. Be warned, I hear he is a picky fellow. You'll want to do what he asks though- we guarantee an evening you will not forget.

title: Fingerpring Readings with kismet
description:
Arrive on time and Kismet will look at your fingerprints and identify your Life School.  Your finger prints hold the encoding of your life school....the base learnings you are are meant to take from this lifetime. Schools: Love, Service, Peace Wisdom
---The purpose? To help you better understand your self, so you can make better decisions in how you process your life experience.

Your heart line speaks about your relationship style: Big Heart, Hermit, Passionate, Romantic Idealist.
Arrive on time and Kismet will look at your hands and identify your school and your heart line then give a group explanation of what it means for you.  
The Purpose?  To help you better express yourself and be understood so you have happier healthier relationships.

We intend on being involved, participate and to keep contributing to the Burning Man community. 
As the time goes on, we make enormous efforts to make our community grow , during the event and throughout the rest of the year.

Come join us and share with us your experiences from the playa!

This year we have decided to join forces with The Yard to make this event even more extravaganzous.

title: FOMO: Impacting decision making for centuries.
description:
"The fear of missing out (FOMO) is a new name for a concept deeply embedded in human nature: that by choosing to do something we're going to miss out on something else that is even better.  In cognitive psychology FOMO is known as loss aversion.  Loss aversion refers to people's tendency to strongly prefer avoiding losses to acquiring gains. Most studies suggest that losses are twice as powerful, psychologically, as gains.  Basically FOMO is the losing out on what others are currently experiencing and valuing it higher than the gain of your current experience.  An early example of FOMO comes from Tulipmania in Holland in the 1590s.  Seeing and hearing others buy into the promises of tulip profitability encouraged others to do the same. Nobody wanted to be the one missing out. 

When you lose something it hurts and often to avoid this negative emotion strange behavior may occur. This talk will give insight into why FOMO occurs and illustrate that it happens not only to Millennials anxious about what experiences their peers are having, but also to those making business and investment decisions.
print_description: Come explore how the fear of missing out (FOMO) and how it manifests in cognitive psychology, investment decisions, and personal relationships.

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description:
Now that Burning Man has become a maker fair under the aegis of the Renaissance Faire, there is a lot more than the usual dust up over the direction and identity of this quaint event in the Nevada desert. This year’s dust shall be comprised of marble, sandstone, oak, and pewter, a highly controversial mixture never before introduced to the Black Rock desert. Because they don’t mess around when it comes to preserving intact the native chemical profile of the immediate environment of the Black Rock desert, the Bureau of Land Management has mandated extra precautions for 2016. As such, the BLM has required that BMOrg retain the services of the French Maid Brigade. It’s nothing we wouldn’t be doing anyway. 

Rendezvous with us! You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. Join us in uniform with your surly attitude and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
print_description: Da Vinci’s Workshop is a dusty mess. Join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and your worst possible French accent.

your dancing shoes and lingerie for the party that follows. Perfect.
print_description: Ain’t no challah-back girl: Bring a plate and friend, because we’re servin’ up French toast for brunch with the legendary Dust City Diner.

Get your groove on, embrace your inner joy, and remember why you came out into the dust.

title: Friendship Ceremonies!
description:
Shouldn’t other forms of relationships and partnerships be honored as highly as we honor romantic partnerships? What if Friends could get "Friendgaged"? What if they could commit to each other in ceremony? Wouldn't it be a better world if Friends more often expressed their dedication and love to one another?

Friendlandia is a place to celebrate new and long-time Friendships in a ceremony by sharing vows, exchanging Friendship Bracelets, and expressing love for the non-romantic relationships in your life. Come have a ceremony at our Temple built by Zonotopia creator Rob Bell to celebrate your Friendship and become BFFs--Burner Friends Forever.

title: Geometrical Constructions
description:
The Rhombohedron Society is about  exploring the world of cubic symmetry. The lesson being taught by the Society is about the unifying properties of the rhombic dodecahedrton. This includes finding and learning about the how the lost triangle of Pythagoras defines the slopes of the faces of cubic polyhedra. 

Within the space are four areas. The primary workshop/classroom includes seating and work tables where visitors will learn about the Lost Triangle and make a Lost Triangle template to take with them. Visitors also will have the opportunity to learn more about geometry by assembling small scale models.

There will be a dome with built in seats and a transparent skin being used for 24/7 multi-media presentations, and the Gypsy Wagon and car “SV 3 Rose” all made in plywood with integral slotted and notched connections, more whimsical creations as if from the mind of Leonardo.
print_description: The Rhombohedron Society invites you to explore the world of cubic symmetry. Learn about the Lost Triangle of Pythagoras and the Rhombic Dodecahedron.

title: Getting The Head You Want
description:
Dan Savage says “oral is standard; any model that doesn’t include it should be returned to the factory”.  But what if you like the model?  Mostly.  Just that this one feature needs enhancement?  Or what if oral just never seems to be part of the picture?

Let’s change that situation!

Men, there are things YOU can do to:

•	Help your partner be more comfortable going down on you.
•	Help your partner be more WILLING to go down on you
•	Help your partner learn how to pleasure you better.

Come learn tips to increase the likelihood of your getting the oral sex you fantasize.

And, women, if you’d like to be more comfortable going down on your partner - or if you have a pet peeve that you’d like to share so men know to NEVER do that thing you hate -  come join the discussion.  Here’s a chance to ask question and share feedback.

This is a discussion-only event.  No live demos.  Singles welcome. Ages 21 and up, with ID.

title: GGG: Dominatrix for Dummies w/Eleanor O’Brien
description: By turns raunchy, hilarious and heartwarming, “GGG: Dominatrix for Dummies” is Eleanor O’Brien’s (Dance Naked Productions) solo show about training to be a dominatrix in New York City.  Deliciously funny and unabashedly graphic, O’Brien portrays an unforgettable cast of sex workers and clients.  Far from a simple guide to whips and chains, there is a love story woven into the fabric of the S&M adventure.   From the agony of junior high dances to the inner sanctum of a professional dungeon, enemas to ecstatic dance (including a cameo from Gabrielle Roth), GGG: D4D explores what it means to fall in lust with yourself!

title: GINGER APPRECIATION PARTY
description: Many rumors exist about redheads. Having been described as gods, vampires, premium-valued slaves, as well as being emotionally un-housebroken, lustful, promiscuous and wanton. This is a party celebrating redheads, "the MC1R gene", "the firecrotch" and those bespeckled with freckles in all their glory! Redheads are less than 3% of the global population. Here, they become the 99%. Bigger, better and redder than last year, still serving “redheaded sluts". Starts some time around sun down, when the sun hits the mountains and the UV drops. and remember.. only a ginger can call another ginger, ginger.
print_description: Bigger, better and redder than last year, still serving “redheaded sluts".  The annual party in honor of the MC1R gene.  Party with other REDHEADS

>^.^< This event is held in honor of Gizmo kitty, one of the best kitties that ever lived!!!  He passed away in February of this year and I know he would want us to drink in his honor!!! >^.^<

title: Going Backwards to Go Forward
description: We will explore ideas and items from the past that can be used today to help us live a more sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage. The universe is preparing you for something much greater and like a sling shot, it’s going to shoot you forward, but you just have to move backwards for a little bit. “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” ~Albert Einstein . Mike BIlbo, LNT master with anti-plastic blogger activist, Beth Terry.

title: Gonzo Communications: Hunter Thompson & Activism
description: Based on the book "Dear Dr. Thompson:  Felony Murder, Hunter S. Thompson and the Last Gonzo Campaign" about my work with gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson to free a young woman from prison for a crime she obviously did not commit. This talk illuminates another side of the author as an activist--not about the guns and drugs. This is an educational talk about why America should abolish the Felony Murder statue which can hold people accountable for crimes they had no intention of committing. But most importantly it is about the lessons I learned from Hunter Thompson as his colleague and how a simple letter can change a person's life.
print_description: Why America should abolish the Felony Murder statue which can hold people accountable for crimes they had no intention of committing.

title: Guided Third-Eye Meditation
description: Come harness you inner unicorn and send bright white light out to the Burning Man community through a focused 30 minute guided meditation. We will work towards quieting the mind so we can better hear our intuitions speak to us and do exercises that will wake up the third eye and help your unicorn horn grow! All experience levels welcome; beginners, have no fear! Led by Hannah (aka Cowboy) RYT, Certified Meditation Instructor.
print_description: Come harness you inner unicorn and send bright white light out to the Burning Man community through a focused 30 minute guided meditation.

title: Guild Workshops Masquerade Procession & Opening
description:
Guild Workshops Masquerade Procession & Grand Opening

All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Guild Workshops in the piazza at the Man Base! Join us as we celebrate the confluence of artists, makers, tinkerers, and craftspeople from across the world! Among these modern day maker spaces conceived in the spirit of the Renaissance you’ll find glassblowers, blacksmiths, dreamers, chainsaw-wielding portrait makers, musicians and engineers all beckoning your hands on participation in their craft!

The festivities will kick off with a costumed masquerade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere/Artery Pavilion (6:15 and Esplanade) and leading into the Guild Workshops at the Man Base, where our Guild Workshops Celebration will begin at 6:30 pm. Please don your Renaissance-inspired finery or just come as your creative self! 

► Burning Man 2016: Da Vinci’s Workshop
bit.ly/GuildWorkshopsInfo
► 2016 Man Pavilion and Guild Workshops
http://bit.ly/GuildWorkshopsList
► Da Vinci’s Workshop Guilds : Burning Man 2016 Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/BurningManGuilds
print_description: Don your Renaissance finery for the parade, then participate with our global community of Guilds: artists, dreamers, makers, tinkerers & craftspeople.
other_location: Procession from Everywhere/ARTery Pavilion to The Man Pavilion

title: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings
description: Leonardo knew about many of the uses of hemp ...  It's a soil remediator and one of the fastest growing, most useful biomass crops for manufacturing that you can farm.  Industrial hemp fibre crops harvest high volumes of carbon very quickly, so farming and building hemp housing is a very effective way to store carbon - each build locks up tonnes of it. The buildings are also thermally effective so you have reduced operational energy costs. The broad opportunities for value adding to fibre crops mean that wherever communities work together with farmers, they can potentially create major positive change.
print_description: Harvesting carbon and storing it in hemp buildings - communities leading change: Klara Marosszeky

title: Healing and Intimacy— With Your Clothes ON
description:
"Learn to give and receive Thai Yoga bodywork, in which compassionate intention, energetic connection, and deep physical (but nonsexual) intimacy converge to produce a profound state of relaxation, rejuvenation and well-being. Bring a partner or find one there!
 
 Rhythmic movement and deep pressure help stimulate the body's own healing processes. The receiver remains clothed; no oils are used. 
 
 One partner receives while the other gives; halfway through the workshop we switch so that each gets a turn.
 
 We focus on the essential core elements of safe and effective bodywork: Intention, Connection, Safety, and Self-care. The Thai yoga bodywork sequence used is a slow-moving, simplified yet effective sequence. Poses can be modified as needed to accommodate individual differences. No prior yoga or bodywork experience needed!"
print_description:
"Learn Thai Yoga bodywork, healing through touch.
 Dance-like movement and deep nurturing contact stimulate the body's own healing processes."

title: Healing Foot Wash
description:
Come sit in our comfy chairs and relax for the best foot wash you've ever been given.  We supply everything needed. Bring your dusty feet and smile.

For the fourth year in a row Healing Foot Wash is coming again to Burning Man!  Find us on Rod's Road and take a load off your feet for a few minutes.  We follow a simple 4 step process:
1) Diluted vinegar to neutralize the alkaline dusty pH
2) Diluted Dr. Bronner's soap to release the dust
3) Pure water rinse
4) Dry feet and apply foot lotion

Sit and enjoy the attention in our open shade structure and chat for a while.  We're totally family friendly and welcome participation in foot washing.

Our 1 rule:
You can only wash feet after you've had your feet washed.

Come by and say hi! :)
print_description: Come sit in our comfy chairs and relax for the best foot wash you've ever been given.  We supply everything needed. Bring your dusty feet and smile.

title: Healing Herbal Facials

We will use a variety of herbs (i.e. calendula, rose, thyme, comfrey) to heal and soothe dried out and tired skin. Step #1: warm facial tea to clean away the playa and hydrate the face. #2: Exfoliating mud and herb mask to draw out dirt and impurities. #3 Homemade herbal toner to tighten and tone your tissues. #4 Herbal infused oil to seal in the moistening healing properties of the herbs.

description:
Arrive on time and Kismet will look at your hands and identify your school and your heart line then give a group explanation of what it means for you.  
Your heart line speaks about your relationship style: Big Heart, Hermit, Passionate, Romantic Idealist.

The Purpose?  To help you better express yourself and be understood so you have happier healthier relationships.

Your finger prints hold the encoding of your life school....the base learnings you are are meant to take from this lifetime. Schools: Love, Service, Peace Wisdom
---The purpose? To help you better understand your self, so you can make better decisions in how you process your life experience.

title: Heart opening Vinyasa flow yoga
description:
Heart opening Vinyasa flow. Share the transformative, life-enhancing joys and benefits of Vinyasa flow yoga, so burners can leave class uplifted, rejuvenated, and with greater overall well-being. 

Instructor: Javiera Kostner. Javiera is a Yoga Alliance certified Yoga teacher (RYT 200). Yoga changed her life, easing anxiety and enabling her to reconnect to the present moment, while creating balance and greater awareness in her body, mind and spirit. Her classes are lighthearted, with an emphasis on moving with the breath and intelligent alignment. Combining flowing sequences with gentle inner inquiry, students are encouraged to explore their organic experiences to strengthen, open, and balance the body and mind.

title: Heart Tribe Healing Sanctuary
description:
Calling all healers and people wanting to receive healing!
Mindful, sacred, expansive, divinely inspired healing energy flowing through and around us at the Heart Tribe Healing Sanctuary. Massage, reiki, and more. 
Daily Healing Sanctuary opens at 2pm with a group meditation to ground intentions and enhance energies.
If you have healing that you want to share, come flex your healer muscles in the intense playa energy! You're bound to get an upgrade!
If you need healing, come on by during Healing Sanctuary hours (2-6pm starting Thursday) and feel divinely guided healers working on and through you for the benefit of all beings. 
Healing volunteers - healing shifts are from 2-4pm and from 4-6pm starting Tuesday.
All healing modalities are welcome! 
A sacred and safe place to connect and flow some good energy. If you're feeling the call, then follow it - no coincidences here!

description: Calling all metal heads! We all love the oonz oonz oonz electronic sounds of the playa but sometimes you  need a break from the endless beat of the electronic drum.  Metal heads rejoice, HEAVY METAL HAPPY HOUR is here to provide you with heavily distorted guitars, face melting riffs and the baddest breakdowns ever chopped with an axe.  Camp SLAYER will be serving up Heavy Metal themed drinks, such as our world famous extra spicy raining "Raining Blood(y Mary)" and many more.  Stop by for a stiff drink, bang your head to the heaviest metal on the playa and play the NAME THAT GUITAR SOLO quiz for prizes and glory.  Bar closes at 6:66 pm daily (7:06 for the layman).

title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thoughts inward for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make a brighter, better, and more enjoyable future through this tea ceremony.
print_description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony.

title: Heroes & Super Villains Soul Brunch
description:
Soul Brunch isn't just a party; it's like the backyard barbecues of home. It's like the cookouts of our yesteryears. As your families invited your communities over, as the generations of soul families invited their communities over, so too does the Heroes & Super Villains family invite the Playa community over to eat together, drink together, get to know one another, dance with each other and uplift each other. From noon until sunset, our trained chefs serve up the freshest breakfast burritos on the Playa, accompanied by professionally made craft cocktails. Our collection of international DJs spin smooth beats until nightfall.

We also give revelers a chance to clean up with our Soul Power Showers; guests experience the rebirth and rejuvenation of cool, cleansing water sprayed forcefully from our pressurized washer system (imagine a water saving car wash inside our shower areas for guests). Baptised anew, heroes set out on their way spreading positive vibes.

On it's 11th Annual Celebration of the Soul Brunch, we were gifted curated sounds from Marques Wyatt, Paul Geddes, Deep Wood, Rafael de la Cruz, David Kiss, Big Daddy & more!



https://www.amplfy.me/video/oQDJKzBew
print_description: Music, Breakfast Burritos & drinks make this the best Friday on the Playa!

title: Himalayan Singing Bowls:> Oceanic Subconsciousness
description:
Sonic painting of sweet overtones by a choir of Antique Bowls in true harmony with self.  
Namaste dear Human Beings. Take a dive inside the sonic painting of sweet overtones produced by the choir of Antique Himalayan Singing Bowls. 
Receive a well-deserved deep healing as you walk on your path. The hypnotic sound of True Harmony will help you burst open your Heart, heal your Soul from past traumas, refresh your Optimal Body and clear your ever expanding Mind for Wisdom from the Universe. 
Absorb the energy of the highest quality instruments. Experience a deep connection with Singing Bowls played by the hands and soul of a man that deeply respects and knows how to communicate with them.  
Facilitators: Guy Yair Beider  and Clara Zoharsky
print_description: Sonic painting of sweet overtones by a choir of Antique Bowls in true harmony with self.

title: Holistic Vinyasa Flow
description:
Come embrace the community with the healing energy of yoga! As we rise into the morning light with a gentle loving flow for our soul and a restorative stretching session for our bodies, dirty toes and all.
We make way for our hearts to expand and love on ourselves as well as one other. Let us cultivate what it is to be raw and to be human. Let us manifest light into our world that brings hope for restoration.
We are all a beautiful piece of artwork intertwined and woven together meant for connection within nature and its elements.
Grounding in with Mother Earth, we will find ourselves in a peaceful meditation that prepares our inner being for the present moment.
print_description: Come revive yourself with the morning sun! Let us embrace our community and Mother Earth with the healing energy of yoga!

title: Ho‘oponopono Forgiveness Meditation w/Shannon
description: All are welcome to join Shannon Tamsin on the bamboo at RhythmWave and be guided through an ancient Hawaiian forgiveness process. Together, we will clear out preconceptions of how we view others to create new connections and rejuvenated relationships. This is a guided, easygoing and joyful meditation. The Hawaiian word ho‘oponopono comes from ho‘o ("to make") and pono ("right").

description:
Horny People, release your inner devil, daemon, or unicorn and come make horns with us! We supply the clay, instructions, and gas fired oven. You supply your inner creativity and vision. Lounge in our shade structure while your masterpiece bakes (15 min) and when it's done, we'll help you fit them to your head, chest, nipples, or whatever body part you choose to adorn.

Classes take place 12-ish to 4-ish depending on how hung-over WE are or how horny YOU are. REMEMBER: Classes only run from MON.-THU. so come while supplies last!
print_description: Come make horns with us! We supply clay, instructions, & an oven. You supply inner creativity & vision. Walk away with a lovely set of horns you made.

title: How to Save the World in 2 Simple Steps
description: So you have a meditation practice...now what?  The challenges that humankind is facing can seem unsolvable. Problems  like climate change, terrorism and the food crisis. Emily Fletcher suggests that the solution to these complex problems may be much simpler than we think. Meditating twice a day can not only help to optimize your personal performance, it can help to up-level the state of consciousness of innovators and world leaders (read everyone) who are positioned to solve the more complex challenges the world is facing. You may laugh, you may cry but you will definitely leave lit up about leaving the world better than you found it.
print_description: The challenges facing humanity can seem unsolvable. Emily Fletcher suggests the solution to these complex problems may be much simpler than we think.

title: How to Turn Conflict Into Connection
description: Don't just move on after an argument, take that tense interaction that is pulling you apart and use it to bring you together. Learn practical and memorable tips to turn conflict into connection and upset into intimacy. Including a tool to guarantee that every "breakdown" actually leads to a "breakthrough".
print_description: Take that cranky interaction that is pulling you apart and use it to bring you together. Turn conflict into connection and upset into intimacy.

title: How To Unleash Your Inner Slut
description:
A ʺslutʺ means being able to fully honor your innermost desires. Sometimes it takes a few days to drop into one’s flow-state and feel like your unrestrained self. Come join us for a personal accelerator into claiming the fun-loving slut of delight that you truly are and make the most of every minute here at BM. In this two part playshop, Erin will open you up with a series of yummy stretches so that your unmasked self can be shared with others. Then Booster will lead the group through group games and interactions designed to unleash your inner slut energy in a safe and positive way! This is a non-sexual event.

Get out of your own way. Shed the default world completely behind and open up to the rich world waiting for you here!
print_description: Movement and games designed to shed what holds you back from honoring your innermost desires and unrestrained self. Flow-state accelerator!

title: Hug a Shirtcocker Day
description: They get a lot of attitude from everyone all week. So what if they give you the creeps. Radical Inclusion, people! It’s time to show them it’s all good. Make sure you offer to rub sunscreen on them while you're at it.
print_description: So what if they give you the creeps. As a further gesture of radical inclusion, make sure you offer to rub sunscreen on them while you're at it.

title: Huge BBQ NaMeatStay with Meat Communion
description: BBQ NaMeatStay with Meat Communion (previously Burning Beef and Bison BBQ): THE camp signature event! We BBQ over 180+lbs of beef (Tri Tip) to serve 650+ people over a 4-5 hour period. We have passed Health and Safety for the past 3 years since going public. We are proud of this event and the organizers have successfully BBQ’d on the Playa for 7 consecutive years. You want our meat in your mouth then get on your knees. True to form, we have an meat alter where you can confess your deepest darkest sins to our resident Meat Priest & Naughty Nun. New this year is our Glory Glory Hallelujah Meat hole. Come and join us for our intimate confessionals and give meat communion
print_description: We BBQ over 180+lbs of Meat "Tri Tip" Come give confession to our Meat Priest & Naughty Nun! Get blessed at the Hallelujah Glory Hole!

title: Human Carcass Wash
description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed.

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along.

Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.
The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

title: Identi-who? Costuming as a Form of Self-Expression
description: Identi-Who? | Costuming as a Means of Connecting to Your True Self. Radical self expression is one of the Burning Man’s commandments. And at times we sometimes see the art of costuming as just clothing or something we just wear. This talk will dive in depth on how self-expression plays a critical role into one’s identity and how the playa allows you to truly and radically express yourself. Lead by the Burning Queen herself; Evora Baden will be talking about how costuming, in all forms, allows you to explore your true identity.

title: Instinctive Song Vocal Improvisation
description:
Come try some basic structures to vocal improvisation, explore your creativity through music, build confidence with your voice, and co-create original songs. Using movement and the body as our starting point, we will jam, make sounds, and create music as a group. This work has been incredibly fun, healing, and musically enriching for me and I'm thrilled to be sharing it.

About Natasha:

I'm a musician, facilitator and social artist who works within the Creative Communities Model. I've studied with vocal improvisors Rhiannon (Hilo, Hawaii) and Bisia Belina (Victoria, BC) and give workshops in my home community of Yellowknife, NT, Canada.
print_description: Explore creativity, connection and musicality through spontaneous, improvised vocal music. Experienced and shy singers welcome!

title: Intentional Community Meet and Greet
description: Join us for a meet and greet and open mic for people interested in exploring and building intentional communities. This is an opportunity to come together and meet similarly minded individuals interested in creating intentional communities beyond Burning Man. This is an open forum to meet like minded individuals and discuss methods and challenges of building and maintaining intentional communities. Join us for treats and discussions!
print_description: Join us for an open forum meet and greet and open mic for people interested in exploring and building intentional communities.

title: Intentional Gazing Focused Listening Generous Hugs
description:
Many of us come from cultures where physical touch and speaking openly is discouraged. Even in the swirling world of self-expression that is Burning Man, people can easily miss simple human contact. Our camp wants to see each individual spirit, to hear each story and to offer moments of real connection. We plan to offer: 
●	60 seconds or more of Intentional Gazing. 
●	Five Minutes or more of Focused Listening. 
●	Generous Hugs - just as long as each visitor wants. 
from 1 to 5 PM, Mon through Fri. (or pretty much any time we’re in our big round public living room). We want to empower and encourage our campers and visitors to continually offer these same three tokens of human contact through out BlackRock City and on our travels all over the world. 
We will have paints and card stock so anyone who wants one has a chance to paint their own sign to offer hugs, gazing and listening. 
We'll have other spontaneous events so check our sign! Relax with us! Have some Water!
print_description: We will see your spirit, hear your story & offer you real connection & will help you offer Gazing, Listening & Hugs to your whole world! Water, too!

title: Intergalactic Pancake Massacre
description: Pancakes on the playa! Pile yours high with heavenly berries and orbit the Star Bar for Bloody Marys. Art, acting, and poetry while you wait. Our piping-hot cakes come crammed with chocolate chips, cranberries, blueberries, or all of the above, and can be finished with a huge selection of toppings (fresh fruit at the beginning of the week, as well as options including peanut butter, jam, nutella, maple syrup, honey etc). Meanwhile, our camp watering hole, the Star Bar, will serve copious quantities of Bloody Marys, Screwdrivers, and Pina Coladas. Our campers showcase their creative passions while you wait: "adult" coloring books, improv acting sessions, and free-form poetry. Express yourself!

title: Introduction to storytelling
description:
Introduction to storytelling workshop will guide you through sensory meditation and elements of narrative to help you craft your experience into a story. The theme of the night will be "Present."  It could be a gift you received or gave; it could be about current affairs. It could be anything that the word "present" invokes in you!  Looking forward to sharing stories together.

Speaker: Paula Junn. Paula likes to play with stories, photographs, and jewelry. She longs to build a strong, healthy community to be part of, and she prefers to use the arts and stories as means to build it.
print_description: This workshop will guide you through sensory meditation and elements of narrative to help you craft your experience into a story.

title: Intro to 2 club theory
description: Two club theory will encompasses many of the fundamentals that make up prop manipulation. In this class we shall familiarize ourselves with extensions, isolation, hybrids, split time, same time,  hands together, hands apart, snakes, chu chu's, anti spins, and weaves. Getting grounded in these core concepts will lay down a path toward a better understanding of  framework that makes up the flow art world.
print_description: Come learn fundamentals of prop manipulation. Learn extensions, isolation, split time, and more.

description: Are you ready to learn a little magic? Explore basic levi wand movements where you will be taught the illusion of how to make a levi wand appear to float magically around your body as you dance. We will first warm up with some basic hand/arm stretching and then move into the different types of hand wrap techniques and balance where you will be taught how to control the levi wand. We will cover stalls, lasso’s and body breaks. Lastly, we will integrate everything we’ve learned into a magical wand dance where you will captivate others with your ability to magically float a levi wand! This will be a short string workshop. Wands will be provided. Welcome to all ages
print_description: You will be taught the illusion of how to make a levi wand appear to float magically around your body as you dance. Short string wands are provided.

title: Invention of Self-Other
description: Join us for music, dancing, light, and art. Attendees are encouraged to play with our clothing exchange or come as a "blank canvas" for others to exercise their creativity and whimsy on (Body paint and other non MOOPy supplies provided). Pay us a visit, get sweaty on the dance floor, and take the reinvented you out on playa to see what surprises the night has in store!
print_description: Dance with us, and reinvent yourself with our DJs, libations, costume swap rack, and body paint. See what the playa offers for the new you.

title: Investing In The Future We Want
description: Ibrahim AlHusseini is an award winning entrepreneur, impact investor and philanthropist known for founding FullCycle Energy Fund. FullCycle is dedicated to revolutionizing our relationship with waste by turning our costly global garbage crisis into clean fuel that can power communities worldwide. In this compelling talk Ibrahim will share his personal journey that began as a young immigrant from the Middle East and led to him becoming a successful entrepreneur and an award winning impact investor. He will share how his experiences shaped his career and life and how it’s the choices we make today that will ultimately determine the quality of life of future generations.  His accomplishments and devotion to making a difference are inspiring but it’s his passion for sharing the power of giving back with others that makes him a sought after speaker worldwide.  The audience will leave knowing the power we have to make a difference and how to create the future we all want.
print_description: Ibrahim will share his dedication to solving our greatest social and environmental problems through impact investing.

title: Invigorating Rain Massage Group Touch
description: How would you like to be touched? Come share the invigorating experience of Group Touch Rain Massage! We'll begin this sensuous massage with multiple hands imitating light raindrops on our bodies. Starting out with light tapping on the receiver's body, leading into patting the body then gently laying hands on the body, ending with another round of light tapping. Feel the chi emanating off the energy body! If there is time and interest, we can move into a freeform touch expression of your own creation!
print_description: How do you want to be touched? Many hands imitate raindrops on our bodies, followed by freeform touch expression of your own creation!

title: Is Burning Man Gentrifying
description: For the past four years, the BRC Census has reported a steady rise in the median income of Burners which is significantly faster than the rate of inflation. This led some of us to wonder whether Burning Man was "gentrifying" to some degree; becoming less inclusive of low-income participants due to cost or other factors. We hope to present data and discuss conclusions from what we know thus far.
print_description: For the past 4 years, the BRC Census has reported a steady rise in the median income of Burners that's significantly higher than the rate of inflation

Get pumped to build your very own! Then go back home and reproduce that beautiful, green-enhancing thing for your own camp next year! See the Gray-B-Gon’s main proponent, originator, and our fan, Larry Breed (not a member of our theme camp), and his instructions and tips for this great invention at these sites:

a video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f-a8QdeyoFs

Java Joy Café Hut

title: Jazz Funeral for the Man
description:
We invite all of Black Rock City to join us in our march from the French Quarter to the ashes of the Man, and back. A smaller procession will continue on to the Temple with remembrances. The mood is joyous, humorous, melancholy, sultry, and respectful, all at once. It is a time in which we honor the dead by living life to the fullest.

Before the parade, there will be an impromptu brunch in the French Quarter, and everyone is encouraged to bring whatever they would like to cook or share. Musicians are all welcome to join the main line. Mutant vehicles and other participants are all welcome to join the second line. If you are not bringing an instrument, feel free to bring libations or hydration to support the march.
print_description: Join a playa tradition! Bring your brass or join the second line, in a parade of joy and tears, for the Man and those who have passed...

title: Kangoo Bounce Party
description:
Remember that dream (no, not that one) – the one where the sidewalks are bouncy houses, and you run, covering ground like a the Olympic sprinter/Astronaut/Superhero you always planned to be when you were 10? Yeah… It’s like that. But better, because you aren’t naked in Walmart, and you don’t have to wake up. We have Kangoo Bounce Boots for the tall, the small, and everyone in between – step into a dream come true!
Not down to bounce?  We at Astral Thruster would love to thrust your ass into drunken oblivion. We will make you a tasty beverage that hopefully will thrust your ass back to where you fuckin came from. Have a great Burn!!! And for those of you that arent totally Schammered, we invite you to Bounce!

title: KARAOKE and open mic daily at Camp Fuego!
description: KARAOKE at Camp Fuego, daily Monday through Friday at the 6:00 Plaza @3:15 location.  Serving the best organic snow cones on the Playa.  Play “Mo' Mercy or No Mercy Karaoke". If you to sing Mo' Mercy Karaoke, talented singers stand by on 3 additional mics to jump in and sing the song with you to makes sure the 6:00 Plaza is filled only with the most beautiful sounds of song. Ambitious singers can opt for No Mercy Karaoke, where they sing solo or duet and a panel of judges will either award them a prize for a beautiful song or CUT THEIR MIC and fade back to dance music if anything less. Oh yes, it can get brutal, but it's all love and fun on the playa!
print_description: KARAOKE & OPEN MIC at Camp Fuego. Come sing "Mo Mercy" or "No Mercy" karaoke and win a prize! Organic snow cones and top shelf bar OPEN!

title: Keep in Touch - Men Only
description:
What is touch? How do we touch other people? How do we set boundaries for us and others?
In this workshop we will deal with those questions, experience different types of touch, define our boundaries and learn to communicate them to the people around us, while respecting their boundaries.

title: Kundalini Acro Reactivation
description:
We live in a shared dream, fractals of the same consciousness appreciating individuation. Within and without, our inner nature reflects into our outer reality. We can choose our vibrational frequency. A divine playmate can help enhance our ability to grow into new spaces in the universe considerably. 
 
 Acknowledging that we are the same self projecting through unique layerings of stories, we can assist one another in rebuilding the body, our temple for spirit. Reaching out into every direction of your universe and expanding consciousness with the breath, we can reactivate the energetic body together. 
 
 We'll be delving into how to realign the spine, our antenna to unity consciousness using acro yoga paired with kundalini energetic healing. The physical body is the intermediary for every dimension of our existence. By arousing kundalini energy the practitioner can activate third eye so that the distortions may be witnessed as they are released.
 
 We are our own best healer. Working together we can amplify the effects of our alchemical growth while releasing post traumatic stress from past lives and feeling trust again.
print_description: Cosmic dancing together, loving all that is alchemically. Realigning the spine with kundalini activation and acro, rebuilding the temple.

title: Kundalini tantra
description:
Kundalini tantra is designed to develop a greater awareness of the subtle energy in the body, strengthen the nervous system and correct any imbalances in the chakric system so that the primal energy known as kundalini may ascend through the spinal column activating every part of the brain and glandular system as it passes through the various chakras, illuminating the mind and bringing one into an expanded state of awareness and deeper sense of presence. We will begin with a mantra followed by basic warm ups to open up the energy channels in our bodies before we get into the main kriya. The purpose of the kriya we will be performing is to harmonize the masculine and feminine polarity within the body which will result in the experience of a more wholesome, integrated and balanced sense of self. 

 
Instructor: Joel Mueller. Joel is an artist and musician with a deep interest in the spiritual and philosophical traditions of this world. For the past 7 years he has practiced a form of yoga called Kundalini tantra through the guidance of his partner Adriane. She learned this method from Yogi Bhajan and has been teaching it for over 15 years.
print_description: Kundalini tantra is designed to develop a greater awareness of the subtle energy in the body and strengthen the nervous system.

description: Have you got a two-wheeled human powered contraption you think is fit to outrun the devil on a suped up segway during armageddon? Are you ready for the event of a lifetime? description:
Join us for a our 2nd annual meetup of Burners from Latin America, hosted by our Regional Contacts and Community Leaders from Argentina and Brazil and our Regional Network and Programming Teams from Burning Man! 

Join us at the Everywhere Pavilion (6:25 and Esplanade) on Wednesday, August 31st from 7:00pm-8:30pm for cocktails and conversation! We'd love to get to know our Latin American Burner community and see how we can support your ideas and projects!

title: Latin Party
description: Our hot Latin Party is all about expressing ourselves and pura vida! The Latin American culture is a colorful mix of races, traditions and expressions that have evolved over the years, all bound by a common love for music and dancing.  We will share this connection by combining different styles of music, such as Cumbia Villera (Chile/Argentina), Bachata (Colombia), Axe (Brazil), and Merengue (Dominican Republic), in one unique dancing event (Latin music is not just about Salsa!).   Our two “Maestros” will teach essential dance moves for each style… while enforcing the Latin proverb: Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!  This event will bring to life the deep connection that defines the Latin culture.
print_description: Learn Cumbia, Bachata, Merengue in one unique dancing event featuring the Margarita-Bike! Nobody cares how you dance, just do it with passion!

title: Laughter Yoga
description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. “Inappropriate” Laughter Yoga is also a possibility, if our clientele are okay with it. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of good, long, & pleasurable laughs with us! Healthy!

title: Leadership: The Four Faces of Incorruptible Power
description: In order to live in a world without war we must first heal the war between the sexes. It is time for feminine power and leadership to rise and join a healthy, incorruptible masculine. Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled. There are too few healthy stories of men who are powerful without creating harm and violence .  There are too few healthy stories of men who create win-win instead of win-lose.  Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone. For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see.
print_description: Learn how to harness the feminine forms and masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true integrated leader, & serve anyone

title: Leonardo’s Selfie Booth: The Vitruvian Me!
description:
We of the Guild of Vitruvius, under the protection of Joyism, gift custom renditions of The Vitruvian Man to you.  Imagine your own personage captured in the form of Da Vinci’s Vitruvian Man, arms and legs splayed within the Vitruvian square and circle, rendered as a page from the Maestro’s workbook, and distributable as the ultimate Renaissance jpeg selfie.  Our Guild artisans help you pose while laying on a green screen (with or without clothing), take two pictures, process those pictures, display the final images (one with wings), and encourage you to download it to your camera or thumb drive.  We can also send you an image via email after the event.  Have fun with your images, which are suitable for printing, social media distribution, or decorating your computer, phone or watch.

In short, you haven’t done Burning Man 2016 until you have a picture of yourself as The Vitruvian Me!

title: Life Coaching Workshop
description:
Did you ever notice that you and Al Roker (the weatherman) sound a lot alike?  For example, he says, “tomorrow it’s going to rain; for the next five days it’ll be hot & muggy”.  And, you say things like, “today sucked and I’m a procrastinator”, or “I’m not a morning person”, you know, “I’m cloudy with a chance of a storm”…as if you have nothing to do with it, it’s just how you and it is…

But doesn’t weather reporting yourself into “not a morning person,” just gives you a doctor’s note from being nice until noon?

We are all sneakily weather reporters in our lives, pretending we have no say over how we are going to be or how things are going to go.  But what if it’s not so?

Uh oh is right. What if you are actually the author of your life?  

I mean, who else is?  In this workshop, you’ll begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.
print_description: Begin to redefine a new and powerful context from which to run your personal and professional life, where you have a say over the weather.

title: Life Coaching Workshop
description:
We all have negative traits that come out under certain circumstances at work. Whether it’s when we’re stressed, worried, overwhelmed, or, the new age old favorite, when Mercury is in retrograde. Right? Except, no matter what, no matter how warranted it feels in the moment, our bad behaviors never leave us proud of ourselves.

Righteous? Check. Justified? Check. Proud? No.

What would be possible, if by the end of 2016, you had your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn’t you have a totally different experience at work? Wouldn’t you be more impressed with yourself? Wouldn’t it be worth it? Wouldn’t you be proud?

Check.

Come learn how to nix your negative traits, and get fighting for the right team, your dreams team!
print_description: Nix your negative traits! What if you got your bad behaviors under new management? Wouldn't you be proud? Would it be worth it? Come learn how.

title: Life Coaching Workshop
description:
What if true happiness and self-esteem come from knowing you can count on yourself to keep a promise to yourself? That making and keeping promises to yourself about what matters most to you, matters most. From eating kale (the state bird of California) to having consistent (and great) sex with your mate to exercising to writing.

It does.

It’s time to get your head out of the game! 
It certainly is not on your dream’s team. We can help.
print_description: True happiness & self-esteem come from knowing you can count on yourself to keep a promise to yourself? Learn to make a spiritual contract.

title: Life Coaching Workshop
description: Take a revolutionary approach to life. Through this innovative coaching workshop, you will come to know and love yourself, resolve your personal history and manage your mind. You will develop personal integrity and align your heart, mind and actions with your dreams. You will see and understand yourself from a different perspective and experience your life with newfound compassion, humor and honesty.
print_description: Takes a revolutionary approach to life. Develop personal integrity and align your heart, mind and actions with your dreams.

title: Life Coaching Workshop
description:
Whether you want to take on your career, your love life, your health, your body and/or your family (yes, even yours!) this year, this workshop will teach you how to dream in every area of your life that matters to you, it will show you what’s in the way of your dreams and get you into the right actions to, once and forever, realize every last one of those dreams.

We will guide you through this profound discovery and give you the practical tools you need to set your life on a different trajectory.  You will leave with a new perspective, attainable goals and an inspired, goosebump-worthy personal plan.
print_description: Learn how to dream in every area of your life, figure out what’s in the way and get into the right actions to realize every last one of those dreams!

title: Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience
description:
"In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about
Share your passions with others to build a community of likeminded people
See an increase in happiness and living a life you love

"Where must we go, we who wander this wasteland, in search of our better selves?"

"I like this plan... we could start again, just like the old days!"

title: LIP-SYNC Battle
description:
ATTENTION ALL SICK CUNTS & SUPERSTARS!!!
One of the most highly anticipated events of the Burn and the Camp Anita schedule 
For those that don’t know, lip-sync battle is basically karaoke but without any singing, just you and a mic (turned off) and the platform to perform your heart and soul out to your favourite song.
Get creative, get inspirational, wear a costume or just belt out a classic ballad. If this sound like something you will enjoy (or would be a great opportunity to step outside your comfort zone) sign up to the Lip-sync Battle 2016.
Space is limited, so register early at Camp Anita! Bring your song on an USB or MP3 player. Ask for Tim or Verity!
For some inspiration watch the teaser video from PapaZahns (Camp Anita’s Sister Camp) at this years Blazing Swan (Western Australian Regional Burn) in the URL link provided.

title: Listen the Fuck Up to Your Spirit Guides
description:
What the fuck is a spirit guide?     Find out how to walk in beauty, grace, and power by welcoming Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, and other plant and animal guides into your life.

barnaby;s: Get your head out of your default world arse and drop into  deep listening to surrender to your spirit guides.

What the fuck is a spirit guide, bro? Think of them as being like your guardian angels except way more badass. Get your head out of your default world arse and learn how to drop into a deep state of listening to connect with, surrender to, and listen the fuck up to your spirit guides. On any given day there is about a 100% chance that you're going to be doing some bullshit that you shouldn't be doing as a result of obstacles laid down by your subconscious. You're making baby elephant seals cry when you do that. Find out how to walk in beauty, walk in grace, walk in power by learning how to welcome Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, Uncle Eagle, Aunt Otter and many more into your life. Need to find a medicine man/woman/circle in your area? The session will end with shamanic networking session so that you can find and connect with healers off-playa to aid you in realizing your true nature. with Matt King
print_description: Find out how to walk in beauty, grace, and power by welcoming Father Jaguar, Mother Bear, and other plant and animal guides into your life.

title: Longevity Stick
description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for a not too early hour of low-impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world. See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .

title: Mad Sorcerer's Workshop
description:
Do you like Burning Man?  Do you like shiny lights?  Do you like play-doh?  We thought so.  This year, the NY Regional is combining all three, for the ultimate Midway interactive art trifecta at Burning Man.  

Each visitor to the Mad Sorcerer's Workshop creates one tiny clay creature and adds it to the world growing on the shelves of an infinity box.  Visitors are encouraged to interact with each other, to cooperate, and to let their imaginations roam, molding polka dot trees, green cows, castles, dinosaurs, and UFOs.  Make a blue fish, your friend can make a red bird, the next person will make a small man, together we'll have the beginnings of a whole new world, with the reflections of the infinity box making it look like there's whole schools and flocks of strange creatures and a crowd of people, all interacting.

You get to be the Mad Sorcerer, create whole worlds in your crystal ball, just to mess with them.  You get to say how creative and lovely your pet world will be.  There's no skill required, no creation too boring or too creative.  A red, and yellow and purple castle?  Yes!  A small brown snake?  Yes!  Every play-doh creature has a place with us.

Want to see how the project is going?  Want to Contribute and Volunteer? Like us at https://www.facebook.com/Mad-Sorcerer-1698581610391522/ for project updates and event announcements. 

Open 24-7, for kids of all ages, shade, play-doh and infinity box worlds provided.
print_description: Craft colorful new worlds with the sorcery of play-doh and the transfiguration of mirrors.  Open 24-7 for children ages 2-102, materials provided.

title: Magician show "Arts, Leonardo and dust".
description:
After successful performances at Burning Man 2013-2015 illusionist and mentalist "Mystery" brings even bigger and more exciting show this year: "Arts, Leanardo and dust". It’s a very theatrical and mysterious magic show full of unexplainable transformations, levitation, appearances, mind reading and magical manipulations with fire, cards, books, articles of clothing, and other objects. All of the effects will be happening very close to our audience, and often right in their hands. 
Followed by "Danceburg" - a dance troupe with beautifully choreographed dances (Argentine tango, waltz, cha-cha, salsa, folk, hip-hop, freestyle and other styles of dances.) The performances will be shown the camp's Big Dome.

You are welcome to sit and do your own practice or allow yourself to be guided deeper into your experience, in a space of quiet acceptance and brilliant openness. Meditation means making friends with your self. Learn how to love through discovering self existing non judgmental awareness. Just as the ocean is never separate from it's waves, so essence is never separate from all that is arising, moment to moment.

title: Meet and Greet with Santa for Adults
description: Ho, ho ho… merry Burnmas everyone! Some of you have been naughty, and some of you have been nice, and some have been nice and naughty. Come and sit on Santa’s Lap and tell him that you have been good or bad this year and ask what you want for Burnmas. This event is for adults who can have a little naughty conversation with Santa and ask for something delightful this year. Participants will receive a small gift from Santa (naughty or nice) while supplies last. This event is for adults ages 18 and over so that you don’t have to feel a need to filter yourself around younger burners.
print_description: Santa knows if you have been naughty or nice, and now is your time to visit Santa and tell him what you want for Burnmas! There may be gifts waiting..

Your parents or guardians are welcome to take pictures of you with Santa to make all your friends at home jealous that you met the jolly man at Burning Man. There will be a special gift (while supplies last) for the good children who come to visit.

title: Meet the Artists Tour Broadcast on BMIR 94.5 FM
description: Coming at you directly from the Playa on BMIR - Burning Man Information Radio! An "unholy" alliance between the ARTery and BMIR, the Meet the Artist Broadcast will be hosted by Diablo, Dazzle! & G-Spot.    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~There is a ton of AMAZING Art this year and we're gonna tell you about SOME of it, while interviewing a FEW of the incredible artists who dreamed it all up and created these fantastic works.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You can turn in to BMIR 94.5 FM while on the Playa, stream on-line worldwide at http://www.BMIR.org/ or (best of all) come follow the tour on your bike! Which Art Car to follow? None other than The Queen of BRC: "Christina" and Captain Flipper. Just look on the Esplanade near the ARTery/BMIR for a gorgeous 58' yacht with blue "waves" on her hull. http://bit.ly/ChristinaArtCar  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Have you ever stopped and wondered about some of the art out on the playa, and thought: "What the Fuck were they thinking!?!" Now you might just find out . . . All YOU have to do now on Thursday September 1st, 2016 just before 11:00 a.m. is remember to: TURN ON! ~Your radio TUNE IN! ~To 94.5 FM on the Playa (or stream on-line @ http://www.BMIR.org/) or DROP EVERYTHING ~You Dusty Burner & come follow us out into the desert on your bicycle . . . Thanks! Diablo
print_description: See Online
other_location: Christina Art Car at BMIR on the Esplanade, 94.5 FM on the Playa and worldwide at http://www.bmir.org/
