title: Merkaba: Tasting The Infinite Through Breath
description:
In this dynamic presentation & event participants will literally learn and practice how to 'plug themselves into the Infinite.' Utilizing our physiology and breath we will be co-creating a Merkabah Light Body Activation.
Merkabah activation is a 3000 years old breathing technique that allows to open a portal in our heart chakra. This will bring us to feel the vibrations and the energy of the universe. The intensity of the technique depends on the person, ranging from an incredible feeling of ecstasy, until space and time journeys. Being a technique that connects with the inner and higher self, it will also allows to experience breakthroughs, get answers about our lives, solve problems that we didn't even know to have. The more open to receive love and the more open minded we will be, the more we will get from this practice. The technique is as powerful as magical. Almost everybody that have experienced it, described it as mind blowing, many as life changing, some others as the most powerful moment of their life.
Prepare to experience yourself in Totality!
print_description: Breath-work and guided journey where you will learn how to 'plug ourselves into the Infinite’ and co-create a Merkaba Light Body Activation

title: Military Manplay Madness
description: You can ask but you don't have to tell at Down Low Club. Tonight it’s real man-to-man action for adult 18+ Gay, Queer, Bi & Curious men with a military theme. Our discreet, enclosed, air-conditioned Army tent is fully outfitted for adult manplay. Wear your best camouflage, BDUs, 13-button pants if you like. Or not. Soldier? Sailor? Marine? Airman? Come live your "in the service" fantasy or re-live those manly military days from your past. From foxholes to flight decks, barracks to bulkheads it’s all here, men! Remember, what happens at Burning Man stays at Burning Man…

title: Milk & Honey Shabbat Service and Dinner
description: Join us to welcome Shabbat with prayer, reflection, ecstatic singing, and a vegetarian and vegan-friendly meal. Our service is rooted in the Jewish tradition, but all denominations and faiths are welcome to join hands and hearts. Come to our camp as the sun sets. We will welcome the sabbath as a sea of twinkling stars envelops us. After a service, songs, and time to reflect, we will guide you to our dining area and seat you at a communal bedouin-style table. BYO plate, cutlery, and drinks! We will nourish you with a multi-course meal, and ease you into the embrace of an evening in the dust.
print_description: Join us at sundown to welcome Shabbat with prayer, ecstatic singing, and a vegetarian meal. All faiths welcome. BYO plate, cutlery, and drinks!

title: Mindfulness/Loving-Kindness Meditation
description:
Mindfulness and Loving-Kindness Meditation: Connecting to the Present Moment and Those Around Us. 

Mindfulness is paying attention in a particular way on purpose in the present moment, non-judgmentally. This first part of this experience will focus on practicing mindfulness and bringing a sense of inner calm and peace to participants. The 2nd part of this experience will focus on loving-kindness meditation, a form of meditation that is focused on building a habit of selfless or altruistic love. With compassion-focused meditation, participants will practice loving-kindness towards themselves and friends, family, and acquaintances, even total strangers.
print_description: Connecting to the Present Moment and Those Around Us

title: Mind Melt
description:
Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought, feelings, sensations, and level of awareness through corresponding brain wave patterns.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. The use of mind melting can enhance physical healing and homeostasis, intellectual performance, and greatly improved a sense of well-being, which allows one to See beauty where others do not, and a new perception of life that is the Future for all Mankind.

Remember; nothing really exists, it’s all in the electrons of your mind.
print_description: 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought.

Come to Mindwerk, in the Silicon Village, and put them to good use. You can control music and lights and play pong all with your head goo. What kind of freak are you anyway? Now we can answer this question scientifically. We’ll let you know after analyzing your brain waves. All brains welcome!

title: Missed Connections Cocktail Hour
description: BRC's first on-site analog Missed Connections board provides both a public service and entertainment!  M4M, M4W, W4W, W4M, platonics, and casual encounters... any messages posted throughout the week will be collected, archived, and the "best of" subjected to dramatic readings!  Themes may run from sweet, to spicy, maybe a bit salty... so the crazy ultramarathon runners (and non-runners) at Pink Lightening camp will be serving up suitably-themed cocktails: one sweet, one spicy, and one salty at all times.  Even if you haven't posted in the hopes of finding your own "missed connection," join us!  Costumes and impromptu re-enactment is strongly encouraged.

title: Monkey Wrench Station
description:
Bike broken and nowhere to turn?  Well, you may be 'all thumbs' but if at least two are opposable, we can help you fix it!  (And if not, we'll help you break it altogether!)  Here at Simian Akademy, our mission is to help you gain the skills necessary to adapt to today's dynamic, ever-changing playa environment.  Our dedicated team of trained monkeys will show you where it goes and how to work it.  If a trained monkey can do it, you can too!  

Come spin the 'Wheel of Fortune' to decide your fate:  Fix It, Break It, Camp Chore, Sparkle Pony Watering Trough, Dome of Despair... only the hand of Fate knows the outcome.

title: Morning Cocktails
description:
Morning Cock n' Tales is an interactive dome where you can come rest your feet after a long Night or Day on the Playa. Our specialty is morning Cocktails (think mimosas and palomas). We also have coffee for those not wanting to travel all the way to Center Camp and stand in the long lines. Besides our tasty beverages, we offer a welcoming atmosphere, comfortable seating, games, friendly conversations, and journals that we encourage guest to write (or draw) their TALES from the playa in. Each year the journals will make the annual journey home so they can added to and enjoyed again and again...
We open when the sun comes up (or whenever we feel like it), and stay serving most of the day (or until we are sick of it), always providing a place for weary burners to rest throughout the day and then kicking up the party at night.

title: Morphic Field Movement
description:
This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more. 
 　　 
As human beings we are prepared to communicate with new languages. We will use the intelligence of the movement to communicate. You can move being encouraged and guided by the intelligence of morphic fields (Rupert Sheldrake has published credible research about this). 
 　　 
A morphic field is a field of energy that stores information; in the field exist dynamics, settings, games, processes; it is a memory field, it is an intelligent field. A morphic field is created when any of us introduces an intention and an action in space and time, which after being performed several times becomes a specific intelligence, then that intelligence influences the actions of a whole group and creates a memory of a way of doing things. In a morphic field the communication is easy and instantaneous. 
 　　 
Morphic Field Movement becomes physical expression, borne from body languages, from the poetry of the body, from the clear expression of the bodies. 
 　　 
What I would like to explore is the possibility to express more subtle dimensions of communication, more rare to our usual life; communicating realities that words can not name and the body can reveal. Morphic Field Movement is a proposal to create another type of communication — alternative now, and I hope definitive and more popular in the future.　　 #clothing optional #nudist #naturist
print_description: This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more.

title: Morphic Field Movement
description:
Movement precedes us, we don’t create movement. This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more. We will use the intelligence of the movement to communicate. 
 
 You can move being encouraged and guided by the intelligence of morphic fields (Rupert Sheldrake has published credible research about this). A morphic field is a field of energy that stores information; in the field exist dynamics, settings, games, processes; it is a memory field, it is an intelligent field. A morphic field is created when any of us introduces an intention and an action in space and time, which after being performed several times becomes a specific intelligence, then that intelligence influences the actions of a whole group and creates a memory of a way of doing things. We can create morphic fields at will, because our intelligence is able to. In a morphic field the communication is easy and instantaneous. What this workshop proposes is the creation of fields of intelligence through movement, because I believe that as human beings we are prepared to communicate with new languages. Art informs certain languages ​​that are developed over time, and perhaps now it's time to take those languages ​​as structures that allow us a different way to function in life.
 
 Morphic Field Movement becomes physical expression, borne from body languages, from the poetry of the body, from the clear expression of the bodies...
print_description: This practice is not dance, body expression, theater, nor performance — it is a composition of these, and more.

title: Movement Meditation
description: Movement Meditation - This class begins with an introduction to the Body/Mind practices of Developmental Movement and Somatic Training. We'll learn to sense and feel the energy that moves through our bodies with Qi Gong practice then we'll explore Viewpoints Space Awareness and Open Improvisation. Before the end of our time together we'll venture into the realm of Meditation in Action and Contemplative Dance. (2 hr class)

title: Movement & Object Work in Improv Theatre
description: Object work and movement are fundamental elements of improvisational theater, used in creating and communicating environments, characters, ideas and even abstract concepts to the ensemble and the audience. Naile & Oz will review some fun and creative object work exercises improvisers do for practice and rehearsal.
print_description: We will explore various uses of movement and object work in improvisational theater and all other forms of interaction and communication.

title: Movie Mirror Camera Obscura by Liminal Labs
description:
Liminal Labs Workshop is fustian to announce a breakthrough advance in the art of Camera Obscura. Utilizing our Movie Mirror Obscura technology, what wast once restricted to the dark isolation of a head-sized box or a stuffy, lightless chamber, is anon a shared, open-air experience under the stars themselves. Thrill to see actual, illuminate images of people, places, and things (things!!!) that seem to move with a divine direction of their own making.

Leonardo daVinci was himself taken with the possibilities of the Camera Obscura. Inspired, Liminal Labs Workshop does the Master one better by adding focused, intense illumination on a 53-foot white wall to offer an experience beyond what even Leonardo might imagine.

Indeed, the Movie Mirror Obscura dual screen system shines brighter than the heavens and is blended with sounds to tempt the dancing angels. From Tuesda through Friday, each evening’s dark of night brings, not one, but two images magically mirrored, side-by-side for thy Royal amusement. Prithee shaketh thy booty if so moved. Or sit and enjoy the movie magic.
print_description: Warpeth your mind by watching TWO movies at once/mirrored/reversed on our luxurious 53' double wide / screen @5&F! Dark City, Brothers Quay, etc...

description: Free kazoos if you provide the nonsense. Kazoo contests, kazoo karaoke, kazoo parade, and other mayhem. You can also entertain everyone by playing the best (daily) tuned piano on the playa. We also have a drum kit and an assortment of musical instruments to play.
print_description: Free kazoos if you provide the nonsense. Kazoo contests, kazoo karaoke, kazoo parade, and other mayhem.

title: Mushroom Cultivation
description: Talk about your favourite fungi!!!
print_description: Come and talk about your favourite fungi!!!

title: Musical Havdallah, Burning Man-Style
description: Join us in song and intention as we celebrate the last light of Shabbos and bring that sacred energy into the new week.
print_description: Join us in song and intention as we celebrate the last light of Shabbos and bring that sacred energy into the new week.

title: Musical Sing-Along
description:
Okay, so you’re a showboat, think you’re a Disney princess, or just love to sing joyfully with a group of people. 

Well, you’re in luck! Skip, jaunt, sashay, or waltz over to Musical Sing-Along. We’ll have your favorite musical 

scenes from The Little Mermaid, Hello Dolly, Fiddler on the Roof and so much more - with lyrics projected on a big 

screen so you can sing your heart out. Heck, even dress as your favorite character and act out a scene. Drinks and 

snacks will be served to feed your inner-child/diva/ham-extraordinaire.
print_description:
Sing along with your favorite musicals! Words and drinks will be provided.
Think ... Lion King, Hedwig, Grease etc.

title: Music and More
description: Move to the chill sounds of slow tempo house, lounge beats or mash-up 80's.  Our international group of DJ's are sure to please!  Get your daytime dance on and meet some new friends at our corner scene.
print_description: Move to the chill sounds of slow tempo house, lounge beats or mash-up 80's.  Our international group of DJ's are sure to please!

title: Music as Medicine: The Easy Way To Heal
description:
Music is one of the easiest and most fun ways to heal our hearts and rewire our negative patterns. Learn how to use this timeless remedy to realize your deepest intentions. 

During this interactive event, you'll get access to several of the most talented medicine musicians around and we'll talk about:

- How to use music as a transformational tool
- How to choose the music that will accelerate your healing
- The catalytic power of singing
- The relationship between feeling your emotions and being a talented singer
- Different approaches to creating healing songs
- Healing our world, one song at a time.
Join us!
print_description: Learn how to use, choose and create music to realize your deepest intentions.

title: Music Therapy Healing Circle
description: Music Therapy: Connection & expression thru live music and song.
print_description: Music Therapy: Connection & expression thru live music and song.

title: Music Time!
description: Subject yourself, orally and aurally, to delicious drinks and questionable tunes. You might just find yourself stricken with a delightful earworm.
print_description: Subject yourself, orally and aurally, to delicious drinks and questionable tunes. You might just find yourself stricken with a delightful earworm.

title: Mutant Flamingo Crafternoon
description:
Da Vinci has time traveled to The Future to raise an army of cyborg flamingos to conquer the past. At the start of the week we'll have hundreds of uniform plastic lawn flamingos and a pile of cyberpunk art supplies; zip-ties, silver paint markers, and circuitry for participants to create their mutant monsters with. With your help by the end of the week we'll have an army of mutated cyborg flamingos gathered in the lagoon ready to be blasted back to the past to invade Florence.

Join us for some post-apocalyptic crafting as we crowd source a mutant flamingo army to adorn our camp lagoon.
print_description: We've got pink lawn flamingos and the cyberpunk art supplies to mutate them into post apocalyptic works of art, we just need your help!

title: Mutant Vehicle Capt's Race & Safety Awareness
description: Art Car Capt's race for safety awareness & Mutant Vehicles parade. Departs after the Playa Skool Art Car Forum
print_description: Art Car Capt's race for safety awareness & Mutant Vehicles parade. Departs after the Playa Skool Art Car Forum.

title: Mycodelic beer tasting
description: Come by for a glass of light happy, hoppy home-brew beer designed for the heat. Not very strong, but full of flavor and nice and crisp.   We will be playing music to dance too,  and the keg will be available until its tapped out. Come talk beer, dance to the tunes of our resident dj's and check out what other events we are holding
print_description: Come grab a glass of cold happy, hoppy home-brew beer designed for this heat. Not very strong, but full of flavor. Dance with beer till its gone 21+

title: Mystic Presents: An Evening of Troubadours
description: Come for a relaxing evening featuring some of the finest acoustic musicians this side of the Man. Come as you are and let the sounds of the Troubadours and the magic of the Mystic Theater drop you in a few layers deeper. Featuring Joe Muscatello, Josh Z., Ariana Hall, and more.
print_description: Come for a relaxing evening with the finest acoustic musicians this side of the Man, & let the magic of the Mystic Theater drop you in a layer deeper.

title: NAI'A Breath Ceremony w/ Jhenneviev Seah Holtz
description: Discover the gift of connected breathwork, explore the depth of your being, surrender to what is, change on a cellular level and unleash the power of your essence.
print_description: Discover the gift of connected breathwork, explore the depth of your being, surrender to what is, and unleash the power of your essence.

title: Nail Bar for MEN!
description: Broken nails due to hard labour? Nails just the wrong shade for your tutu? Embarrassed to enter a women’s nail bar? Come and have your nails done in a man-positive environment, with conversations about trucks, football and man-stuff while drinking beer. You can even have your nails done by another man, as there is nothing weird about that! [Although he is likely to be a homosexual] We have man-colours such as gunshot grey, camouflage and lily pink.
print_description: Come and have your nails done in a man-positive environment, with conversations about trucks, football and man-stuff while drinking beer.

title: Naked Blacklight Twister
description: Come let it all hang out as you get twisted on our Blacklight Twister Board! Come on! Don't be shy ;)
print_description: Come let it all hang out as you get twisted on our Blacklight Twister Board! Come on! Don't be shy ;)

description: This healing workshop starts our journey into loving ourselves unconditionally. Some nudity involved. All sexes welcome.
print_description: This healing workshop starts our journey into loving ourselves unconditionally. Some nudity involved. All sexes welcome.

title: Naked Counseling
description: Expose yourself to naked counseling! You'll heal body shame, be seen as beautiful, and learn to love your body exactly as it already is! Led by Steve Bearman
print_description: Expose yourself to naked counseling! You'll heal body shame, be seen as beautiful, and learn to love your body exactly as it already is!

title: Naked Espresso
description: Espresso au natural. Join us to get your buzz on.
print_description: Espresso au natural. Join us to get your buzz on.

title: Naked Happy Hour: Connecting sans Obstacles
description: Naked Happy Hour: Connecting sans Obstacles (& Underwear). Disco Chateau will host a Naked Happy Hour, where burners will be encouraged to disrobe (optional), share cocktails (provided), release inhibitions and bond.
print_description: Burners will be encouraged to disrobe (optional), share cocktails (provided), release inhibitions and bond.

title: Naked Oil Wrestling
description: Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. It’s also one of humanity’s oldest and was among the major events of the original Olympics. Long before we were kicking balls around we were rolling around in the dirt, putting each other in headlocks! It doesn’t matter if you’re a complete novice who’s never tried it in your life or an experienced fighter, come along and experience this amazing bonding experience in Gymnasium, Black Rock City’s Ancient Greek wrestling school!
print_description: Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. Let's wrestle like it was done in the original Olympics!

title: Naked Philosophy
description: Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, on reflection, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion? To be naked in 21st century western society demands intense self-examination, the questioning and reappraisal of conventional conventions and morality. In this sense, naturism, as the cultural and political movement of nudism is often known, is an inherently philosophical practice. And what better way to do philosophy than naked? We’re sure your college seminars would have been much more fun nude. Come and join us for lively discussions, debates and story-telling. We’ll be discussing naturism, body image, sharing experiences, debating body modification, if and how laws should be changed – really everything related to the human body.
print_description: Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion?

title: Naked Piggy-Back and Barrel-Run Race
description: Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you’ll have to bear them on your back, bareback… or vice versa. Great bonding experience guaranteed! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is:) PS In ancient Olympics this would have been an equestrian event, but BMORG wouldn’t let us bring horses…
print_description: Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you’ll have to bear them on your back, bareback… or vice versa :D

print_description:

title: Naked Presence

title: Naked Pub Crawl
description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the riders. Among this year’s host camps are Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, BAAAHS, and Celestial Bodies. The ride culminates with an 80s Jazzercise Dayglo afterparty hosted by the wonderful folks at Comfort & Joy. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. No statement or political agenda; just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends. Oh yeah, and we’re naked. Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
print_description: 13th annual Naked Bicycle Pub Crawl.  Get naked and meet at the Man.  Multiple host camps standing by.   Afterparty hosted by Comfort & Joy.

title: Naked Pub Crawl
description: Drink and be merry/naked. Exact time TBD.
print_description: Drink and be merry/naked. Exact time TBD.

title: Naked Pub Crawl/DFA Records Tribute Party
description: Make sure to stop by Cubhouse during the BRC Naked Pub Crawl. Enjoy some kinks, drinks, and music of the Infamous DFA records with hundreds of naked BRC citizens Wednesday afternoon.  Come in your skin, leave with a grin. See ya there!
print_description: Enjoy some kinks, drinks, and music of the Infamous DFA records with hundreds of naked BRC citizens.  Come in your skin, leave with a grin.

title: Naked Sensual Body Painting @ 4:30 & D
description: Want to color up? Come by our colorful RV, brush and finger paint up any and every part of your and your friends bodies with body and MOOP safe paint. We humans come in so many flavors, with such awesome variety! Join us as we decorate our bodies and visually proclaim who we are. With just a few splashes (daubs) of colorful paint, our living canvases become incredible expressions of our unique version of “human”, our personal “performance art.” Its a delight for the senses - especially touch - feeling brush or finger strokes over your skin can be a very sensual experience. We will offer printed photo postcards to send a picture of your body art home to your friends, family or yourself as a fun memory.
print_description: With a few dabs of colourful paint, our living canvases become an expression of who we are. Painting and being painted can be a sensual experience.
other_location: In front of Super Colorful RV

title: Naked SK8 session
description: Bring your birthday suit to the 24/7 skate-park at Black Rock City and collect scrapes, bumps, and bruises with your fellow naked shredders! This spectator sport is even more of a spectacle as your maneuvers trigger flame poofers to perfectly accent your sweaty and dusty bodies. Shoes are not required.
print_description: Bring your birthday suit to the 24/7 skate-park at Black Rock City and collect scrapes, bumps, and bruises with your fellow naked shredders!

title: Naked Snow Cone Social & Dance Party
description: Naked all week or just want to lose the costume for a bit? Come by Paradise Motel for a naked snow cone social.  Our DJ will provide chill beats while you hang/ dance nude with others who have lost their clothes on the playa. Full nudist, first time, shirt cocker or freeing the nipple all welcomed. Never-nudes will be asked to leave.
print_description: Nude all week or just wanna lose the costume a bit? Swing by for Snowcones & Beats while ya hang w/others who’ve stripped. All nudity levels welcome!

title: Naked Wifi
description: Feeling disconnected on the playa? Need to get your internet fix? Come get naked with us and get a wifi password!
print_description: Feeling disconnected on the playa? Need to get your internet fix? Come get naked with us and get a wifi password!

title: Naked Yoga
description: Yoga gradually removes the false layers covering your true self. Begin with a powerful symbolic and liberating act: strip off your cloth layer. This all-levels practice will focus on awakening your largest sense organ to help ground you in the present moment.
print_description: Yoga gradually removes the false layers covering your true self. Begin with a powerful symbolic and liberating act: strip off your cloth layer.

title: Name that Hobo Icon!
description: If you start seeing some strange unexplained symbols around the playa - they might just be hobo icons.  Decipher three of these and come back to Hobo Camp (located within Conception), and get justly rewarded!  Hobo Icons were developed in the 1930s as code to help other hobos out, indicated things like "safe camping", or "judge lives here."  Keep your eyes out during the week and try and figure 'em out!
print_description: Notice strange unexplained symbols on the playa? Decipher 3 and come to Hobo Camp for your reward!

title: Na Zdrowie! Michal's Polish Vodka Bar
description: Come join the Electric Gypsies for the 2nd year of Michal's Polish Vodka Bar.  Offering a variety of unique vodkas.
print_description: Come join the Electric Gypsies for the 2nd year of Michal's Polish Vodka Bar.  Offering a variety of unique vodkas.

title: Neko Maid Cafe at Brulee!
description: Come play with Brulee dressed as maids (especially kitten maids) or butlers and create a host type atmosphere on the Playa. Hosts act as servants and treat "customers" as masters (and mistresses). Hosts are encouraged to refer to customers as Master/Mistress. Increasingly maid cafés offer services such as leg, arm, and back massages and "customers" can also sometimes play rock-paper-scissors, card and board games with maids as well as prepare arts and crafts and sing karaoke so all of those are welcome as well as bringing desserts and champagne to serve and share
print_description: Come play with Brulee dressed as maids (especially kitten maids) or butlers and create a host type atmosphere on the Playa.

title: Neon Nights Glow Party >^.^< )'(
description:
Just as the week is winding down come get your glow on! Our bar will still be up and running and fully glowing as we close out the week.

The bar serves Vodka, Tequila, Rum and Jameson mixed drinks or shots by request, and cold beer or cider (depending on what is on tap at the moment). The Cat's Meow is a bar and lounge with a relaxing vibe. Music, neon pillows, bean bag chairs, blow up couches, cuddle puddle in a glowing blacklight paradise!!
print_description: Just as the week is winding down come get your glow on! Our bar will still be up and running and fully glowing as we close out the week!! <3

title: New Moon Ceremony: Sound for Healing & Alignment
description: A new day and a new moon rise to lift you to the celestial realms, as Visudha de los Santos offers a magical trio of gongs, drums, and a guhzeng, in celebration of life and renewal. The tones and overtones will lift your spirit and move the energy within you. Bring your intentions and please wear white. Meet at the Temple East Gate at sunrise.

description: The New Moon is an ideal time to set intentions, and claim the experience that you really want- on playa and off. The Circle aims to provide a space for Burners to share and even heal together- encouraging connection, presence, and deep authenticity. Participants will be led in group exercises, and given the time and space to slow down, share stories, and check in. Location: Say YES to Circle @ Enchanted Booty Forrest Main Shade.

description: Last night activities wearing down on you? Does making coffee seem like such a chore? Don't you wish you can have Totally Legit™ cup of New Orleans style cold brew? Well now you can, each day we make a 15 gallon batch of delicious cold brew that brews for over 24 hours. BYOC.

print_description: Wish you could ring in the new year with your Burner family and friends?  We will party, dance and drink until mid-night. Kissing and singing at 12:00

description: All day Nobel Prize winners and the ideas that redefined what we know about the world. Come chill with the whale and open your brain up!
print_description: All day Nobel Prize winners and the ideas that redefined what we know about the world. Come chill with the whale and open your brain up!

title: NO Dimension Sufi Whirling Meditation
description: The SUFI whirling started in the heart of the desert, looking towards the infinity of the horizon. Standing still, connecting to the earth, and expanding our hands toward the universe, the SUFi begins to swirl joining the infinite movement of the planets. The participants will synchronize our movements, breath and heart beat to become conduits of this infinite energy that derives from the cosmos. In doing so, we become grounded amounts the chaos all around and reunite with the infinite energy within as we spread i it in all directions. WELCOME! Come stand still in time and watch the expansive SUFi whirling come from within!
print_description: Invoking dance & ritual to connect with the divine. Synchronizing our movements, breath & heart beat to become conduits of this Divinity.

title: No Irish Car Bomb Party
description: No Zach means no Irish Car Bomb party. We are taking the car bomb party mobile, come find us on the playa. Or come to camp to get an ice cold beer.
print_description: No Zach means no Irish Car Bomb party. We are taking the car bomb party mobile, come find us on the playa. Or come to camp to get an ice cold beer.

title: Non-Monogamy Advice Booth
description:
Managing non-traditional relationships on the playa comes with its own unique challenges. If you need someone to talk to about yours, come on by and chat with a sexologist or well-informed camp mates that will listen to you and offer suggestions to get you through the week. Look for the yellow booth and If no one is behind the counter, ring the bell and we’ll see what we can do for you.

Camp Yes Please
8:15-ish at Donatello
print_description: Managing non-traditional relationships on the playa comes with its own unique challenges. If you need someone to talk to about yours, come on by!

title: NOODLEPOCALYPSE
description:
It's the NOODLEPOCALYPSE. 

It's cold, filthy, and far from home out there. There may be wolves, or people dressed like wolves, or a screaming metal monster than someone once called a wolf before science happened to it! No matter, what you need is safety, light, and food! We've got yer back!

Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. And hey-ho-diddley-hey chuckles, they ain't from no styrofoam cup. Come on down to flavor country, and ride the noodle! (No actual rides present at camp, just noodles...please don't try and ride your noodles, that would just be awkward, and probably messy)

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
No, they're not gluten free, they're frikkin noodles.
No, they're not vegan. Stop asking. We're not that kind of noodle.
There probably won't be any pandas, geese, or other assorted whimsical creatures unless you bring them yourself.
print_description: Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, and they ain't from no styrofoam cup. No, Not vegan, where do you think you are?

title: NOODLEPOCALYPSE #2!
description:
It's the ReNoodlification! 

In the end times, the noodles shall save us, the noodles shall give us life, the noodles shall be our guide! An earlier, second, noodle extravaganza for those who aren't as night-owley, or possibly younger than others. Noodles dispensed with glee and abandon! Bad jokes! Pink monkeys!

Get'cher tasty noodles. We'll have 'em till we don't, you'll slurp 'em down till they're gone. Delicious noodles, yummy hot dog pieces, everything you need for evening fun!

AND BEFORE YOU ASK:
Not gluten free, not vegan. Seriously, stop asking, the hot dogs should be a dead giveaway.
Also, there probably won't be any pandas, geese, or other assorted whimsical creatures unless you bring them yourself.
print_description: Get'cher hot, salty, broth and noodles. It's a kid friendly 2nd Noodle Fest! We'll have 'em till we don't. No, Not vegan, look for the hot dogs!!

title: Noon nap time with Enya
description: Come sail away with the sleepy sounds of Enya for an hour of tranquility and a misty sea breeze.
print_description: Come sail away with the sleepy sounds of Enya for an hour of tranquility and a misty sea breeze.

title: Nordic Midsommar Party!
description:
Nordic burners are bringing our favorite celebration of the year to playa: Midsommar!
===
There are infinite ways of enjoying Midsommar – and your way is the true way. Wrap yourself up in what will be a party of surreal levels of myth and ancient Viking traditions, or just enjoy what seems to be a pretty straight forward kids’ party for grown-ups celebrating fertility. 


There will be enigmatic traditional dancing, confused games, and drinks that will make you sing songs of tales long forgotten. And it will all take place below the 30 feet tall fertility penis, err, maypole, which will watch over us all and make us fertile as all fuck.


For an optimal midsummer celebration and a magical night, you must find 7 flowers in our camp to dream of your future love, do the traditional frog dance, and drink an absurd amount of schnapps!


For an optimal midsummer celebration and a maxed out magical night you will need to find 7 kinds of flowers in our camp, which will make you dream of your future love. Last but not least, there will of course be spaced out frog dancing and an absurd amount of snaps!


If the party gets too weird, you can also have a ‘fika’ to see we have more conventional customs as well.


The party will take place at the Northern Light Camp 3.15 & Florian Thursday 4.


Maypole dance and games will take place between 4 and 6pm. 


Lots and love, flowers, rainbows and fluffy greetings,

The Northern Lights Camp
print_description:
Our favorite celebration of the year on playa: Midsommar

Mystic traditional dancing, games, and drinks around a non-traditional Midsommar Maypole!

title: Nurturing Hope and Resilience
description: How do we nurture hope for a healthy future and face the struggles inherent in making a difference?  Using a motto of "educate, empower, engage", this session will explore core foundations of our beliefs and obstacles to civic engagement and how we can overcome thought traps, create cycles of hope, and identify ways to participate in sustainable solutions.

title: Open Dungeon Play
description: Playfully Yours is now a Village with 4 camps. Playfully Yours Dungeon is a play space for you to learn and experience sensation play in our well-equipped dungeon. We encourage beginners, intermediates and those curious about BDSM play to come, learn, and experience in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, softer, and more sensual side of BDSM. Our personnel are available to provide instructions and demonstrations on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise play or can help facilitate play.  We’ll also have an outdoor dungeon play area equipped with a double St Andrews Cross, spanking bench, and stock. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates if you are over 21 years old with id. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving cherry bombs, and a spinning wheel to facilitate participation. In Mist’R Cool’s Camp you can have the Cool Mist Experience with a fully automated misting booth, try to put together oversized 3D and 2D puzzles, show off with a 10’ dance pole, and experience the Cool Massage with a new and advanced sensual massager. Come for a private intimate portrait session in Bare Naked Tramps Portrait Studio. Individuals, couples, and groups are all welcome. Relax and enjoy great company in the exquisitely decorated Marshmallow Lounge. There will be libations for your pleasure and theme nights get dressed up for such a James Bond 007 party. Check other listings as we also offer daily classes and events.
print_description: Enjoy the outdoor dungeon, puzzles, spank bike, misting booth, an enclosed dungeon, 2 lounge areas, intimate portrait studio, and a sensual massager.

description: Need a safe, cool place to get it on? Cum to "And Then There's Only Love" for our world famous, air conditioned Orgy Dome. title: Oppression and Intimacy: Renaissance Relationships
description:
Liberating Ourselves from Patriarchy, Racism, and Heteronormativity in our Relationships On and Off Playa -
Come! Dive into how oppression affects your most intimate and interpersonal dynamics as well as the fantasies running through your own head. This will be a safer space to explore how oppression plays out in your relationships and in your own desires. You will gain tips and tools for how to liberate your mind and how to creatively and sexily shift cultural narratives that don't serve you. This workshop is for people of all backgrounds and genders from kinksters to vanillas, sexperts to just beginning to explore, queer to straight, poly folks to monogamous folks, partnered to single, and all that's in between - everyone is welcome!
print_description: Liberating ourselves from Patriarchy, Racism, and Heteronormativity in our Relationships on and off playa - for people of all backgrounds.

title: Orgasmic Meditation for Women - What, Why & How
description: OM (orgasmic meditation) is a sequenced practice in which one partner gently strokes the other partner’s clitoris for 15 minutes. The result is said to be therapeutic, rather than sexual. The “stroking” activates the limbic system and releases a flood of oxytocin. The technique was originally billed as a spiritual-style practice like meditation, but as it gains popularity, it’s being presented as more of a “technological innovation” or “body-hack to happiness.” The “guru” of the technique, 46-year-old Nicole Daedone, guarantees that it’s profound whether you’re coupled or single.   This course will be strictly women and transfolks so that everyone can experience the electricity on both sides of the position.
print_description: Orgasmic Meditation is a partnered practice & we will be only women and transfolks.  Each woman can experience stroking & getting stroked!

description:
We will have 10 pre-stretched and heavy duty canvases that are 3'x4' tiled together to create a 30' x4' artists playground. We will supply all water based acrylic paints in an array of colors. We will supply all brushes and artist knives. We will have palate mixing available as well as ample water and rags to assist you in color changes. We will maintain the entegraty of this project and make sure there is everything you need to get lost in your own world of art expression. We will have satellite radio for your listening pleasure and will keep the wall lit for several hours at night too! And the end of the event we will disassemble the wall and randomly distribute the finished canvases. These rare gifts will each hold the work of hundreds of passing artists who will have combined to create the memory of BRC 2016!!!
AND...while you are there and if you dare, Thomas delFuego will let you choose a Rune from his pile of hand painted Runes. These stones on 10,000 year old sand concretions and will speak to your heart and that very moment:):):) Come join Thomas and Darma delFuego and become our friends for life!
print_description:
10 canvas Interactive painting wall with our paints/brushes/30' x4' Canvas wall. Canvases given away at event end.
Rune Readings and music daily

title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start to dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) at 11:00am daily. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 800 commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited or inappropriate touching is prohibited. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.
print_description: Serving cold Tiki Punch to BRC citizens 21+ for 8 years. Have a seat, enjoy the rock, get naked here & you may get lei'd. Please bring own cup and ID.

title: Passion Experience - Nadav Wilf
description:
Long Description:

The Lifestyle Perfected Passion Experience: Living the Life You Love

In this fun and enlivening workshop, you will learn a new context for passion and how to consistently live in a passionate state. Imagine living your life where you are spending the majority of your time doing what you love? Feeling alive and excited about waking up in the morning to experience the day. What would that be like for you? 

Through this workshop you will create a step by step process to:
Understand a new context for passion
Get a clear picture of your passions and what you love to do
Create the steps and room in your life to do things you are passionate about
Share your passions with others to build a community of likeminded people
See an increase in happiness and living a life you love
print_description: Passion is not something we have, it's who we are. Learn how to balance your life and spend the majority of your time living in your passions.

title: Phrygianism and the Refoamation
description:
Adam Eidinger spills the beans on organizing creative direct action as an art form. A leader in the camp Refoamation, Adam's philosophy of Phrygianism combines citizen action, psychedelics and civil defense.  In 2014 Adam legalized marijuana in Washington, DC and will talk strategy.  He'll also speak about the Liberty Cap and its role for thousands of years connecting liberation struggles since Roman times as well the to cap's connection to psychedelic spirituality in the Mithra tradition

Adam has been arrested 18 times fighting for justice in the Belly of the Beast, Washington, DC.  He is the social action director for Dr. Bronner's Magic Soaps and is the foam OG who first set up the magic foam at Burning Man with Kris Bronner in 2009.  Since then he's helped lead the Dr. Bronner' camp (called Refoamation in 2016) as it has expanded its perfoaming activities.  Adam has been making creative plans for major protests since 2000.  His talk will reveal practical tips and advice for anyone activist or non-activist.  Adams lives by the creed of Ralph Nader who once said, "If you don't turn onto politics, politics will turn on you."
print_description: Creative direct action as an art form. Adam Eidinger speaks about Phrygianism which combines citizen action and psychedelics.

title: Pinhole Camera Photography with Pinhole Project
description:
Come check out our pinhole camera and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project has brought to the playa twelve very large pinhole cameras created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. Join us in our annual pilgrimage to use old school pinhole photography on the playa.

The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
print_description: Come play with us, we do pinhole photography on the playa!

title: Planetary Peace Project - Sacred Theater Ritual
description:
Calling all visionaries, healers and change makers.  Join us for the Planetary Peace Project's Sacred Theater Ritual at  Burning Man's largest structure, The Catacombs where we will be Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace.  Friends, the time is upon us. Drawing on the profound energy of the playa, we will presence the sacred dream of planetary peace knowing this is not only possible - it is the only way forward for humankind. It is time to claim this dream and bring it into our bodies, our lives, and our Earth.

Meet us at The Catacombs & 10 o'clock to co-create a Sacred Theater Ritual that will take place deep within the Catacombs and within ourselves. Together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing, and embodied peace.  Bring your creativity and playfulness. Wear white if you can. Bring singing bowls, bells, gongs and your desire to co-create planetary peace through one of the largest sacred theater rituals on the planet.
print_description: Opening the Portal to Planetary Peace, together we will call forth forgiveness, personal healing,  and embodied peace. It's time! Bring bells & gongs.

title: Playa Name Ceremony - Anoint Thy Name
description:
Humans are creatures of ritual. The Burning of the Man is a ritual. The lighting of the lamps is a ritual. Building and visiting the temple is a ritual for many. Playa names are a ritual. What's been missing is a ritual that recognizes and honors playa names. 

Have a playa name? Embrace the rite of passage. It is never too late. 

Don't have a playa name? Find any veteran of ten burns and request to spend time with them so they may divine a name that suits you. Or stop by Zerodrome days before this event for assistance from one of our sages.

Standing among peers, be acknowledged and born again as a child of the Burn. The Grand Zero of Black Rock leads the ceremony, summoning and channeling the eternal energies that bind atoms throughout the universe. Swell with the pride of legitimacy through this rite of passage.

Look for the Road Cone near the Identity Reorganization Portal
print_description: Just as burning of the Man is ritual, we honor your playa name accordingly. Take the rite of passage to legitimize the name by which Burners know you.

title: Play in the Desert Darkroom with Pinhole Project
description: Come develop photographs and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project invites you to help us in the Desert Darkroom! We maintain a full wet black and white photographic darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs. Photographs made of paper with traditional chemicals and no digital input. The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject. We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa. The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999.
print_description: Come develop photographs and play with us, we do pinhole photography! Pinhole Project invites you to help us in the Desert Darkroom!

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: Facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed about Polyamoury and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

title: Poly Juice Box
description: Think poly is complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with or contemplating children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like (or dare)! If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry - it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. This will be their 8th Burn, and the second with their 5 year old daughter, Veronica. Don't expect us to have all the answers, instead come to both learn and teach! Juice boxes and animal crackers provided to help grease the conversation.
print_description: Think poly is complicated? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with children.

While you wait (or stroll the piazza), we'll bake your piece and then return it to you, ready to be displayed, cherished and remembered.

title: Porn & Donuts
description:
What's better than a deliciously decadent donut? How about a side of hot porn? Movies start screening at about 10pm. Hot hand crafted donuts are fresh off the fryers by midnight. 

Porn and Donuts was started in 2011. Our mission at PND is to serve deliciously decadent doughnut delights to as many dusty hungry burners as we possibly can. We screen top-notch vintage (silent era) pornography in our outdoor movie theater while serving hot, fresh, on playa made donuts.

Last year we served approximately 3,000 freshly donuts prepared on playa (300 pounds of dry donut mix). We even managed to convert one or two vegetarians along the way.

title: Project Prayer Song Recording Event
description:
We’re creating a “digital world choir” out of human beings from across the planet, and from all walks of life, regardless of race, religion, nationality or social status. What does that mean exactly? It means that we’d love to use YOUR voice alongside tens of thousands (or more) of other people just like you from around the globe for use in a song. A song that’s written for everyone. But more importantly, we’re creating an inspiring new story as part of a full length feature documentary… a story that we’d like you to be a part of.

Project Prayer Song is about creating something bigger, collectively, than any of us ever could by ourselves. Our intention is to paint a picture of some of the challenges we face as human beings, and to unite singers, musicians and everyday people from around the globe to demonstrate through music and film, that we can create incredible beauty if we work together.
print_description: We’re creating a “digital world choir” out of human beings from across the planet, and from all walks of life.

title: Qoya- Gratitude is a Superpower
description:
"What you look for is what you see? If you look for gratitude, you will surely find it. 
 
 Qoya is based on the idea through movement, we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms that we practice. Wise- the wisdom of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy being in our bodies through more sensual and feminine flowing movement. In Qoya, there is no way you can do it wrong and the way you know you're doing it right is that it feels good in your body. More than feeling good, is that it feels honest."
print_description: Say thank you for everything through movement practices, a gratitude despacho ceremony, conscious community & a pilgrimage across the playa here.

title: Raw Honey Tastings from around the world!
description: From light to dark, runny to viscous to crystallized, raw honey embodies the diversity of communities around the world—one hive next to another has as different a personality ranging from relaxed and buzzy to aggressive and defensive.  Ann with an E and RamonaMayhem invite BRC BeePpl to the dHive bar to taste the ambrosia of the flowers and the trees produced by the honeybee. We also educate people on adulterated honey (over filtered, pasteurized, and HFCS added) and provide a sample of that as well.  Get your proboscis wet as we honey lovers stick together!  Easiest way to find the dHive bar is to look for our Do More Now 7 story fire building on 7:30 & Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!  Bzzzz!
print_description: Wonder why honey is light, dark, runny, or viscous?  Come taste and find out many of nature's finest secrets from the only food we eat from an insect!

title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans
description: Making drinking plans for your camp? Do those plans include lots and lots of cans? Want to unload those empty cans on playa while also helping the city of Gerlach? Well come on down to Recycle Camp and SHOW US YOUR CANS!!!  At Recycle Camp we want all of your ALUMINUM cans as part of our gift to the playa. We are located at 6 and Center Circle behind the Center Camp Cafe and will be open every day until 5pm. No drop offs allowed, when you get there you will help us quickly separate your cans before riding the Crushinator, our magical bicycle-powered can crushing apparatus, to compact the cans so we can store as many as possible before scrapping the aluminum off-site. All of the money we generate from can recycling is donated to the Gerlach school system. We only accept aluminum cans so please keep all of your soup or heavy metal cans. If you are unsure if it is aluminum a good rule of thumb is if you can't crush it, then we don't want it. Also, some stout beers like Guinness also have a plastic widget that cannot be recycled with the aluminum, please remove of be conscious of it before bringing them to us. PROTIP from the Recyclenauts: bring a MESH bag to store all of your cans in. Plastic bags won't allow your cans to dry out, so please store them in a mesh bag before bringing them over to Recycle Camp and help make things a little less juicy for us when we crush them. Be smart, plan ahead, Recycle Camp wants YOU to come CRUSH it with us!!! We are CLOSED ON MONDAY, plan ahead!
print_description: (Please use 2015 text)

description:
"Intentional living, micro-communities, sustainable developments, matriarchies: What does the next generation of conscious housing arrangements look like?

How can we create happier, healthier, more sustainable human developments, facilitating an evolution of consciousness through innovating and architecting the future through our homes?

description:
Lookers right of the MAN till he burns 9am-9pm Playa Bike Badge Pounding at the Repousse Cafe. 
Get on your knees and ditch the pitch! Pound out a custom bike badge for your pimping ride using our very own recycled Playa as the pitch material. Meet world renowned pounders and get a chance to handle their hammers while on your knees. 6-7 silent pounding. 7-8 rhythmic pounding to show tunes. Go home with more than a smirk on your face... Open to most humans, MacGyver fans, Virgos, and stripper/go-go dancers preferred.
Aug 28-Sept 2. 
24-7 Repousse Cafe open for POUNDING at the Guild Workshops. The man and 12:30
Step right up and Pound or be Pounded. Tap tap tap, chink, clunk, press and presto! Beat something, Chase a pounder, pound a chaser, bring plenty of snacks and drinks to share while you chase and pound exotic metals with exotic eccentric people.

title: Reverbia Interactive Live Music Art Wall Mural
description: Reverbia presents for the first time our Reverbia Interactive Live Music Art Wall Mural!  As our Live Music resonates through your ears, share your depths of perspective and emotion through the iterative expression of Art Wall Painting. Noted Canadian artist Danielle Caners, leads an expedition into the realms of unknown, improvised art, where only through the collective creative mind, can a masterpiece be discovered.  Daily and nightly, when the live music is playing, come share your artistic expression by painting upon our mural canvas wall.  Portions of Reverbia's Art Wall Mural will be painting between established lines, while other areas of the Art Wall Mural will be free formed expression.  *Note that the Reverbia Art Wall Mural will not be open 24 hours…but will operate throughout the day and night whenever our artist supervision  is available.  During Reverbia's concerts in the Shade Series and Reverbia Live Nights…the Art Wall Mural will be the most consistently available for public painting and expression.
print_description: As our Live Music resonates through your ears, share your depths of perspective and emotion through the interactive expression of an Art Wall Mural!

title: Rise & Shine Salutation Yoga
description:
Start your day out right by joining us at Huggzilla for a sunrise yoga session with Benji!

Greet the sun as it warms and nourishes both you and the earth simultaneously. Become one with the sequence of harmony that envelops and awakens both earth and body. Learn to be the generator of your own inner peace through a physical connection to the earth by focusing body and mind.

Enhance your muscular strength and body flexibility, promote and improve respiratory and cardiovascular function, promote recovery from and treatment of addiction, reduce stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain, improve sleep patterns, and enhance your overall well-being and quality of life.

Length: 60min
Level: Intermediate

*Sun Greeting - Sun Salutation sequence
*Art of Letting Go - Grounding Exercises
*Yoga Poses - From the Ground Up

description:
During this year's Open Lab Hours, we will transform our dome structure into the highly advanced Metamorphosis Transducer Dome. Before entering the event, our Test Subjects must pass through the dome where they will be given the option to be converted into either a robot or an alien form.

Our Scientists will then equip the guests with their choice of robot arm tubes, alien deeliboppers, green or silver facepaint, etc. Inside they can trade parts, commiserate with their fellow aliens or robots, and/or decide the future of intelligent life in this galaxy as it pertains to the outcome of the great Robot-Alien War.... as they ponder the galactic beats.

title: Roman Relaxation
description: Akin to the bustle of ancient Rome, it is easy to get swept up in the din of Black Rock City and lose contact with oneself. Under our dome we offer a tranquil oasis to nurture the most important connection of all: with one’s self.  Upon crossing the threshold to our world, the weary explorer will be guided through a Roman hand washing ritual complete with scented waters (+citric acid for the dust!) before being led to a cushioned couch where they will be feed and fed grapes and fan away the desert heat with palm-leaf fans.
print_description: Escape into ancient Rome with our collaborative Roman hand washing ritual with scented waters (+citric acid for the dust) and palm-leaf fans

title: Rootist Yoga
description:
#RootistYoga - a style of yoga that is intentionally designed with sequences that help to facilitate energetic clearing, energy flow and manifestation. It will incorporate various styles of yoga & pranayama techniques to help foster a stronger core, increase strength and open/balance chakra energies. The workshop incorporates core strengthening exercises, pranayama, group asanas, connected yoga, hug healing & sound vibrational tuning and resetting of frequnecies.

The workshop is open to all levels of yogis who wish to attend & is a great way to release the day.

title: Rule trading, making and printing
description:
Medieval Germany is known for the stories collected by Brothers Grimm, the Hanse trading company, people obeying to the rules of their kings, and
Gutenbergs art of printing. All of these attributes are reflected in the G.E.R.M.A.N. guild workshop. This workshop is about rule making and printing. Following a playful structure, a personal rule of life and/or behavior is told and traded for a new rule, which is chosen or created by chance. To make this new rule a temporary or permanent part of the participants life, he or she can print this rule on pieces of old German files, badges, wristbands or even body parts.
print_description: It's time to give and receive guidance for your life. Let fate (and our shiny judge) decide, and create yourself a personal permanent reminder.

title: Runner's Restorative Yoga & Gentle Yoga

So you just ran the Black Rock City Ultramarathon (or maybe, you danced so much you FEEL like you ran 50k) - come and relax with some gentle, restorative yoga. We'll work on opening up those super-tight hips, stretching those hamstrings, and making our body feel all-around good. No, making our body feel pretty excellent.

No yoga experience is necessary. If you have a mat or a towel, bring it. We will have some extras (but not enough for everyone). Bring some water.

This is open to everyone at Burning Man, not just runners.

Bring a mat or towel if you can.

title: Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy MEDITATION
description:
TONE YOUR SOUL offers…
Quantum Sound & Sacred Scalar Energy GROUP MEDITATION
 
Uproot unproductive subconscious thought patterns, shed pounds of emotional baggage and re-ignite your connection to Source!

Stand in your strength and actualize your greatest life!
 
In this experiential journey facilitated by Sharon & Lothlorien, you will participate in a group meditation using Quantum Sound Technologies as a method of Energetic Stress Release.

As well, the VAS (Voice Analysis System) Technology analyzes the groups voice sample, and then creates custom frequencies that the group then listens to. What’s in YOUR Voice is in YOUR Life
 
The leading premise of the VAS technology is that every human voice has a unique frequency that is measurable. These tones will balance and harmonize the group energy and facilitate personal shifts on many levels.
 
Please bring yoga mat/towel and pillow and get comfortable.

Sharon is a licensed Spiritual Health Coach and grateful for the opportunity to share these amazing tools for change.

title: Realtime authentic relating games
description:
In this workshop we are going to play a few authentic relating games that center on connection. We stay in the present moment, report on our current experiences, and do our best to stay objective about the observations we make.
 
 For instance, if we want to only say things that are so objective that a camera could pick up on them, we might say "I notice your eyes are squinting and I see you are smiling" instead of "I see that you are happy".
 
 Because we don't know if that person is happy for sure, they could be putting on a face because they are nervous and afraid!
print_description: Let's shed judgements and assumptions, and reveal our true selves through connection games!

title: Release & Receive Workshop
description:
"The root of all suffering is attachment." - Buddha 

As humans, we like to grasp....everything. Things, people, ideas, beliefs, emotions, the past, the future. If it is within our reach, we want it, we want control of it and we don't want to let it go. 

Unfortunately our attachments often become a roadblock on our journey of life, preventing us from living as the fullest and most beautiful expression of who we are. 

Join us for a conscious conversation around attachment and learn tools to finally RELEASE what is not serving you. Through this process of releasing, we open our hands, our minds and our hearts to the universe and RECEIVE all of her glory 🙏❤️
print_description: Join us for a conscious conversation around attachment and learn tools to finally RELEASE what is not serving you.

title: Samasati Meditation
description: Samasati means awareness or consciousness. The purpose of this meditation is to bring awareness to the denial and fear people have regarding death. The goal of this meditation is to practice the art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances. Be aware and remember that since you are alive, you must not take your life for granted. Choose the position: 'I will always value my life.' Appreciating my life means waking up every morning and looking into the mirror, and saying to myself, 'I am so happy to be alive!' Thank you Osho, for helping me to create this meditation." I designed this meditation so that it can be done in a group or by yourself. The first six stages are an oppertunity to practice dying consciously, a rehearsal for the end of your life. The remaining four stages are a reminder to live totally and cherish each moment.
print_description: Bring awareness to the denial and fear regarding death. The art of witnessing rather than reaching to situations and circumstances.

title: Savage 3D Audio Performances
description:
Experience live music the Savage way - in 3D!!! Music Savages Camp is excited to transport you to the future - where the beats and sounds and rhythms will come from all dimensions. The Savage Arena is outfitted with 16 speakers, mounted around the perimeter and above the dance floor - all facing inward. And at the center, our performers will take control of their music, sending sounds to all reaches of space. 

Are those crickets on the playa??? No... bugs were so last year. Is that a train coming through my tent??? No.. while we would like to make a train, the tracks could be problematic for bikers without headlamps. Is that a spaceship landing in a daybed??? maybe... but you're probably just hearing things from the future... SAVAGE 3D. It's here. 

Oh.. and we have cool lights.
print_description: Experience live music the Savage way - in 3D!!! With 16 speakers around and above the dance floor, it'll be like you're hearing for the first time!

title: Scale Mail Weaving
description:
Ever wanted to learn the art of weaving scale mail into glorious, glimmering battle gear, costumes, jewelry, or other metal creations? If so, then this is the Renaissance workshop for you! 

Learn the basic weave for linking scales together, as well as a few advanced tips like creating a dart or a reinforced edge that you can apply to more complicated pieces. 

Weaving scale mail is a tedious process, so you won't be leaving with a new vest or shirt, but you should have a small piece (perhaps some earrings or a wrist cuff) that you made during the class that you can wear away to sparkle in the sun.
print_description: Learn to weave scale mail for battle gear, costumes, jewelry, or other shiny things. Learn the basic weave and wear away a small piece you made.
other_location: Davinci's Workshops, Guild of Mile Higher Knowlede (A2 by the Man)

title: Renoardo's Artisan Menagerie
description:
We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences. We have our own metal stamp label that we use to "mark" our handiwork.Our masks are the finest in the region & our artists have the flare of Leonardo.

In the spirit of Carnivale, our menagerie started creating masks & providing instruction on how to create them. As our group increased, so did our artisan base to include painters & sketch artists. We plan to have classes in making & decorating masks along with art classes in anatomy & anything inspiring to those attending.We will have live models to help with inspiration.We will have a plexiglas panel for instruction and colouring.

Art classes will be held daily ranging from anatomy to landscapes, with live models or use of the plexiglas wall as a template.

The Plexiglas wall will be available at all times with markers to color on one side while the design is created on the other.A participant can take a picture of the creation to later print and add to their coloring book.


Our Artisan Menagerie is thrilled to provide the joy of creative expression mixed with various mediums from plexiglas to foam to paper.
print_description: We are a group of artisans who travel incognito while instructing others in the fine art of making masks, anatomy illustration, & other indulgences.
other_location: Guild Workshop at The Man Base

title: SCOTCHFEST
description: Yo, Mukker!! Still kickin’ y’self for missing last year, eh...? 100 bottles of single malt on the bar and you weren’t there!? Like a nightmare you can’t wake from. Except, you CAN... ‘Cause we’re doin’ it again! That’s right, Scotchfest is back -- your basic confluence of peat, dust, and obsessed freaks like you! The rules are simpler than golf, so pay attention... Bring a bottle of your favorite drop to the Mystikal Misfits bar (4:30 & B) at 2 pm, Wednesday, August 31st. MALT FESTIVAL, jocko – exotic, unique, transcendent -- and we’re looking to learn what YOU like. In return, every other souser presents a bottle of their best game, so make no other plans until 6 pm. Be prepared for Scottish music, savory nibbles, and a superlative group of like-minded Burner scotch freaks! They don’t do this kind of thing where you live, boyo, so mark it down. And remember, it’s an exclusive event -- NO BOTTLE, NO ENTRY. So, if you’re tromping through the desert stour spewing feathers like a twally, know that Lassie or Laddie, skuddy roaster or minted dobber, we’ll be gettin’ belter blootered at the Misfits, mate... If you ain’t geein it yaldy, hell slap it intae ye! And as we’re fond of saying, “A dram good time will be had by all!”
print_description: Join for a once-a-year massive tasting featuring over 100 bottles with like-minded fans. Entry requires a bottle of single malt (No blends) Sláinte!

title: Scotch & Hop: Scotch Bar
description: Bringing out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, comes Scotch & Hop. Combining the fun game of Hop Scotch with one of the most wonderful beverages to grace the planet, Scotch makes for an entertaining and social area where people from all areas, and even all ages (with Children, being the under-21 crowd,) creating a silly and fun set of events bringing out the child in all of us. The social events for Scotch & Hop take different types and games of Hop Scotch from all over the world, and have people jump around and play various forms of the game. Once a Black Rock citizen, who is over 21, has completed a game, they are invited in for a Scotch or Scotch cocktail. (And usually we include other adult-beverages.) Getting young and old, from all across the planet, together and playing Hop Scotch makes people remember the silliness of when they were kids. Also being able to have children be able to play along in the games opens up the experience to everyone.
print_description: Bring out childhood memories and mixing them in with adult libations, Hop Scotch & Scotch. (All ages welcome, 21+ to enjoy Scotch).

title: See Art in Three Dimensions
description: Don our red/cyan 3-D glasses and view the world in a new light! Our resident anaglyph photographer  invites you see depth and realism in what appear to be flat photographic prints. Our prolific and fecund photog invites you to gaze beyond the flat of the land to more pregnant sights. It’s so real! He has images on 2-D paper that will protrude into your mind and fertilize your imagination. Cited techniques will be available so that you can do it yourself at home, using a digital camera and photo software, and don't forget to take a free pair of viewers with you (while supplies last!)

title: See Your Light, Love Your Light- True Reflections
description:
A True Reflections Palace - showcasing mirrors that do not reverse left and right!

Come see the sparkle in your eyes from the light in your soul.  These mirrors reflect you as you are, not reversed, and are truly magical!  

Theres both science and an art here - your face "works" when you see it as it truly is.  In contrast it stops working, and you tend to stare at yourself in mirrors. Then get self-critical all too often. Even if you are feeling wonderful, like all so many times at Burning Man, a mirror doesn't reflect it naturally, so you tend to lose that sparkle and start to question your good feelings.  

In contrast, when you look in one of these true reflection mirrors, your face keeps working!  Your eyes, which have so much beautiful information in them, continue to have that same information that you can see.  This is what we see and read so well when we look at you.  That sparkle when you are happy, that depth when you are being deep, that vitality and genuineness that we know about you, now you can see it too!  So easy to believe in yourself when you see all that true energy you have. 

The result?  Expect to be absolutely floored.  You are an amazing creature - a Human Being, and now you can see what that really looks, and feels like.  The feedback loop you find yourself in now is clear and complete, so smiles look like real smiles and you will smile back.  Complete with sparkle!!! Beautiful!

There's lots of posters in the Palace (which is made from giant tinker style toys) to explain it all.  If you don't see the magic, ask one of us for a demo and explanation. .. we want to get you to your own AHA moment!   

Note-this is the same Palace that has been under the Man, on Playa, on Esplanade and in Center Camp!  Don't Miss It - Its Magic!
print_description: Come see for yourself the Sparkle in your Eyes from the Light in your Soul.  These True Reflection mirrors reflect you as you are. Truly magical!

title: Self-Compassion
description:
Self-Compassion: Connecting with Your Inner Resiliency for Sustainable Personal Growth.

So many of us go through our lives being very hard on ourselves. Leading psychologists indicate that people who are compassionate toward their failings and imperfections experience greater wellbeing than those who repeatedly judge themselves.  This talk will discuss the topic of self compassion and offer attendees techniques to enhance their emotional well being and be more compassionate with themselves in order to sustain long-term personal growth.
