title: Sensual touch and tickling by Domme Sage
description: Touch is a vital part of whom we are, how we interact with the world, and most importantly how you connect with a partner or loved one. Many of us have engaged in sensual touch with a lover or tickling at a young age, but are you aware of how well the two can work together to make an amazing sensory experience with someone? Whether it is tickling to tears, to moans of delight, or simply squirming Kelli Lynn Sage (Domme Sage) is well versed in this and will be leading this class in sensual touch and the art of tickling with a partner. Domme Sage has learned the ropes over the years and wants to pass her wisdom on to you. She will instruct you, with the help of her assistants and volunteers, on the art of tickling and sensual touch. This event is for those 18 years old and over (please bring your ID if you look young). We may be requesting volunteers from the audience for some aspects of the class, so if you are eager to be part of this hands on experience let us know. People of all gender identities are welcome to attend. It is best if you can come with a partner so you can practice some of what you learn, if you come alone we cannot guarantee to partner you up with someone. We recommend bringing a towel or something similar to lay on the ground to sit on. In addition we ask that you be respectful of all participants and remind you to ask before touching someone that you have not made arrangements before hand.
print_description: Domme Sage will lead a class on how sensual touch and tickling works together to create a fun & erotic experience. Bring a towel/blanket & a partner.

title: Sexploration! A Gender Blender Play Party 9PM-1AM
description:
Get your Sexploration on! It’s time to get hot and sexy with other fabulous gender queer, trans, and queer folks!

This party is a safe space for trans, gender queer, gender variant, queer, open minded, unidentified folks to get their freak on. Sexy, hot, & off the hook. We practice safer sex and in order to play you must also. This party is designed with queer folks in mind. It is specifically a safe space for gender blenders, gender benders, trans, and gender questioning folks. It also is a safe space for cisgender queer folks. Feel free to bring toys, condoms, gloves, lube, and cute people - of course we will also be providing. 
Consent in our GenderBlender dome is a must. Keep it safe, sane, and consensual. We take our consent and safety seriously, if you are not interested in fun safe play, don't show up. If you can't play safely then you can't play in our dome. 
If you are ready for an amazing fabulous glittery kickin play party then this is the spot for you! All levels of play are welcome from first timers to sexperts. Respect in our dome is paramount. We are creating a unique space that is not found anywhere else on playa. 
This party is for people of all genders with a priority on creating safety for communities that are normally marginalized or exoticized. We can't wait to see your hotness shine at this phenomenal event.

All genders welcome all ways.

title: SHAMANIC BODYWORK to Destroy Your Demons
description:
2Man guides you to clear dark forces that haunt your body, mind, and spirit. Heal yourself to heal the world.
 
Body, mind, and spirit are all flip sides of the same three-sided coin (spirit counts as a side). We store psychological and spiritual traumas in our bodies and many of us are unsure how to unwind knots that exist on multiple levels. Experienced shamanic practitioner and bodyworker 2Man will guide a group session that guides us through the initial stages of practicing shamanic bodywork. Learn how to get centered in Spirit before starting a session, how to recognize the energetic and physical traumas your subject is carrying, and body/energy/spirit work for destroying the demons that haunt your body, mind, and spirit.  with 2man-Matt King
print_description: 2Man guides you to clear dark forces that haunt your body, mind, and spirit. Heal yourself to heal the world.

title: Shamanic Journeying with the Breath
description: Now is the time to wake up to our ability to heal ourselves, to be the guru, healer, and being of light that we are are and choose to express that in our current reality. As we heal our nervous system of the trauma and pain accumulated from the experience of learning in our human bodies, we create a space for expansion and connection. We summon you all to hear the call within you, stand in courage, and bravely face down your pain and trauma and emerge whole and fully expressed as an innocent, fearless, loving, joyous being. We recognize that it is important to be respectful of indigenous cultures and practices when using the term "Shaman". The Ceremony leaders do not consider themselves to be Shamans, yet we find it is the best way to describe the ritual being used in this healing ceremony so we feel good about using this term to describe the practice, not the leaders. Shamanism is the practice of inducing trance in order to achieve a state of non-ordinary reality in order to communicate with the source energy that flows through all of life, healing spirits, animal spirit guides, angels, and ancestors. This practice also calls upon the elemental forces for cleansing and healing of mind, body, and spirit. Pranic Journeying takes us into a place of non-ordinary reality where deep release of mental, emotional, and physical blocks may occur. In this state we are open to receive deep esoteric truths, connect with our helping spirits and ancestors, and merge with our higher self and higher consciousness. The journey is unique based on the individual although the group undergoes a unique journey together as well. Each journey can be very different as the healing intelligence of spirit knows just where to take us to safely clear the energy in alignment with our intentions. There are many ways to induce a shamanic trance: drumming, dancing, singing, ingesting plant medicine and breath work. In this course we are using a form of breath work we call “Healing Breath” which is s
print_description: We will gather as group to share our intentions, unite our power, breathe and and embark in a transformational journey!

title: Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience
description: Science is finding we are wired for spiritual awareness and transcendent vision.  Our brains not only have specialized regions of spiritual perception but produce those same chemicals found in the shamanic brews and plants used for millennia. Within this framework, psychedelics are entheogens-allowing a deep, vivid experience of the inner matrix of reality. Shamanic ceremonies are designed to open these doorways. drumming rattling, mushrooms, ayahuasca, San Pedro facilitate. with Patricia Savant PhD, and Alan Flying Bear

title: Shamata and Walking Meditation
description:
Bring your neurotic mind, tame it, and go enjoy your burn having a sense of who the fuck you really are. Connect with your true grounded self.

I have practiced this meditation by myself for about 2 years. I am curious to see how this will work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. It is an open-eye meditation technique that focuses on the breath while also taking in your surroundings. The walking meditation focuses on the sensation your feet feel while walking at a slow place in a small circle. This practice helps form a connection with the earth as a sense of grounding. With practice, this technique helps one discover who they really are, not who they feel they are supposed to be. It has done wonders for me and truly changed my life. The instructions are very brief and basic and each person's experience is unique.
print_description: Bring your neurotic mind, tame it, and go enjoy your burn having a sense of who the fuck you really are. Connect with your true grounded self.

title: Shamans of the Global Village - Film Screening
description: Indigenous people across the globe have used sacred plant medicines for millennia to heal, illuminate and connect them to the web of life. Each of these psychoactive medicines needs a healer to connect them to their patients: the shaman. This investigative-adventure documentary show examines not just these shamanic medicines, but the shamans that wield them. If, as Marshall McLuhan said, we are now a “global village”, then we need our own healers that understand the deep power and sacredness these plant medicines can reveal.  Film screening followed by Filmmakers Q&A session.
print_description: Come on a journey into the world of modern shamanism with Western practitioners and see never before filmed footage of ancient medicine practices.

title: SHUL: An Ecstatic Dancing Shabbat Morning Service
description: SHUL is a new, non-denominational experiment in Jewish ritual and Shabbat celebration. Mingling together old and new spiritual practices, SHUL aims to create a Shabbat service that is accessible, embodied, and fervent. SHUL is prayer + dance, niggunim + bass = a Shabbat morning service that engages all our senses and all our limbs in prayer. Imagine ecstatic dance meets post-Hasidic Hasidim meets inclusive, egalitarian prayer.
print_description: Prayer + dance, niggunim + bass = a non-denominational Shabbat morning service that engages all our senses and all our limbs in movement and prayer.

title: Slippery Vulvas - A Soapy Workshop
description:
It is our pleasure to host you at Slippery Vulvas! Today we'll be carving beautiful and varied vulvas out of pink soap in this live workshop space open to all genders. Promoting eye-opening (and leg-opening) dialogue on the many different forms of this tucked away treasure. We're talking innies, outties, bald vulvas, hairy vulvas, groomed vulvas, asymmetrical vulvas, layered vulvas, big vulvas, small vulvas . . . just like a fingerprint no two can ever be the same! The assortment really is amazing.

Inspired by Australian artist Greg Taylor's exhibition entitled The Great Wall Of Gina displaying 151 life size porcelain sculptures along a 130ft wall at the MONA in Hobart, Australia. In the gift shop of the museum they sell soaps that are a replica of these moulds, but on Playa we will be the artists! 

Who will be your muse?
print_description: Carving beautiful and varied vulvas out of pink soap. Promoting a dialogue on the different forms of this tucked away treasure. Who will be your muse?

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those irritating playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from. Get that P.O.O.P. (playa out of place) out of your nose!
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!

title: Solar Playa International Happy Hour
description:
Solar Burners! You’re invited to a clean energy summit at Burning Man 2016!

Please join Black Rock Solar on Tuesday, August 30, 2016 for the on-playa happy hour for burners working in, wanting to work in, or just friends of, the solar industry: SOLAR PLAYA INTERNATIONAL (SPI). We will be serving cool libations. Chat about the future of solar and how to revolutionize the world’s energy supply while sipping a cool beverage.

What: SPI - Black Rock Solar's 7th annual playa happy hour event
Where: Everywhere Pavilion / ARTery, on the Esplanade at 6:15
When: Tuesday, August 30, 4-6pm
Who: All are welcome!

Featuring:
- Hobnobbin' with burners working in renewable energy, climate change, art,
sustainability and environmental policy
- Cool libations & playa munchies
- Black Rock Solar crew, staff and board members
print_description: Black Rock Solar hosts a gathering to chat about the future of solar and how to revolutionize the world’s energy supply while sipping a cool beverage.

title: Sometimes Losing It all, Gives you everything?
description: At this point, my husband and I decided to take stock, stop time and start living.  We have been working and living remotely for 15 months.  We've been to ashrams, meditation centres, Iceland, Vietnam, Cambodia, started a business in India, and met the most incredible people.  Currently, we're living in our RV touring north America before heading to Africa to work with a non profit we've been working with remotely (Pro bono work on their business operations).
print_description: 3 years ago, after a very successful entrepreneurial career, we lost everything.  My business went under and my entire self thought identity with it.

title: Soul Story Circle: Claiming Your Personal Myth
description:
If you are a fan of Joseph Campbell, Jean Houston, Clarissa Pikola Estes...this will be right up your alley. 

This is a live storytelling event where together, we explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious. Through the combination of exploring the symbols, archetypes, metaphors that show up in the one of a kind story created in our time together, you are provided context and tools to explore the power and potential of your story and how to use it to access and embody the parts of you that may be lying dormant. People have requested stories that will heal, provide insight about their gifts, and help them access their personal power. 

What to expect from A Soul Story Circle: When we gather in a circle, one person is chosen to receive a story that will serve all. We then go through a process called talking back to the story, where we make sense of the symbols, metaphors, and archytpes that presented and how they apply to our every day lives.
print_description: Explore the mythic landscape that is living in our unconscious through the exploration of the the symbols, archetypes, metaphors.

title: So you want to develop a theme camp?

Have you ever wondered what it takes to build and become a theme camp?

title: !SPAGHETTIGEDON! Invasion of the Italians!
description:
Per la prima volta lo spaghettigeddon  atterra al burning  man! Tonnellate di pasta invaderanno il vostro pianeta, tenetevi pronti per l'apocalisse del gusto. ATTENZIONE! La zona verrà contaminata da olio extra vergine, aglio e peperoncino!
 "Evviva!  Spaghettigeddon lands in the dHive bar at  Burning Man for the first time, bringing tons of pasta cooked directly from a handful of alien chefs from PLANET AGLIO!  Get ready for an apocalypse of Renaissance tastes impossible to define.  Warning!  Abuse of extra virgin olive oil, garlic, and onion will put you into orbit! 
We Italibees are ready to engage any citizen of BRC with our jokes—because of our incomprehensible English be ready for a lot of hand gesturing communication while we vaporize you with flourishing flavor!!! Our mid-day lunch served to you may or may not include the following:  
*Carbonara of the Otherworld   
*Algio Oglio e Perperocino from Hell   
*Arrabbiata   
*Pesto of the Black Rocks   
Bring your own eating utensil, we will provide paper plates.  Find us at the dHive bar/BuzzInn in our village ‘Do More Now’ near the 7 story firehouse on 7:30 & B! 
 "The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later, you're hungry again. " -- George Miller
print_description: We will try not to contaminate the area w/garlic & onion vapors from the pasta'sauce, but what better time to stop for a lunch like that?  Fuel up!

title: Soulistica Sunset Kava Ceremony
description:
Soulistica hosts special Kava ceremonies at Sunset every day during events. These ceremonies provide grounding and a smooth transition into the night's festivities. 

A well prepared Kava potion drunk in small quantities produces only pleasant changes in behavior. It is therefore a slightly stimulating drink which helps relive great fatigue.  It relaxes the body after strenuous efforts, clarifies the mind and sharpens the mental faculties.

Come join Soulistica in honoring the Sun and Kava while we exchange knowledge and stories!

Soulistica will be hosting a Kava ceremony Monday-Friday 8:30-9:00pm
print_description: Join Soulistica at Anat's Love Camp for nightly sunset Kava ceremonies while bathed in energetic light and sound frequencies to prepare for the night.

title: Speechless! Art of Primal Communication
description: Tired of the blah, blah, blah? Ready to uplevel your ability to meet, connect and relate without all that annoying conversation? It's time to speak less and say more!. We all have the ability to know and be known far greater than we allow. What is missing? Permission and Practice. In this playshop we will develop our primal communication skills. Be ready to take a deep dive into the land of vulnerability, trust and surrender. Make new friends without saying all that dumb stuff we say!
print_description: Ready to uplevel your ability to connect and relate? Let's develop our subtle communication skills!

title: "Speed Art Build" by Jimmy Descant, ADA's Guild
description:
Jimmy Descant, head artist of the "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage Guild" of Salida, CO. will conduct a special event on Thursday night, 7-9pm, called "The Speed Build" of found object assemblage art. Jimmy and the Guild are masters of turning parts from the Golden Age of American manufacturing into beautiful assemblages.
Audience artist participants thru the week who experience the ADA's booth can put in their name for a lottery to be drawn at 6:30 on Thursdays evening, to be one on 10 chosen artists for this special event. The 10 artists will get a blank board to work on, will choose their own subject matter for the art, and show it to Jimmy at the start of the build. Imagine speed chess!!! where Jimmy will take their suggestion, lay out a few pieces to start and instruct the artist to apply what he did, and as Jimmy works around to the other artists, they add their own vision until Jimmy comes back around, to compound the vision! All other Guild members will help with instruction, tools, and raw materials in this frantic 2 hour filmed creation of 10 unique works of art, finishing with flair and fire into the darkness! As with all created art during the week, the artists rule what happens when done... keep, showcase, give away, burn, gift it...
print_description: Speed Art Build by Jimmy Descant, of the "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage Guild" of Salida, CO. will "Speed Build" art with 10 participants Thurs nt 7-9
other_location: "Amalgamated Debris Assemblage" , DaVinci Guilds at the Man

description: Come visit Spice n’ Vice at Justice & 5:45, 12PM to 4PM Monday to Saturday. Inside the tent cultural exchange is the gift we offer our guest. We will also be serving hot and cold Chai along with other delights. title: Stardust Chapel: Playa Weddings!
description: Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/29, and Saturday, 9/3. Our hours are noon -- 6pm (sunset) and by appointment. Experience the wonders of our magical gazebo where visitors of all genders can partake of the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis, Drunk Elvis, or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion. Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Don't forget to take a commemorative photo in our fabulous "head in hole" wedding cutouts before you leave. Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!
print_description: The Stardust Chapel is the ideal spot for your unique playa wedding!

title: Standing Strong - Yoga with Benji
description:
"Standing Strong" - Yoga With Benji at Huggzilla

Feeling the sand bellow as you stand tree-like in the desert wind. Mid-ranged Standing yoga featuring an emphasis on balance of both the body and mind.

Enhance your muscular strength and body flexibility, promote and improve respiratory and cardiovascular function, promote recovery from and treatment of addiction, reduce stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain, improve sleep patterns, and enhance your overall well-being and quality of life.

Length: 60min
Level: Intermediate

*Stabilizing the Mind - Meditation
*Wax On - Balance Exercise
*Yoga Poses - Standing Positions

title: Start your own town!
description: It sometime seems as if things are grim and change could just never come about in the places where we live. With extreme divide in our government, a broken food system and environmental degradation continuously getting worse, what can we possibly do to change things? I say, start an ecological community with all of your favorite people in the most ideal climate where conscious choice and intentional design are integral to your decision making. I will guide you on my journey in Costa Rica in creating community on a crystal clear river with deep pools where dripping fruit trees line the roads and neighbors care about each other and are dedicated to improving our world.
print_description: Step by step on how to make the community of your dreams a reality!  several communities in Costa Rica!!

Visitors can pamper themselves with various lotions and creams to rejuvenate their cracked and tired skin; moisture wipes to clean off that brutal dust and dirt of the Playa; comfortable lounge chairs; a cooling breeze from small, hand-held battery-operated fans; and, of course, hydration in the form of delicious cold water.

title: STOP MAKING SENSE - Talking Heads Movie Night!
description: We know you want to lay around in our swamp or dance around our fire to some Talking Heads out on the playa this year...and projector + speaker = basically David Byrne live on the playa. Join us for one of the best "rockumentaries" (dumb word) of all time:  "David Byrne walks onto the stage and does a solo "Psycho Killer." Jerry Harrison, Tina Weymouth and Chris Frantz join him for two more songs. The crew is busy, still setting up. Then, three more musicians and two back-up singers join the band. Everybody sings, plays, harmonizes, dances, and runs. They change instruments and clothes. Bryne appears in the Big Suit. The backdrop is often black, but sometimes it displays words, images, or children's drawings. The band cooks for 18 songs, the lyrics are clear, the house rocks. In this concert film, the Talking Heads hardly talk, don't stop, and always make sense." (thanks IMDB!)
print_description: Comfy-cozy & dancey-wansy movie night w/projector + speaker = basically Talking Heads live on playa. Be comfy by our fire, cozy in our swamp or DANCE!

title: Straya Day: Party like an Australian!
description:
Now in it’s 3rd year Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 

Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems. This is the official meet up for Aussies on the playa but we also really want to share our culture with our American (and other) friends so everyone is welcome! You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss it!

If you’re an Aussie headed over for the burn and you’d like to help out by smuggling in some Cherry Ripes, Fantales or even maybe a bottle of Bundy track us down on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/groups/BurningManAussies2016/) and give us a shout.
print_description: Dinky-di party with Aussie food, drinks, games & tunes. Official meet up for Aussies at the burn but we want to share our culture so all are welcome!

title: *~Sunrise Kickball~*
description:
Come play some kickball. Teammates, announcer(s) and cheerleaders needed. 
Prizes and good times awarded to all who participate. No wooks allowed. It is important to make the distinction between a hippie and a wook. Hippies can generally be viewed as positive, optimistic members of society with an idealistic goal for the betterment of society. Wooks are everything that you've been warned about in regard to hippies wrapped into a neat little package. As a side note we may do this more than the days we have listed, if you find yourself up and about, looking for shenanigans around sunrise roll through the 12:00 zone between the man and temple and see if we are there, It's pretty hard to miss a 60' kickball field.

title: Swan Lake Swamp Ball
description:
Be sure to wear your finest playa formal for our once-in-a-lifetime swampside “Welcome Home” party! The astrological calendar has finally aligned the short annual life of BRC with Suzanne Swan’s Swamp and her mystical, misfit creatures.

Thursday night, Suzanne Swan and her friends will gather to observe their most sacred ritual -- the Swan Lake Ball. Guests are encouraged to don their finest playa formal and liberate their inner swan (or other spirit animal) as we come together to celebrate, dance and reenact the ancient history of the swamp. All guests are encouraged to take on a role in order to ensure that we experience this reemergence on the playa again -- come on!

description: Kick off your Burn on the right foot (even if it’s your left)! “Sweat Your Prayers” with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave, as we bring this beautiful and dynamic dance/meditation back to Black Rock City. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, and no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. Please join RhythmWave as we return to BRC for our 10th consecutive year!

title: Symbiogenesis: Evolution & future biology of Earth
description: Symbiogenesis is the process by which groups of organisms merge into more complex meta-organisms. It is the process that lead to the evolution of complex cells and all macroscopic life. As a pattern, Symbiogenesis points the way to how we might design a human civilization that is so interconnected with other livings organisms that our buildings and cities become living, breathing, reproducing meta-organisms themselves, ushering in a new age in the evolution of the world-body.

title: Tantra Connection Puja
description: "A Puja is a devotional offering. In this sacred ceremony we will take off the protective masks we often wear to discover a deep connection with ourselves, our fellow humans, and to life itself. We will be guided through vulnerable, heart opening and playful exercises, rotating to explore with different partners in a safe way. Experiences may include questions, PG touch, breath, and the healing power of being truly seen and heard with unconditional love. You may find there are ways you hold yourself back out of fear, and this will give you an opportunity to open to more freedom so that you can connect to others with trust and joy, celebrating everyone including yourself as a reflection of the divine.

title: Tantra Heart Dance and Heart Songs Circle
description:
You are invited to a special pairing of heart opening practices which invite us to allow more love to flow in, around and through us.
 
 First we enjoy a Tantric Chakra opening Dance where we will feel our place between heaven and Earth through sacred embodied expression
 
 Then in the state of connected bliss Fia will lead us in a heart song circle!
 
 Singing together gives us the space to clear out our energetic field, raise our vibrations and let go of what is no longer serving us. Through singing we can develop deep contact with ourselves, it opens the heart and silence the mind. It connects us with each other and is a way of being present in the now. 
 
 About Fia:
 Fia Forsström is a singer-/songwriter from Sweden who creates music with a wish to move something inside of you. Lyrics that reflects all of life; here is the beautiful and wild, but also the ugly and uncomfortable. She is driven by evoking thoughts and to inspire. She has a great passion for the healing power of singing and creating spaces where people can meet each other just as they are. After experiencing the enormous joy and energy of chanting circles, singing together without any focus on achievement and instead let the song come from the heart, she wants to open up and invite more people to share that magic.
 
 https://www.facebook.com/FiasMusic/
print_description: Chakra Opening Dance into Bliss followed by Exquisite Heart Opening songs by Swedish Recording Artist Fia

title: Tantric Vibration - Feeling Gaia's Energy
description:
Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.

Open yourself to the possibility of living the paradox of being joyfully alive in this tangible realm we live in while at the same time being liberated and awakened in this body.  We as humans are microcosms of this universe, whatever exists in the outer universe also exists within. Feel the vibrations of this tangible Earth we live in knowing that everything is in motion and nothing rests. Tantra is a system so intuitive and natural to human kind that its essence can be seen within all spiritual paths from the Celtic, African, Native American, Sufi, esoteric Christian, Hindu, Sound Healing, Kabbalah, Buddhist, and Taoist wisdom traditions. It is a set of spiritual practices and ritualistic actions that through personal effort and experimentation are designed to direct universal energies of the macrocosm into the practitioner to achieve total liberation from ignorance and suffering. In this workshop we will use a myriad of psycho-physical exercises learned from different traditions for modifying and exploring consciousness. We will feel the energy of the Earth and learn to appreciate this vibratory field we exist in. with Ashleigh Rojas
print_description: Psycho-physical awakening exercises from different traditions to feel out her vibratory field.

title: Tea Ceremony
description: Numerous cultures have found communion and solace in the experience of drinking tea. Brewing tea assumes a meditative posture and is inherently generous. Rooted in these philosophies, we will bring strangers together through a tea ceremony grounded in calmness and mindfulness. The significance and ritual of each ceremony will be explained by our in-house tea-master. We will teach participants, in pairs, how to brew tea and conduct a formal tea ceremony specific to an individual culture (Chinese, Indian, Japanese, Russian, African, English, Turkish), which they will then perform and share with the rest of the group.
print_description: Cultivate calmness and mindfulness through the ancient art of brewing, serving and enjoying tea in our formal tea ceremony.

title: The Anatomy of AHA: The neuroscience of the moment
description: The sudden moment of insight is at the heart of creativity, motivation and even sustained human change for people of all ages. It turns out that understanding the science of insight can help us have more of them, or make the ones we have more useful. Join Dr. David Rock as he shares the deeper science of the AHA moment, how to have more of them, how to bring others to insight, and even how to increase insights across large systems.
print_description: Insight is at the heart of creativity, motivation & sustained human change. Find out why and learn to have a lot more of them.

title: The Art of Flow: The Key to Effortless Living
description:
"In this deeply transformational, interactive workshop, Jackie and Justin will be sharing the key principles and practices you will need to master to start living fully in the flow and experience how effortless, abundant and free your life can become.  People who master the art of living in flow often feel as if the universe is conspiring in their favor as everything they want and need to be successful, grow and live a truly extraordinary life begins to come to them effortlessly and in perfect synchronicity.  Once you have experienced it, there is no other way to live.

Expect to walk away having integrated a deep understanding of:

+ What the flow is and how to identify the choices and actions which will you bring into alignment with it
+ How to create exponential success and growth in your life and business from a place of effortlessness and flow
+ Techniques for accessing and getting in touch with your intuition and inner wisdom for crystal clear guidance on which path will be the most effortless and fulfilling for you
+ How to let go of struggle, suffering and the fear of surrendering control to the wisdom of life and move into a profound place of trust
+ Simple but powerful practices to be able to call in whatever support and resources you need to further your journey of expansion, personal and spiritual growth and be successful living your passion and giving your gifts to the world"
print_description: Discover powerful practices for bringing your life deeply into the flow and creating exponential growth and success from a place of effortlessness.

title: The Arts of Buon Fresco Revealed
description:
Hi everyone, come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We humbly invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Welcome to the Burning Man Guild Workshops! For the first time ever, Burning Man is hosting a series of workshops in a Florentine piazza-style format to have Masters of various craftsmanship skills teach our students the arts of the Renaissance. 

We, The Three Faced (Stone) Wench Workshop/Guild, are offering a series of classes you would love to attend! 

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various actual old time techniques over several days to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. As part of our commitment to up-cycle, we will utilize and recycle actual (old foam insulation) building materials. Participants will learn to recreate various historical stone mixtures that compromise the the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. This artifact creation will be followed by (and applied) techniques to 'age' their artwork with the patina and craquelure of passing time. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes their momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Plastered Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!

That’s not all! 

We are offering a unique community project/event, and we invite everyone to participate with your hearts (and energy): 

We are accomplishing a recreation of Gustav Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze (Ode To Joy), with a slight twist on the theme: “All You Need Is Love.” The secco fresco artwork will stretch across several large panels, a moving tribute of the people lost at Orlando, Florida, and of our experiences at Burning Man. 

Please join us! ;o)

Youth ages 12 and up welcome.
print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, they’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa!

title: The box as art
description:
The box as art. Contemporary artists have used boxes in a variety of innovative ways.  At face value, the box is a container: for shoes, clothes, a myriad of utilitarian purposes. In the hands of the artist, the box becomes a sculptural form. Inside and outside, the sculptural box is a container for place, memory, and emotion. This talk will provide a survey of how artists have successfully used boxes to create art and inspire attendees to create their own boxes fueled by their experiences in Black Rock City. 
 
Speaker: Shimmera. Shimmera (aka Cheryl Patrice Derricotte in the default world) is a visual artist and her primary medium is glass. This is her 3rd trip home to Black Rock City and she is the guest visual arts instructor for the three-credit California Institute of Integral Studies’ class “Art and Survival: Radical Creation at Burning Man.
print_description: This talk will provide a survey of how artists have successfully used boxes to create art and inspire attendees to create their own boxes.

title: The Dream Society Aster)*( Dome
description:
We Dream Together
We are all dreamers, there is no other
We share a dream that spans space and time.
We ignite the dreamer within us, lighting up new ideas. 
We connect hearts, bodies, minds with our passionate pursuits, mobilizing movements with our community.

Dreamers do because we love.
The Dream Society creates the experience of the shared dream, seeding inspirations for each other. We share joyfully.
We care for ourselves and reach out to each other in this ongoing process of self-tuning and collaborative alignment. We hone each other by being honest with each other, seeking to be our best by reflecting the best in each other.
Our space is dedicated to collaborative dreaming. In this society, our shared dreams create reality.

We begin by transmitting open space for exploration.
Through play, song, poetry, light, art, science and discovery we explore timeless wisdom, rhythm and the beat of a shared signal.
We create nourishment for each other and experiment with tools for wellbeing to enhance our abilities together.
Dreamspace happens when we come together and share passions. The society we share is decentralized, open and available to participation. Our place is open as sanctuary to lucid dreamers and explorers from all walks.
The dream becomes more intricate and real as we weave ourselves together in vast experiences, a dreamcatcher mandala of jeweled moments tied together through our people.
Our shared dream becomes a sparkling dance of culture creation, improvising to flow with the surreal systems around us to create the world we want to live in.

Our dreamspace is open to share.
We invite you to relax and dive deep within the Dream Society to amplify and transmit your vision with others.
Dance, create, flow, love and be yourself in the shared dance of culture creation. In this play we become both the dreamers and the dream of who we want to be, in this world, together.

title: The Evolutionary Psychology of Polyamory
description: Are human naturally monogamous or promiscuous?  Neither view makes sense given what we've learned about human sexual psychology in the last couple of decades. Most of us seem to have evolved over the last million years to be polyamorous by nature. But we are socialized into monogamist mating norms that amplify sexual jealousy, reduce compersion, stifle our sexual sovereignty, and limit the social networks that we instinctively try to build through lovers and metamours. In this talk, a leading evolutionary psychology professor (author of 'The Mating Mind', 'Spent', and 'Mate') will give a quick, fun overview of the new science behind poly. Then we'll have a Q&A.
print_description: A fun intro to the new science showing that most humans evolved to be naturally polyamorous rather than monogamous or promiscuous.

title: The "Game"
description: Divinici was said to have "unquenchable curiosity" and "feverishly inventive imagination". When those same concepts are applied to social interaction, AMAZING things come in to existence.   The Game has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries. Choices where there were once obstacles. “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent".. “The Game” is perfect for letting one's imagination out to play. Watch what happens when permission is given to create, with wanton abandon. “The Game” is both a game of chance and skill if you want to believe that.  Remove a self-limiting perspective, gain new insights in creative problem solving.  Come play 'The Game'

title: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade
description: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade will launch its third test run on an improvised route through Black Rock City and the Playa as Mutant Art Vehicles unite to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man.  The goals of the Greatest Mutant Arts Parade (GMAP) is to create a future planned route event...where Black Rock City can unite together in an uncensored, magnificent Meet and Greet of Mutant Art Vehicles, Theme Camps, BORG Organizers, Art Groups, Marching bands, Bicycle Crews, Stilt Walkers, and much much more.  Look for the parade on its rogue route around Noon on the Playa, through the City...where???  We cannot tell you.  But we will at one point drive past 3:45 and along the Esplanade as each vehicle is given the respect of introduction.  ****All interested participant vehicles and people who would like to assist...then ride in the parade...contact us via email.
print_description: Mutant Art Vehicles join together and parade through the streets of BRC...to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man!

description: The Hatchery Cube is a 20’ climbing structure with a large hammock floor suspended 12’ up. There are 4 towers, a stairway, and a couch at the top. Throughout the week we’ll be hosting parties in and around The Cube and out bar is located in the center of the structure. Come climb to the top and check out the view!

title: The Impossible Breakfast
description:
At Roko's Basilica we like to question the impossible and this one topic has torn our community for too long. "Experts" think it's physically impossible to crack an egg with ones butt cheeks. We are tired of listening to experts!  Here at Roko's Basilica we achieve the impossible. 

Come one, come all for the breakfast showdown of a lifetime. We will prove to the world that not only is it possible to crack an egg with one's butt but we will host a competition for who can crack the most eggs and make breakfast out of them!  Whoever can successfully crack an egg will get the victory breakfast with nothing less than your accomplishment for all to envy in glory. 

Anyone and everyone is encouraged to join in this historic, scientific and breakfast related breakthrough. Eggs will be provided, let's get cracking!
print_description: "Experts" think it's physically impossible to make breakfast using your butt cheeks to crack eggs, we beg to differ.  Let's get cracking!

title: The Last Smoothie Supper - a Queerborhood Party!
description:
Gender Blender welcomes you to our Annual Smoothie Social! Escape all those dusty boring straight parties, and come mix it up in heart of the queerborhood!! 

The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dancing, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and an all-around queer love fest! Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Fe Boy Collective, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Retreat, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and shake your tails! All genders welcome always. (If you’re straight but not narrow, you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will offer both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
print_description: The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, music, dancing, sexy gender blender games, and an all-around queer love fest!

Turned on by spanking (or want to be)? Soft or hard, clothed or not, your new techniques will quickly become a party favorite and have people lining up for their turn. In this Hands On workshop, Spanking Maestro BamBam and his assistant SaraBee review the three critical components to guaranteed to leave them begging for more: the warm-up, the follow through, and the rub out. title: The Lovin' Oven Tuscan Flat Bread Oasis
description: YUM! The Lovin’ Oven is all fired up again and baking FRESH BREAD to get your day started right. Daily from Tues-Sun let the smell of TUSCAN FLATBREAD, sumptuous organic jams and fresh mint tea draw you into our colorful vibrant oasis. Spread out on oversized day beds and let us feed, nourish and entertain you. Featuring DJ Ian McColl& assorted exotica. Volunteers and performers please apply!
print_description: let the smell of TUSCAN FLATBREAD, sumptuous organic jams and fresh mint tea draw you into our colorful vibrant oasis.

title: The Magic Lantern awaits you
description: Hookah, trading booth, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Come by for daily schedule. Scent spa and chill space open 24/7.
print_description: Hookah, trading booth, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Come by for daily schedule. Scent spa and chill space open 24/7.

title: The Magic Of Human Connection!
description: Lets go on an adventure together! In this adventure, we see that every time we interact with another human there is a potential for magic to occur! That magic can be healing, exhilarating, transcendent, blissful ... it can feel like home. In this heart opening workshop we tap into the magic of connection that is always available when we bring the key ingredients of presence, love and authenticity. Through beautiful partner activities, this workshop is designed to unite us with the abundance of love, interconnectedness, joy, and compassion that we can all share.
print_description: In every interaction there is a potential for magic to occur! In this heart opening workshop we will practice activating it!

title: The Maker Revolution
description: Join us for a conversation on The Maker Revolution and what a Vision of Sustainable Decommodified Global Community could like.
print_description: Join us for a conversation on The Maker Revolution and what a Vision of Sustainable Decommodified Global Community looks like.

title: The MoIST Maker Challenge
description: The MoIST Maker Challenge promotes creativity and innovation by challenging burners to identify a unique playa challenge, and design, build, and prototype a solution onsite that will solve the problem -- OR NOT -- instead, Challenge Participants can be matched with a MoIST Curator Coach who will support their mentee in writing an elegant, but not necessarily true or real solution, complete with history and detailed description, in the MoIST narrative style. The top three challenge submissions will become permanent MoIST exhibits and the winners will be honored at next year's Gala and FUN-raiser.
print_description: Challenges burners to identify a unique playa challenge, and design, build, and prototype a solution onsite that will solve the problem -- OR NOT!

description: Extraordinary Theme Camp Leads, take a moment for you!  Raise a glass to celebrate your successes.  Network, ask questions, talk with the Placement Team, make suggestions and learn about amazing new resources.
print_description: Theme Camp Leads gather and celebrate.  Network, ask questions, talk with the Placement Team, make suggestions and learn about new resources.

title: The moon is shining @ the Mighty Misfits
description: The moon will be shining high in the day, the Mighty Misfits will be aligning, so come over and play. We are sure you have heard, a password you must, to come and join us to get out of the gusts. Bring your cup whenever you like, enjoy a drink, and be one with us and the dust.

title: The Myth of Authenticity (& the Truth of Intimacy)
description: Like an electron that can't be directly observed, our "truth" is a vector at best, a nebulous arrow pointing toward an empty center. Good thing that vector is the evolutionary impulse itself. Experience it firsthand in this interactive hour, then spread it around. The more you spread it, the more you get it – that's the magic of love. The playa will never be the same, and neither will your relationships.
print_description: Our "truth" is but a vector—the vector of evolution & love. Taste it here, then spread it around. Your relationships will never be the same. w/JZ.

title: The New Renaissance Series
description: Join IDEATE in an experiential and exponential series focused on a new/ancient paradigm in abundant living. Featuring omni-disciplinary expert generalists that work across industries and sectors, there will be workshops, talks, and surprises exploring how we shape a regenerative future by re-learning the fundamental principles of nature's coordinate system. Themes include the intersections of art, technology, science, entrepreneurship, philosophy, creativity, and consciousness.
print_description: An experiential series featuring omni-sector leaders offering workshops, talks, and surprises exploring how we shape a regenerative future.

title: The Ohlone language of boobs - formal lecture
description:
Recently-discovered rock carvings indicate the Ohlone Indians thought of nipples as eyes. Come discover the momentous implications. Demonstration and formal lecture. 

Your host is Professor Rupert "JoyBoy", the author of the upcoming "New Ohlone Way" book. He will be ably assisted by his bouncy assistant Ms. Tetons, with whom he will demonstrate the inimitable language of the Ohlone indian tribe.
print_description: Recently-discovered rock carvings indicate the Ohlone Indians thought of nipples as eyes. Come discover the momentous implications. Demonstration.
other_location: Main stage at Silicon Village at 6:30 and E. Near the bar!

title: The Olfactorium
description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.
print_description: Come to the Olfactorium for a custom perfume created just for you by our Mistress of Scent, Agent 11, so your beautiful burner-self will smell great!

print_description: Come watch the Orcas burn! Artist Erik More has created a pod of Orcas traveling across the playa that will burn at 10pm.

title: The Orgasamator Experience
description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private. Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience. Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want. No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options. We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave. We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun. Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.

title: The President's Burning Man Divorce Party
description: Come celebrate #DivorceEquality and #ConsciousUncoupling! Because same sex marriages are still NOT recognized in Australia, President had to relocate from her home in Melbourne to Nevada for six weeks to get divorced from her ex-wife that she married in NYC.  Toast a glass of champagne to the darker side of Marriage Equality-- THE RIGHT TO DIVORCE! Thanks for joining us on this special day, and this is a black and white affair, because Divorce Equality is still a totally GREY AREA.  President loves a good party, so she will keep hosting a Burningman Divorce Party until all gay couples around the world can share in the right to Divorce!  If you have recently “uncoupled”, please join us in celebrating your freedom.

title: The psychology of attraction
description: This talk will dive into the psychology behind attraction, lust and desire. Understand what you're doing (and not doing) in the dating and mating game and how you can hack the system... and your own attractiveness. Attraction is something you can hack. By learning the psychology behind how and who we are drawn to, we can make small shifts (from our body language to mastering the different kinds of eye gaze) and become more attractive.

title: The Singer's Secret Weapon: THE KRACKLE
description:
Singers! If you want to build your voice to something magnificent, then you will need the krackle exercise! 'Tis the blood of a strong voice. 
It is not always the most appealing sound, especially for beginners, but sometimes you need to sound ugly before sounding awesome! 
The krackle is the rubbing together of the vocal chords, which gives you immense breath control, builds range, and give the sound extra resonance and brilliance. The krackle will get your voice anywhere you want it to take you. Once your voice has worked through the krackle, then it is ready to be garnished with other beauties, like breathy and flowy goodness. But for now were krackling it up!

title: The Temple — Convertere [clothing optional]
description:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Convertere >>

You’ll engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.  Convertere means converter, deriving from “turn around, transform, come-together, to turn, to return.”  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

Maibel was born in Caracas, Venezuela, and while residing in Buenos Aires, Argentina, she developed an acting process through the use of group research and play creation experience. She’s a permanent member of the Unknown Theater Group in Buenos Aires, which for 40 years has been a proponent of the Unknown Experience art form. 

Anthony organizes naturist and intimacy-building events in NYC and South Florida.  His mentors include Christina Berkley, Guy Sengstock, John Thompson, Sean Wilkinson, Sara Ness, Amy Silverman, Jordan Myska Allen, Gina Brezini, and Nicole Daedone.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.  

　
*Clothing optional.  Nudity is not a requirement.
print_description: Engage in play that explores the unsaid. Go to where you can’t go alone. Reveal. Listen. Question. Vent. Return to yourself through each other.

title: The Temple — Nuptias [clothing optional]
description:
<< The Temple >>

We are each a temple [literally "place cut off," from stem of “tem” — to cut].  Inside each temple are housed experiences that are the basis of how we comprehend ourselves.  The temple that we are is an adventure.  In that adventure we are swimming through contradictions, polarity, wonder, desires, embarrassments; our emotions, feelings, curiosities, wounds, traumas.

In the temple, what develops is the movement of the psyche. Maibel and Anthony serve as psychopomp guides through the temple with different exercises, taking participants on a trip that expands comprehension of their human complexity, our connection to each other, the need to explore the conversations that we never had. 
　
　
<< The Temple — Nuptias >>

Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.  C/O*
　
　
<< Your psychopomps >>

We—Anthony and Maibel—live the experience of returning to themselves through each other. We enjoy practices that stimulate these experiences that make us more vulnerable, more naked, more pure, more devoted.

We moderate a Facebook group called The Temple exploring the unknown, the unheard, the unsaid — and union. And another called Colony where we encourage conscious, smart, and progressive social nudism and sexuality.
print_description: Can partners be more free together than apart?  A new comprehension of polyamory and exclusivity: the Hermetic Relationship.

title: The UN's Agenda 2030 and Sustainable Development
description: Achieving a sustainable future requires increasing our collective impact by aligning efforts within our communities and with broader initiatives.  Learn about leading international and national initiatives, including the UN's Agenda 2030 and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and UNESCO's new Global Action Programme (GAP) on education for sustainable development.  Explore examples of how schools, colleges, government agencies, and community programs are building tangible projects, resource tools, networks, and outreach efforts that increase education, training, and public awareness campaigns.  Realize how you can make a difference.

title: The Zendo Project for Psychedelic Harm Reduction
description:
Not the kind of fun freaky night you imagined? Things getting a little too weird ...even for Burning Man? The Zendo Project is a place where you can find support during particularly challenging or overwhelming experiences, substance related or otherwise. The Zendo is staffed 24/7 with trained volunteers who offer peer-to-peer counseling support. This is a safe space to land and reconnect with yourself before you head off to your next adventure! We have two locations on D at the 9:00 and 3:00 keyholes. We are open all week, from 8pm on Monday the 29th until 8am on Monday the 5th. If you or a friend are in need of support, come find the Zendo!

Mission
The mission of the Zendo Project is to provide a supportive environment and education to help transform difficult psychedelic and psychological experiences into opportunities for learning and growth.
 
Vision
We envision a world where communities are engaged in providing safety and support for people having psychedelic and psychological challenges; and harm reduction principles are used foremost to reduce the risks associated with substance use.
print_description: Compassionate Care and a Safe Space for Overwhelming Situations

title: The Zendo Project Workshop
description:
The Zendo Project provides a supportive environment and specialized care designed to transform difficult psychedelic experiences into valuable learning opportunities, and even potentially offer healing and growth. In turn, our work reduces the number of drug-related hospitalizations and arrests.
 
This year, millions of people will use psychedelics outside of supervised medical contexts, many of them for the first time. Difficult psychedelic experiences can be frightening, but also potentially among the most valuable experiences someone can have. What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? What techniques are available for helping transform a potentially traumatic situation into a positive or even therapeutic one? What role has the Zendo Project played at festivals, and what take-home messages are available for others interested in psychedelic harm reduction?
print_description: What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? Learn the principles of Psychedelic Harm Reduction.

title: Trans 101 thru 401 with Dominique
description:
The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask. This purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people... Not in a judgmental way... This is meant in a good way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path.

Trans 101: The Nuts and Bolts.
A brief PowerPoint discussion of definitions and the basics of gender, gender identity, gender expression, and sexual orientation. How are transgender and cisgender people alike? How are they different?

Trans 201: A Peak Through the Veil.
After learning the basics, we’ll have a Q&A session where any and all questions will be fielded. We all know that there are questions that are deemed inappropriate to ask a transperson. For this brief moment in time, there are no taboos. We will do our best to answer your questions with honesty, transparency, and sincerity.

Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.
We will bare our souls and our bodies for visual inspection and further Q&A.

Trans 401: Shredding the Veil.
For those brave audience members, we will open ourselves to not only visual review, but hands on, or hands in, examination.
print_description: The trans phenomenon. Male To Female?  Female To Male?  What you like to know, but were afraid to ask. Get educated and enlightened!

title: Transcending Fear Workshop
description:
An existential exploration of Fear and EGO. Come learn how fear and our essential state of being work in a dynamic relationship to create our EGO (impulsive actions, and self-defeating beliefs and habits). In this workshop, we will touch on the basic understanding of fear and it's differentiation from Worry, Anxiety, and False Fear. Then dive deep into existentialism explaining why fear has such a programmable hold on our free will, and biology, causing our impulsive actions and thoughts. Then we will explore techniques I've used to transcend my own fears, self-defeating beliefs and habits, freeing myself from years of insecurity, blame, resentment, childhood abuse, guilt from molestation, and general self-hate. I will share every method that has worked for me, and then afterword we will have a Q&A, and have a fun conversation and share our experiences. 

About Me: Hello my name is Nine Johnson, I'm a Performance Anxiety coach in Los Angeles California. I usually work with Actors, Singers, Athletes, Directors and businesses people from all industries to identify and overcome their performance anxieties, insuring confidence and peak performance. I come from a spiritual and self development background with over 15 years experience, in counseling, and life coaching.
print_description: An existential exploration of fear & EGO. Explore ways to transcend fear, resentment, anger, and guilt by fear mapping & changing habitual beliefs.

title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening Puja
description:
You are invited to this Heart Opening Tantra Puja. A Puja is a devotional offering. Through this sacred ceremony we can realize of the true nature of the Self and experience into the state of total oneness.
 
 This Tantra Puja is a way of honoring and adoring the divine that dwells within each of us. 
 
 What is a Heart Opening Puja? Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osqSdVTIZ_4
 
 This is a "station" puja. There is an inner and outer circle. One rotates and with each rotation you have a new partner. Each partnering is an opportunity to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another.
 
 The stations are subtle, elegantly simple and this is their potency. The tantric arts invite us into our own heart in an ease full way. One of the most exquisite is this ceremony where we open to an embodied experience of witnessing the divine in all and thus the diving in ourselves.
 
 Open to the possibility of adoration, forgiveness, unconditional love and experiencing your true and higher self in the span of a few short hours.
print_description: Rotational Circle Puja. Fall in love with self by falling in love with others one partner at a time. Profound experience of oneness and healing.

description: We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within. From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

title: True Love: Beyond Power, Status & Sexuality
description:
“Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power.”
Oscar Wilde's words have great explanatory and predictive power, but I'm curious about the limits of this model. 
Where & how does Love come in?
Could True Love honor our drives for power and sex by holding them sacred and taking them with us to the next level? Come explore these themes:
    -How does power & sexuality constrain or inspire intimacy?
    -What's the relationship between fear, control & sex
    -Influence & immortality -the ultimate power
    -Can a conscious partnership creatively co-op our need for control?
    -Could True Love offer a map through the power struggle?
    -Why we fuck? Why we fuck off?
Join us for a edgy exploration of how these important ideas intersect. Bring your taboo questions & leave all assumptions at the door.
print_description: Could True Love honor power & sex by holding these native drives sacred while including them in our developmental ascent? Join this edgy talk.

title: Trust Nothing: The Incomplete Truths of Journalism
description: It's said that a successful journalist never lets the facts get in the way of a good story. Can facts be trusted? Can we trust our own eyes? And can a journalist ever find the complete truth behind a story?
print_description: It's said that a successful journalist never lets the facts get in the way of a good story. Can facts be trusted? Can we trust our own eyes?

title: Trust Your Intuition with Qoya
description:
"There a million choices on the playa (and in life). Learn how to never fear you're making the wrong choice because you know how to navigate your path by trusting what feels right in your body.
 
 Qoya is based on the idea that through movement we remember. We remember our essence is wise, wild and free. Wise, wild and free also draw reference to the movement forms we practice. Wise- calling on the wisdom traditions of yoga. Wild- the creative expression in dance. Free- expanding our capacity to enjoy our bodies through more feminine and flowing movement. In Qoya there is no way you can do it wrong, and the way you know you are doing it right is that it feels good."
print_description: What would your life feel like if you trusted yourself? Explore that feeling through movement, community, ritual & a pilgrimage to this offering.

title: Unconditional Healing
description:
Tired of searching for a cure for your grief. Let go this notion and.develop a proper psychological state of mind and begin to heal.

This approach to healing is based on the Eastern philosophy of synchronizing the body and the mind. Once we do that we can begin to truly heal from any emotional or physical issues we're dealing with. I've practiced a technique called a body scan which helps join body and mind. I'm curious to see how this would work in a group setting as this would be a new experience for me. After the body scan, I plan to start by asking everyone what they want to heal from and from there perhaps develop a common theme among the participants or just see what comes up and go with the energy in the dome.

title: Use the Force. Benevolent Manipulation.
description:
"Unbraiding the social stigmas knotted around the “evils of manipulation” and learning to see how a shift in perspective gives power to intentional benevolent skillful action on behalf of others.
 Alchemy requires truly seeing and embracing all elements at play in order to transmute them (the situation/circumstance) into its highest form.
 Manipulate happiness into your friends, Seduce and inspire their best qualities to come out and play. Manipulate yourself out of your own implosive self sabotage and towards your best expression.
 Manipulation implies taking advantage, So lets do Just That! What if I took advantage of your company and friendship to inspire my own joy? What If I took advantage of simple understanding of social cues and behaviors to make you feel safer in This moment than the Last moment?
 Through Intelligent, Benevolent, Skillful actions we can amplify the environment within our own beings, and the external environment to our highest collective benefit."
print_description: Use Skill, Alchemy & Insight to Manipulate Light (like a Prism does) into a Beautiful Rainbow of Inspiration. Bring Intentional Awareness

title: Voices from the Occupation of the Malheur NWR
description: The armed occupation of the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in January 2016 was a significant event in the history of public lands in the west. In this talk Mike Marxen from US Fish and Wildlife Service  will explore words and stories from the occupation that were used to provoke, challenge, resolve and heal. As we gather here and legally "occupy" this desert, what do public lands mean to you?

title: Walk of the Wings: Temple Burn Dawn & Midnight
description:
We invite participants - especially folks wearing wings, and friends - to gather at the temple on the Sunday of Temple Burn in the hour before dawn (around 5:30-6 AM), to circle the temple in solemn procession as the sun rises around 6:30 AM.  Let's aim for ~15-20 minutes of procession, followed by any additional participation with the Temple you choose. Afterwards we will scatter to share the spirit & purpose of this year's temple.

In perihelion to this event, some of us winged folk will gather again for a night-time circling of the temple, at midnight after the temple burn, around the ashes of the Temple.

Note: The Temple Guardians enthusiastically anticipate this participation, and only ask that we be prepared for them to begin the soft-close of the temple around dawn on Sunday, followed by the firm closure by 8 AM. Parking bikes >500' away from the Temple is requested if you want to stay in the area past 8 AM.

https://walkofthewings.wordpress.com/home
print_description: Inviting participants w/ wings (& friends) to gather at the temple on Sunday in the hour before dawn, & @midnight, to circle the temple in procession.

title: We are Story Telling Animals Seminar / Discussion
description: Stories: That’s how we have communicated, well I guess as long as we have been able to communicate.  We used stories to pass on information, persuade, and entertain. Stories told by others give us insight into how they think and feel.  When we hear something in a story that we connect with we don’t feel so alone in our own thoughts. Truth is, we are much more likely to remember something if we hear it in a story then just the facts. Humans are social beings and enjoy others for the most part and listing to stories gives us that connection.  But what actually makes up a story? And better yet what makes up a compelling story that engages your audience? Join Writer / Director Robert Hargreaves MFA Screen Writing for this seminar / discussion about Storytelling and Story Tellers. We will be serving Espresso Shots & Cookies
print_description: Stories give us insight into how others think & feel. What actually is a story? What makes a story engage? Join our romp about Storytelling. Espresso

title: Wednesday Worship with the Monks of Funk
description: The Monks of Funk draw our inspiration from dance and music. For us, it's a form of personal exploration, expression and reflection. Its our way of connecting to others.  It can be cathartic and source of joy. We're as serious as we can be about something that makes us positively silly; dance and play is our form of worship. To that end, when we dance, we really mean it. Our Wednesday Night Worship is our annual on Playa dance party that brings friends new and old from across the Playa to 'worship' with us in the Dance Church.

title: Welcome Homebrew Happy Hour and 4:20 Reggae Party
description:
Welcome Home Burners!  Getting here was certainly no easy task; planning, compression, travel time, front gate waits, setting up camp, extreme weather, and of course, a lack of sleep.  It’s exhausting, but worth it, and you made it.  Go You!  Now it’s time to celebrate!  

Movement of Jah People and Camp Walter have teamed up to combine two amazing parties into one; The Welcome Homebrew Happy Hour and The 4:20 Reggae Party!!!  Come join us at Camp Walter (10 and Esplanade) between 3-6pm on Monday of burn week.  We'll be serving up some ice cold home brews, while you're getting down to funky reggae jams.  

We look forward to catching up old friends and getting to know the new, see you soon!

Also, if you’re an avid home brewer and wish to share your creation(s), message us.
print_description: Welcome Home! Movement of Jah People and Camp Walter have teamed up to bring you jammin' Reggae sound and ice cold, delicious, home brewed beer.

description: Come on down and let’s get it on, we supply the water guns and you supply the hotness! Come between 2PM and 6PM to make your very own pendant! And while you are here come visit our branding station and get yourself stamped.
